column2: >The TripleClaim Game Collective proudly presents it’s first independent arcade inspired game for Android, iOS and other popular gaming platforms. Bananaz in Space is original concept that we like to call teaser game, sort of a prequel to our J. D. Zetz the Banana Conspiracy, a game which is currently in production by our small but effective and hardworking team. Set in a fantasy dream of one of our monkey characters from the upcoming Banana Conspiracy it pulls you in a colorful and fun world of apes obsessed with space traveling and of course... bananas.

column2: >As a part of a bizarre space program our monkey hero is sent to space in a rocket ship to collect as much bananas as possible on his way to the sun. The premise of whole monkey civilization, their technology and society is based around belief that the whole sun is yellow because it’s made of bananas. The only way to get there is by rocket and our monkey is following his “yellow brick road”. The game itself is sort of a presentation that main boss monkey is presenting to it's minions

Your goal is to navigate the monkey spaceship on it's way to the sun. The rocket is powered by fire crackers, stars and planets are hanging from the ceiling and space is a giant theater. Both visual and sound styles are influenced by the fifties, atom-punk rendered with UPA-e &amp
column4: Hanna Barbera cartoons and it's a part of the larger universe that we want to explore and expand in our sequel Banana Conspiracy.

column2: >Bananaz in Space is a labor of love by a group of young game enthusiasts from Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina gathered under the name TripleClaim Game Collective. Produced with little to no budget it combines DIY mentality with diverse professional team skills. We are strongly based on open source software (Blender, Gimp) as a core of our pipeline with a little touch of the newest one that is providing the best game architecture today (Unity).

","The TripleClaim Game Collective proudly presents it’s first independent arcade inspired game for Android, iOS and other popular gaming platforms. Bananaz in Space is original concept that we like to call teaser game, sort of a prequel to our J. D. Zetz the Banana Conspiracy, a game which is currently in production by our small but effective and hardworking team. Set in a fantasy dream of one of our monkey characters from the upcoming Banana Conspiracy it pulls you in a colorful and fun world of apes obsessed with space traveling and of course... bananas.
Bananaz In Space Trailer

As a part of a bizarre space program our monkey hero is sent to space in a rocket ship to collect as much bananas as possible on his way to the sun. The premise of whole monkey civilization, their technology and society is based around belief that the whole sun is yellow because it’s made of bananas. The only way to get there is by rocket and our monkey is following his “yellow brick road”. The game itself is sort of a presentation that main boss monkey is presenting to it's minions
column2: how to get to the sun and what to expect from a space traveling from the monkey's point of view. Players will choose a specific mission by spining the wheel of fortune before the game. Your goal is to navigate the monkey spaceship on it's way to the sun. The rocket is powered by fire crackers, stars and planets are hanging from the ceiling and space is a giant theater. Both visual and sound styles are influenced by the fifties, atom-punk rendered with UPA-e & Hanna Barbera cartoons and it's a part of the larger universe that we want to explore and expand in our sequel Banana Conspiracy.

column1: Bananaz in Space is a labor of love by a group of young game enthusiasts from Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina gathered under the name TripleClaim Game Collective. Produced with little to no budget it combines DIY mentality with diverse professional team skills. We are strongly based on open source software (Blender, Gimp) as a core of our pipeline with a little touch of the newest one that is providing the best game architecture today (Unity).

Leading crowdfunding site as Indiegogo is the perfect platform for indie developers like TripleClaim Game Collective. We can be able to present our game directly to the user and can obtain her or his support directly in order to carry it out fairly quickly and keep her or him duly informed here or through our site www.tripleclaim.com. To complete our goal of publishing this game we have to...
buy a license for essential software (Unity) needed for publishing the game

Unity is perfect development engine that gave us full control over interactive 3D content enable our team to assemble graphics and assets into levels, add animations and it’s physics, simultaneously play test and edit our project and at the end export a whole game to chosen platforms.
buying a licenses for sound effects or paying our co-worker DJ Billain to record them
paying our team of professionals (film director, compositing artist, music composer) for their effort, time and talent in producing teaser and official trailer and music theme for the game.
TOTAL $5000

even with professional experience we still need to spend a large amount of our time to wrap up our project. We are proud of what we have already achieved and if we get even less, then the whole process will take a lot longer as we won't be able to execute fairly theese final steps. We are determine to deliver a high quality product, looking and sounding exactly the way we intending. With our combined experience and the help of other like-minded people we want to create a great game that's based on our original ideas, by remaining independent.

Addition to our personal gratitude bonus rewards for our hard core supporters and backers will include beautifully designed premium items like T-shirts, mugs and limited edition art prints signed by our team.
Also to every donor in order to show our gratitude for beleiving in us and our idea we are giving away free of charge Bananaz In Space and every other game that we produce ever!

Even if you can't afford to donate anything on Indiegogo, but you like what you see, you can still help. Spread the word! Tell your friends, give them links to Indiegogo and tripleclaim.com (be sure to check out our free goodies like theme wallpapers, stickers & graphics) and share this campaign on Twitter, or Facebook.

Who We Are

Let's tackle things head-on, shall we? Our basic goal is to become the Oscars equivalent for Video Games. There, simple! Band-aid torn. No RPG marathon or ambiguous ending.

...wait! Please don't leave yet! I said simple, not easy. This wasn't a casual decision. If it were, why would the company be called GOTY? It would've been called Gamers Oppose Tart Yogurt. no offense to tart. or yogurt. and no harm meant to any organization called that. They've already been thoroughly punished.

<b style=""color: rgb(0, 0, 0)

column2: Player voting, industry opinion, and numerous x-factors.

The GOTY Campaign

This project, this company. It was designed with two groups in mind. The studios who craft amazing work every year, and the dedicated community who enjoys that work. 
I cannot emphasize enough the power of this community. You commit so much, yet are constantly burdened by inferior productions. Organizations that review games, award them, represent them
column2:
they should be the same quality as the titles themselves, and should be a reliable resource for this community to utilize.
We stress quality and fairness more than anything else. Awards selections should be based on the collective opinion of the entire industry, not just a select few ""specialists"". At the same time, ceremonies should effectively honor the winning Titles and their Respective Studios.

column1: The Awards Process
Categories
Our award divisions were designed and checked over the course of half a year to be as few and as broad as possible. Not everyone gets a cake, and only the best deserve to find out that it's a lie:

To ensure the most accurate selections, we researched and compiled the most accurate resource: Everything.
• All qualifying Critics scores are aggregated, then error corrected. These are utilized as an initial filter so that only the most respected titles make it through.

• User votes from every resource possible is collected, aggregated, error corrected (a bit more than critics). These votes are constantly utilized as a resource, from the beginning until the end of the selection process.

• All relevant X-Factors are researched, from common considerations such as Public Opinion, Community, and Industry Influence, to less common considerations such as Game Culture, Market Saturation, and Profitability.

column1: <li>
Wild Cards - user/community opinions that sway certain titles to be in a better standing
<li>
2nd Filter - user/critic ratings that vary each year, designed to isolate out titles that are Great
<li>
Exceptions - unique conditions with certain titles that allows them to qualify for specialized awards when they otherwise might not (e.g. Best Art Direction)
<li>
Finalists - the top two dozen titles are determined, in which the entire industry can vote on who they individually think deserves a nomination
<li>
Nominees - the top titles in each category move on to receive a nomination during the awards show
<li>

Winners - here votes serve as final tie breakers or confirmation for winners. It is quite common for both user and critic votes to tie. This where x-factors are incorporated, often in significant amounts in order to confirm a winner.
<div style=""text-align: center

What We Need

The Indiegogo pamphlet told me to paint you a desperate story on somehow if this campaign doesn't succeed, my kidneys will collapse. It's supposed to give you a sense of urgency to help contribute to the cause.
First of all, really? Secondary, I have two kidneys. selling one to support this idea is an easy trade-off.

We would love help, but respect any choice you make. The more support and noise you bring, the easier it is for us all to move this idea to life. If you are unable to support us financially but wish to, don't get down about it!

Everyone working in this company has already committed their life to it. Whether we take part-time jobs, sleep only a few hours, abandon social interactions, or sell a kidney, we have already made our decision.

What You Get

Everything we can possibly give. This company. This idea. It was established for the Industry, the Studios, the Community. You.

column3: >Accessories: we have a number of perks which award crystalline accessories. It is made with Silicon, sandblasted, with 32% Pb. Gemstone fans might recognize this composition to be the same as a rather famous crystal provider. The available designs are:

• Keychain
• Cube Display

<div>

Awards Show: our physical show won't begin until the 2015 awards, we want to first optimize all our content to ensure a highly enjoyable show for both casual and dedicated audiences. For those who are interested, we are selling early tickets for our inaugural ceremony. Take note that supplies are limited since we have yet to finalize our host location, so be quick about it if you do want a spot!
<div>

VIP Access: we have three primary sources of media that we provide, Data, Videos, and Music. Site VIP status grants early, exclusive, and special privileges for both our data and videos. Get a peek at our media in the early stages of production and see how all of it is ultimately put together!

Only the number of total votes, their average, and top 5 x-factors for a winning title are announced for the public after awards are granted. Additional information, such as voting distribution, country of origin, and all x-factors are available only for VIP members. In addition, our newsletters will routinely send out overall logistics on new and upcoming games.
Radio has a separate category because of licencing requirements, more information will be provided below!

If you have created online media, then the annoyance of music copyright laws are all too familiar. For those who are unaccustomed, just know that it is surrounded by more tape than it takes to prank trap a monster truck.
These severe and inconvenient regulations are the reason why many small organizations find it so difficult to establish reputable stations. Proper licencing is a long, rigorous, and tedious process.

Fortunately we've prepared for this and have most of the foundation ready to make the vast majority of Video Game music publicly accessible! The last (and longest) step we require is the funding in order to process all the paperwork required to make it available for you. It is for this reason that the Radio perk has a higher requirement, otherwise we would've coupled it with the site's VIP access.

GOTY Radio VIP is a permanent membership, you'll never receive any ads for all of eternity! All songs that are played will have links attached for individual purchase, linked from the creators so you can directly support them for their amazing work!
Other Ways to Help
• noise! Noise! NOISE! NOIISSEEEE!
<ul>
• We've invested our entire lives into this, and worked for nearly a year to show you guys what we can do!

• All the infrastructure is complete, from a decade of Awards, millions of pieces of compiled data, to the completed 2013 Awards Show and the 2014 Show currently under development. We've done everything we can from our side!
• The best thing anyone can do for us now is to talk about GOTY!

Stretch Goals

Now. Now. Let's not get ahead of ourselves. What what would it be if you knew what these were before we even reach them?

Founder & Background

Hi, I'm Henry! Founder and CEO of GOTY LLC, a dedicated Awards Company for Interactive Entertainment. Our goal is to celebrate and award video games as Works of Art, for both the studios and their communities. Nominees and Winners are determined through Critic & Player voting, industry opinion, and numerous x-factors.

Now the guideline said to talk about myself. I suppose this is used to build empathy and show capability to you, the contributor. I'd rather just give you a whole bunch of stuff as a thank you, but the suggestion-man threatened my caffeine. Sorry guys :'(
I got into technology nearly two decades ago when I messed around with my parent's windows 91 and deleted everything
Because you know. I was a foolish toddler.

A few years later at the budding age of 12, I programmed my first virus, software at 14, Game Design at 15, and by 16 Microsoft whispered curses at me and numerous other tinkerers as we turned the Xbox 360 into a public library.
My parents thought I was a genius. Ha! As an immigrant, I had no friends, so I turned to the only source that could provide me with the comfort I needed: you guys. The internet.
With the support of everyone from around the world, and access to all the knowledge in the planet, I flourished.
Degree in Chemistry to make mom & dad get off my back. And minors in engineering, physics, philosophy, and business because that was what I loved.
Deep bro, real deep. Yep, I'm getting all the feels.
The GOTY Campaign

This project, this company. It was designed with two groups in mind. The studios who craft amazing work every year, and the dedicated community who enjoys that work. I cannot emphasize enough the power of this community. You commit so much, yet are constantly burdened by inferior productions. Organizations that review games, award them, represent them

column1: The Awards Process
Categories
Our award divisions were designed and checked over the course of half a year to be as few and as broad as possible. Not everyone gets a cake, and only the best deserve to find out that it's a lie:
Best Art Direction -
focuses strictly on the artistic design and aesthetic found within as well
as inspired from the title
Best Sound Work -
includes voice acting, narration, sound effects, songs, and orchestral
compositions
Best Cast -
encompasses the entire cast: protagonists, antagonists and supporting
Best Innovation -
designed to be an ambiguous classification, this award recognizes distinctive
creative and unique accomplishments, including elements that do not fit
into any other category
Best Graphical Achievement - greatest engine utilization and execution
within a title, factoring hardware limitations/advantages
Best Story -
includes best script writing, character delivery, atmosphere, and world
design
Best Studio -
rated on the quality of their releases from imagining, innovations, to
execution
Best Gameplay -
the foundation of video games. Measuring creativity, replay value, immersion,
flexibility and more
GOTY -
the Game of the Year, the singular best title accomplishment. Takes every
possible element into consideration, from the fundamentals such as
graphics and gameplay, to x-factors such as market saturation and cultural
influence
Selection
To ensure the most accurate selections, we researched and compiled the most accurate resource: Everything.
All qualifying Critics scores are aggregated, then error corrected. These are utilized as an initial filter so that only the most respected titles make it through.

User votes from every resource possible is collected, aggregated, error corrected (a bit more than critics). These votes are constantly utilized as a resource, from the beginning until the end of the selection process.

All relevant X-Factors are researched, from common considerations such as Public Opinion, Community, and Industry Influence, to less common considerations such as Game Culture, Market Saturation, and Profitability.
After all the data is obtained, titles each year are screened through 5 processes:
Basic Qualification - fundamental precursors such as official release dates
1st Filter - user/critic ratings that vary each year, designed to isolate out titles that are Good
Wild Cards - user/community opinions that sway certain titles to be in a better standing
2nd Filter - user/critic ratings that vary each year, designed to isolate out titles that are Great
Exceptions - unique conditions with certain titles that allows them to qualify for specialized awards when they otherwise might not (e.g. Best Art Direction)
Finalists - the top two dozen titles are determined, in which the entire industry can vote on who they individually think deserves a nomination
Nominees - the top titles in each category move on to receive a nomination during the awards show

Winners - here votes serve as final tie breakers or confirmation for winners. It is quite common for both user and critic votes to tie. This where x-factors are incorporated, often in significant amounts in order to confirm a winner.
For complete rules & regulations

What We Need The Indiegogo pamphlet told me to paint you a desperate story on somehow if this campaign doesn't succeed, my kidneys will collapse. It's supposed to give you a sense of urgency to help contribute to the cause.
First of all, really? Secondary, I have two kidneys. selling one to support this idea is an easy trade-off.

We would love help, but respect any choice you make. The more support and noise you bring, the easier it is for us all to move this idea to life. If you are unable to support us financially but wish to, don't get down about it!

Everyone working in this company has already committed their life to it. Whether we take part-time jobs, sleep only a few hours, abandon social interactions, or sell a kidney, we have already made our decision.
Each member specializes in specific parts of the production and database.
As the founder, I handle all the creative work. I develop the website, create the media, design the Awards Process, and program the aggregation software. Sleep be damned.

However, no matter how hard and efficiently we work, we're very obviously an indie company, and as a result we're bound by the same limitations: 24hrs/day, food/water to fight entropy, and equipment costs to do our work.

We've worked in the background for nearly a year in order to have something we believe to be worthwhile to show. Funds will greatly accelerate our progress, and communication will notify the world of our existence. So if you think what we're trying to do is interesting, make some noise! Tell your friends! and contribute if you believe we're worth it!

Succeed or fail, we will always find ways to thank contributors, far after this campaign ends. If the goal isn't reached, whatever funds we do raise will all go towards creating higher quality media. We recognize that GOTY's goals are ambitious, and we've all prepared for the long haul

column6: > started six months ago as an experiment and now it's becoming a fun old-style adventure game with an intriguing background story. It's written entirely in HTML and Javascript so you can play it directly from your browser without Flash player or any other plugin or installation.

column1: The game is set in late Victorian Age and tell the story of some ""celebrities of the time"" in the background of a espionage war between French and British empires. You will meet and use people like Winston Churchill, Wright Brothers, Guglielmo Marconi,....characters who at the dawn of the twentieth century have changed the world.

column1: May God save the Queen!
","UPDATE: new version of the game published!
- demo episode 2- new game interface (right-click killed)- new soundtracks- help option to highlight hotspots- revision translation of episode 1- some minor bugs fixed
About

1899 Steam & Spirit started six months ago as an experiment and now it's becoming a fun old-style adventure game with an intriguing background story. It's written entirely in HTML and Javascript so you can play it directly from your browser without Flash player or any other plugin or installation.

The game is set in late Victorian Age and tell the story of some ""celebrities of the time"" in the background of a espionage war between French and British empires. You will meet and use people like Winston Churchill, Wright Brothers, Guglielmo Marconi,....characters who at the dawn of the twentieth century have changed the world.Play It

You can already play the first episode in which you will guide a young Winston Churchill through meanders of Leviathan, a steampunk submarine born from the mind of Lord Kelvin. Just go to www.moloc.net to play it.Future

We are working on the second episode and we will publish soon a demo. Thank you to your support we hope to expand game framework, publish new episodes, create mobile devices porting and, last but not least, remain free.
May God save the Queen!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Turin, Italy",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/1899-steam-spirit/pica

Some clarification on Blue Beam / Eclaircissement au sujet de Blue Beam.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Eng:

Thank you all for your support Project Blue Beam.

Some clarification on Blue Beam.

The enemy AI is advanced and make the decision themselves, they are distributed in category 3, patrol, hunting and guard.

They do not all have the same behavior you face, the average female will be frightened as some timid male but keep still less distance.

While males or females will be dominant on the contrary, very angry or furious rage against you.

Not to mention the army of the new order, which will be in outposts, spanking reconnaissance patrols by helicopter or ground reduced number kept an eye on the convoys and to find the fugitives.

But bipedal creatures will be the last of your worry do djiins (spirits), because they are beings that you will be able to fight with weapons equipment ...

I will also do my best to integrated as soon as a little craft with management of food and water, there already in some wells on the map but the heal management is not yet extensive, therefore the when she goes alone.

Enemy of the game will be diverse strength and resistance, and every living species and live in their own areas, creatures are also Enemy militia, however it is not impossible to cross some who would wander like you...

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fr:

Merci à tous pour votre soutien au projet Blue Beam.

quelques éclaircissement au sujet de Blue Beam.

L'IA des ennemies est avancé, ils prennent les décisions de eux même, ils sont repartis dan 3 catégories, la patrouille, la chasse et la garde.

Ils n'aurons pas tous les mêmes comportement face à vous, la moyenne des femelles des groupes seront effrayée de même que certains mâle craintif mais, ce tiendrons quand même moins à distance.

Alors que les mâles ou femelles dominante seront au contraire, très en colère ou furieux de rage contre vous.

Sans oublier l'armée du nouvel ordre, qui sera dans des avants postes, fessant des patrouilles de reconnaissance en hélico ou au sol en nombre réduite pour gardé un œil sur les convoies et pour retrouver les fugitifs.

Mais les créatures bipède seront le dernier de vos souci fasse aux djiins (esprits), car ce sont des êtres que vous ne pourrai battre avec des armes matériel...

Je vais également faire de mon possible pour incorporai au plus vite un peu de craft avec gestion de nourriture et d'eau, il y à déjà quelques puits sur la carte mais la gestion de la santé n'est pas encore approfondie, donc pour le moment elle remonte toute seule.

Les ennemies du jeu seront de diverse force et résistance, et chaque espèces vie et habite dans sa propre zones, les créatures sont aussi les ennemie de la milice, cependant il n'est pas impossible d'en croisé certain qui ce promèneront comme vous.


Thank you all!

Merci à tous!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Help us dispelled the beam.

You are tired of the same scenery over and over again? The same zombies ..? B_B is for you, read this:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story :

You are tired of having again and again the same landscape? The same zombies ..? B_B is for you, read this:

Blue Beam is a FPS survival horror apocalyptic whose history is initially based in middle east with jinns (ghost / anomalies) and bipedal creatures. You will have the militia of the new order to avoid the day and night, this in addition to surrounding creatures output once this fall.

Are gameplay is a mixture between survival to climate and environmental conditions in a place where food and water are the consumable commodity rare, accompanied by action to face armed groups and creatures of all kinds.
But there will also infiltration, according to you and depending on the circumstances eg military bases / patrols of the day or night / hordes of creatures or sudden onset of anomalies etc..


The history of this BB is in the near future, the crisis and the bankruptcy of the modern world causing the war, and with it the end of all the nations ... The climate change, ocean pollution and the disappearance of bees bring to humanity a famine ever known so far, it will hit all the living species.

The end of our civilization for a new order built around a private company that will know.
At first, the order will simply there to help in their reconstruction and redevelopment of a dying system. It will be equipped with the latest resources including water and food, but can after his rise to power.

It will try to make a massive repatriation of survivors, claiming to seek their common property. to establish in areas protected called ""rehabilitation camps"" or bunkers for some reweaving the new laws.

He climbs a benefit with the support of almost all populations, the blindness of people who become more docile as surely, haunted by despair and their living conditions.


Thus, in this scenario science fiction you play as one of the few survivors trying to escape this new order, despite him this find to escape this new civilization.
But this will get him to know and understand Human is not the only responssable creature, and on earth and live among them and other intelligent creatures ... After leaving the middle east, you will bring the source of evil (island).

column1: <div>
-Help us meet these objectives :

-
500€ :  More grounds and objects.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1000€ : Adventure (storyline more details and directed).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1500€ : Pre-Alpha before 2015. (October, November)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2000€ : More effects in game and Beta available in the beginning of 2015.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2500€ : Co-Op Online.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you!

-The Blue Beam Team.

------------------------------

French/Français : 

Vous êtes fatigué d'avoir encore et encore le même paysage? Les mêmes zombies ..? B_B est pour vous, lisez ceci :

Bleu Beam sera un FPS survival horror apocalyptique dont l'histoire est dans un premier temps, basée au proche orient avec des djinns (fantôme/anomalie) et des créatures bipède. Vous aurez la milice du nouvel ordre à éviter le jour, ainsi que la nuit, ceci en plus des créatures environnante sortie une fois celle-ci tomber.

Sont gameplay sera un mélange entre la survie face aux conditions climatiques et environnemental dans un lieu où la nourriture ainsi que l'eau consommable sont denrée rares, le tout accompagné par de l'action face aux groupes armé et aux créatures en tout genre.
Mais il y aura également de l'infiltration, selon vous et selon les circonstances ex : bases militaires/ patrouilles du jour ou de nuit/ hordes de créatures ou encore apparition soudaine d'anomalies etc.

L'histoire de B.B ce situe dans un futur proche, la crise ainsi que la faillite du monde moderne engendrant la guerre, et avec elle la fin de toutes les nations... Le dérèglement climatique, la pollution des océans ainsi que la disparitions des abeilles amèneront à l’humanité entière une famine jamais connue jusqu'ici, celle-ci frappera toute les espèces vivante.

La fin de nôtre civilisations pendant qu'un nouvel ordre constitué autour de société privée ce fera connaitre.
Dans un premier temps, l'ordre sera simplement là selon eux pour aider à la reconstruction et au réaménagement d'un système à l'agonie. Il sera muni des derniers ressources dont l'eau et la nourriture, mais peut de temps après sa monter au pouvoir.

Une ascensions qu'il bénéficiera avec l’appuie de la quasi totalité des populations, du à l'aveuglement des gens qui deviendrons plus que surement docile, hanté par le désespoirs et leurs conditions de vie.
Celui-ci tentera de faire un rapatriement massifs des rescapés, en prétextant de chercher leurs biens commun. pour les établir dans des zones protéger nommées ""camps de réinsertion"" ou des bunkers pour les quelques retissant aux nouvelles lois.

Ainsi dans ce scénario de science fiction vous y incarnerez un des rares survivants tentant de fuir ce nouvel ordre, qui malgré lui ce retrouvera à fuir cette nouvelle civilisation.
Mais ceci va l'amener à savoir et comprendre que l'homme n'est pas la seule créature responsable, et que sur terre et parmi eux vivent d'autres  créatures intelligente et pensante... Après avoir quitter le moyen orient, vous serez amenez aux source du mal (île).


-Monde ouvert

-Cycle jours/nuits

-PVE (avec de la coop si le succès est au rendez-vous)

-Plusieurs types d'énnemis : créatures biped, anomalies (djinns) et milice.

-destruction des batiments et du décorts.

-Oculus ready

-Gestion de la vie avec la nourriture et l'eau.-Advanced AI

-High precision hit box and ragdoll/Haute précision de la hit box et du ragdoll

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Aidez nous à atteindre ces objectifs :
-
500€ : Plus de terrains ouvert et d'objets.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1000€ : Aventure (trame scenaristique plus detaillée et fournis).
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1500€ : Sortie de la Pre-Alpha avant 2015.(Octobre-Novembre)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2000€ : Plus d'effets graphique et sortie de la Beta débuts 2015.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2500€: Co-Op en ligne.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Merci!

-La Team Blue Beam.

------------------------------

-Configuration requise :

column17: >The ""I Want My Nerd HQ"" Campaign is very simple. We need your support for Nerd HQ 2014. The funding strategy we have been using to produce Nerd HQ is no longer viable due to venue deadlines and the commitments required by the Nerd Machine to properly plan the event. We wish we could continue to subsidize the event ourselves, but we simply no longer can. We believe in our hearts that
column19: > will help to ensure Nerd HQ can continue to offer an amazing
column21: > experience for fans in San Diego, fans watching online, and all the children we are able to help through the funds you contribute during Nerd HQ for
column23: >. To date, the Nerd Machine has raised over $415,000 dollars for the charity.
column24:
>You have a powerful voice and the Nerd Machine needs you to use that voice and let the world know you support this campaign, whether you can contribute or not.  We love and appreciate you either way. We believe that everyone is nerdy about something, so please tweet, post, reddit, and email to get the word out and help us produce the greatest Nerd HQ ever.

Please note that Nerd HQ is not affiliated with San Diego Comic Con International. Nerd HQ is planning to held at Petco Park at the same time as the convention.
column25:
>

This part is very important. We want to make it very clear that the money you are contributing for Nerd HQ is not going to charity. The funds raised here will pay for the production of Nerd HQ in San Diego this July. 100% of the money raised by the ""Conversations,"" auction items, photos, and signings will continue to be donated to Operation Smile. In 2013, Nerd HQ raised $215,000 for the charity.


Matt Smith, Zac Levi, and Richard Madden at Nerd HQ 2013
column26: >Production costs include venue, staging, production crew, event lighting, video, audio, staff, security, and activations. These costs are very expensive and every dollar you donate will make a difference. It is up to
column29: > help us make HQ happen. We will continue the search for sponsors in order to make the event the most amazing HQ ever and bring you, the fans, the most dynamic ""Conversations"" and the newest in gaming and technology. Not to mention the most epic nights Nerd HQ has ever seen.
column31: >Nerd HQ, the best perk we can offer.
column32: >We understand that a lack of a perk structure is a rarity, if not a brand new concept, for a crowd funding campaign. However, we believe, and hope you do too, that Nerd HQ itself is the best reward we can offer. Nerd HQ brings you twenty-five plus hours of ""Conversation for a Cause"" content, live-streamed to everyone, FOR FREE, no matter where you are in the world (some restrictions may apply based on country.) The physical event in San Diego is COMPLETELY FREE for everyone to enter and enjoy. AND, we throw the most epic dance parties for both fans and celebs, again, TOTALLY FREE. In fact, the only things that cost you money at Nerd HQ, aside from all the charitable activations, is Nerd Machine merchandise and the food &
column33: beverage that you may buy while enjoying the festivities.
column35: >On top of that, perks cost a great deal of money, time, and labor to produce and fulfill. If we offer perks like tee shirts, posters, or even special access at Nerd HQ, then we have to ask for even more funding from you to cover those costs. No physical perks means we can put all the money raised toward making the best Nerd HQ to date, and bringing it to you FOR...wait for it…FREE!
column36: >What we CAN offer you is your NAME on the ""Nerd HQ Wall of Honor,"" that will be on display at Petco Park. This wall will be used to commemorate your victory of making HQ a reality. Each and every contributor will have their name printed on this wall. We will also place your names on the Nerd HQ contributors page at thenerdmachine.com for everyone to see. No hierarchy, nothing based on your contribution. If you give $5, your name could be next to someone who gives $500. We are all in this together.
column37: >Most importantly, for your contribution, you will receive our eternal gratitude, loyalty and our pledge to bring you the best Nerd HQ ever!
column41: > the day at Nerd HQ 2013
column42: >For those who have experienced our event, you know how amazing
column43: > Nerd HQ is. For those of you that have not, we simply ask that you go to our
column45: > page and watch a few ""Conversations."" We believe these amazingly unique and inspiring panels will give you all the reason you need to support our cause.
column46:
>

Here are a few examples…
column51: schema=youtube"" width=""580"">Highlights of the Tom Hiddleston Conversation at Nerd HQ
column57:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">Highlights of the ""DOCTOR WHO"" Conversation at Nerd HQ 2013

Why is Nerd HQ important?
column58:
>The Nerd Machine's Nerd HQ is important to us because we know it is important to YOU. It is an event for YOU, by YOU. Fans make Nerd HQ what it is and they always will, this year more than any other. YOU are the heart and soul of everything we do. Since 2011, we have done everything we could to provide the most amazing and unique fan experience outside of the convention center. Attendees always say that Nerd HQ is one of their best memories ever and we want to create more of those memories with you. There are so many opportunities to meet new friends, connect with old ones, and have a personal interaction with the biggest celebrities in Hollywood. Fans around the world get the chance to watch amazing panels online that are only available from Nerd HQ. Hundreds of thousands of dollars are raised for the charity we support, Operation Smile. Fans worldwide are able to experience Nerd HQ through tweets and posts by Zac and the Nerd Machine as well as the thousands of fans and celebs in attendance. All of this ONLY continues with YOUR SUPPORT!

Party time at Nerd HQ

Gaming at Nerd HQ

with celebrities, and the very popular “Conversations for a Cause” panel
series, which to date has helped raise over

Fans and celebs in the Nerd HQ Photo Booth
column5: >Panels consisted of the most talked about

column1: films and television shows including “Sherlock,” “Hannibal,” “Orphan Black,”
“Doctor Who,” “Robot Chicken,” “300: Rise of An Empire,” “Kick-Ass 2,” “The Maze
Runner,” “Riddick,” and “Supernatural,” to name just a few. Each panel is
packed with curious and excited fans asking meaningful questions, anxious to
learn more about their favorite films and shows.
column4: >Shots from the ""Conversations"" at Nerd HQ 2013

Dylan O'Brien during ""The Maze Runner"" Conversation at Nerd HQ 2013

Nerd HQ 2013 highlights also included Tom

column1: Hiddleston’s impression of a velociraptor, “Doctor Who” actor Matt Smith and
Jenna Coleman jumping on stage to surprise “Game of Thrones” star Richard
Madden during his panel, and Stan Lee dropping by to take photos with fans at
one of our awesome photo booths. The excitement continued with Nerd HQ’s
energetic and fun-filled after-parties for fans and celebrities alike. A
Thursday Night Fan Party gave everyone the opportunity to mingle, play games, and
dance the night away with all of the nerds in town, all for FREE.
The festivities continued on Friday, when Nerd HQ hosted the hottest party of the weekend: The NERD Party. Saturday night included the amazing screening of ""SERENITY"" on the field of Petco Park.
column3:
/>""SERENITY"" screening at Nerd HQ 2013

Can't contribute but still want to help? Here's how...

We believe the power YOU hold isn't just in your wallets, but in your voice as well. YOU have the ability to make this happen by sharing our collective mission.

column1: • Share the campaign url, http://www.IWantMyNerdHQ.com

• Tweet your support on Twitter, post your support on Facebook, use Instagram, Google Plus, Reddit, Carrier pigeon, and/or Pony Express and then call your grandparents to let them know we need their help too.
• Follow @zacharylevi and @thenerdmachine for updates.
• Always use the #IWantMyNerdHQ hashtag in your tweets to create awareness and to generate buzz around the campaign.
• Tell your friends and find others who want to get involved and join the cause.
• Get the twibbon for your social media avatars to show your support for the ""I Want My Nerd HQ"" campaign at http://twb.ly/1gd4DvF
• Use all the sharing options Indiegogo has to offer. Let's make history together.

column6:
>About Zac Levi and the Nerd Machine

Zachary Levi-Founder of the Nerd Machine and Nerd HQ

Zachary Levi is best known for the title role on NBC’s hit show “Chuck.”  He portrayed a regular guy whose life gets scrambled

column1: when government secrets are inadvertently downloaded into his brain while
reading an email sent from a long lost friend. ""Chuck"" has been a
media and fan favorite since its fall 2007 release and continues its worldwide popularity

even after the series finale. 

Zachary Levi as Chuck

Fans were thrilled to see Levi in the
2013 follow-up to Marvel's previous hit “Thor.”  Levi steps into the role of <b>“Fandral the

Dashing” in fan favorite “Thor: The Dark World.” 

Zac as Fandral in Thor:The Dark World

Zac is also the founder of the Nerd Machine and the creator of Nerd HQ. Zac's goal was to create the most amazing fan/celebrity interaction ever at an event. He believes that YOU want a forum to speak directly to your favorite artists and be able to have an unique and intimate connection like none you have ever experienced. That goal has been reached and then surpassed. Nerd HQ is now the most popular event outside the convention center and that is all because of YOU.


The Nerd Machine is spearheading a ""mission of redefinition""
that changes the global perception of what a NERD is, and thereby allowing everyone to celebrate the NERD in themselves. The question is: What are you nerdy about?
column6:
>Supporting Nerd HQ helps support Operation Smile.

The Nerd Machine's Nerd HQ is a global experience. Not only because of the content created during the event, but the lives we are able to change around the world with the funds raised at Nerd HQ each year.

Zac has been an ambassador for Operation Smile for several years and he has seen first hand what a difference they make in lives all over the world. With the help of amazing people like YOU, he and the Nerd Machine have raised over $415,000 for the charity. That is almost 1,700 lives that have been changed forever by your support of Zac, Nerd HQ, and the Nerd Machine. 

Again, we want to make it very clear that the money you are contributing for Nerd HQ is not going to charity. The funds raised here will pay for the production of Nerd HQ in San Diego this July. As always, One Hundred Percent (100%) of the money raised by panels, auction items, photos, and signings will continue to be donated to Operation Smile. 

Joss Whedon, Zachary Levi, and Nathan Fillion at Nerd HQ 2013


The charity we love and support, 

Operation Smile
column8:
/>Go to www.OperationSmile.org for more info about Operation Smile


Help us Obi Wan Kenobi(s), you're our only hope…

(Disclaimer: Nerd HQ is not affiliated with San Diego Comic Con International. The event is scheduled to be held at the same time as SDCC at Petco Park in San Diego.)


Frequently Asked Questions

column1: 1.  What, when, and where is
Nerd HQ?
Nerd HQ is a FREE, four day event held the same weekend as San Diego
Comic Con and offers exclusive gaming and tech activations, nightly events,
and intimate celebrity panels benefiting Operation Smile. The event is scheduled to be held July 24-27, 2014 at Petco Park in San Diego, California.
2.  Do I get anything for my
contribution?
All
contributors will be part of the #NerdHQArmy, an exclusive email list that will
receive updates, photos, videos and much more throughout our event planning
process that can't be found anywhere else. Your name will also be placed on our
""Nerd HQ Wall of Honor"" at the event and on our contributor page on
www.thenerdmachine.com. But most importantly, for your contribution, you will
receive our eternal gratitude, loyalty and our pledge to bring you the best
Nerd HQ ever!
Furthermore,
Nerd HQ brings you
twenty-five plus hours of ""Conversation for a Cause"" content,
live-streamed to everyone, FOR FREE, no matter where you are in the world
(some restrictions may apply based on country.)
Go to www.youtube.com/nerdmachinetv for examples of our “Conversations.”
3.  What will the funds raised
by the Indiegogo campaign go towards at Nerd HQ?
Every dollar you give will go towards the production of
the event. The venue fees, staging, audio, video, production crew, event
lighting, staff, security, and activations are very expensive and every dollar
you donate will make a difference. It is up to YOU to help us make HQ happen.
4.  Does this money directly
support Operation Smile?
The contribution you are making here does not go to Operation Smile. It
enables Zac and the Nerd Machine to produce Nerd HQ and continue to raise money
for Operation Smile. Each year, we raise more money for the charity, and with
your help, we know that we can do so for years to come.
5.  Why should I participate if
I’m not going to attend Nerd HQ?
Great Question. Nerd HQ offers twenty-five plus hours of
Conversation for a Cause"" content, live-streamed to
everyone, FOR FREE, no matter where you are in the world (some
restrictions may apply based on country.)
Plus,
all contributors will be part of the #NerdHQArmy, an exclusive email list that
will receive updates, photos, videos and much more throughout our event
planning process that can't be found anywhere else. Your name will also be
placed on our ""Nerd HQ Wall of Honor"" at the event and on our
contributor page on www.thenerdmachine.com But most importantly, for your
contribution, you will receive our eternal gratitude, loyalty and our pledge to
bring you the best Nerd HQ ever!
6.  Will I be able to
participate in the campaign if I live outside of the United States?
Yes! Indiegogo allows people from all over the world to contribute by
using a credit card or Paypal. If you participate, you will also receive all the
contributor benefits as a member of the Nerd HQ Army.
7.  If I donate to Nerd HQ can
I meet Zachary Levi in person? What if I want an autograph picture or a photo?
If you come to Nerd HQ, there is a great chance you will be able
to meet Zac. Nerd HQ offers many opportunities to interact with him, such as the “Smiles
for Smiles” and “Signings for Smiles” activations benefiting Operation Smile.
8.  What happens to my money if
you don’t reach your goal?
We believe with your help, the “I Want My Nerd HQ” campaign will be a success and reach the goal of $1,000,000 dollars. In the unlikely
event we do not reach our goal, Zac and the Nerd Machine will evaluate if the
event can still be produced with the money contributed, supplemented by sponsor
participation. If the event moves forward, your contributions will be used to create
the greatest Nerd HQ ever. If the funds raised are insufficient to produce Nerd
HQ, your money will be refunded minus the Indiegogo and Paypal fees.
9.  I don’t have any money
right now, how long do I have to contribute?
Thanks for checking out the page. The campaign will run for
45 days, until April 24, 2014. In the event that you can not give, please share
the campaign with everyone you know so that your voice is still heard.
10.  Is my donation tax
deductible?
Your donation is not tax deductible. We want to reiterate that
this is not a charitable donation, but a contribution to help produce Nerd HQ.
We are not a charity, but 100% of the panel fees, auction items, photos,
signings, and screenings at Nerd HQ benefit Operation Smile.

11.  Don't most campaigns offer perks for a contribution?

Usually, yes. But as Zac says in the video, Nerd HQ is the best perk we can offer. It's an amazing, free event that fans all over the world can enjoy. The ""Conversations"" are streamed live worldwide, for free. The event is open to everyone, for free. The gaming and tech activations are free. And by funding Nerd HQ you enable Zac and the Nerd Machine to continue their support of Operation Smile. Also, perks like tee shirts, posters, and special access to Nerd HQ cost time, money, and labor to fulfill. Our goal would have to be several hundred thousand dollars higher to provide these items and that would take away time and resources from planning the greatest Nerd HQ ever. 


","What is Nerd HQ?Here's how the campaign works.The ""I Want My Nerd HQ"" Campaign is very simple. We need your support for Nerd HQ 2014. The funding strategy we have been using to produce Nerd HQ is no longer viable due to venue deadlines and the commitments required by the Nerd Machine to properly plan the event. We wish we could continue to subsidize the event ourselves, but we simply no longer can. We believe in our hearts that YOU will help to ensure Nerd HQ can continue to offer an amazing FREE experience for fans in San Diego, fans watching online, and all the children we are able to help through the funds you contribute during Nerd HQ for Operation Smile. To date, the Nerd Machine has raised over $415,000 dollars for the charity. You have a powerful voice and the Nerd Machine needs you to use that voice and let the world know you support this campaign, whether you can contribute or not.  We love and appreciate you either way. We believe that everyone is nerdy about something, so please tweet, post, reddit, and email to get the word out and help us produce the greatest Nerd HQ ever.Please note that Nerd HQ is not affiliated with San Diego Comic Con International. Nerd HQ is planning to held at Petco Park at the same time as the convention. This part is very important. We want to make it very clear that the money you are contributing for Nerd HQ is not going to charity. The funds raised here will pay for the production of Nerd HQ in San Diego this July. 100% of the money raised by the ""Conversations,"" auction items, photos, and signings will continue to be donated to Operation Smile. In 2013, Nerd HQ raised $215,000 for the charity.Matt Smith, Zac Levi, and Richard Madden at Nerd HQ 2013Production costs include venue, staging, production crew, event lighting, video, audio, staff, security, and activations. These costs are very expensive and every dollar you donate will make a difference. It is up to YOU, to help us make HQ happen. We will continue the search for sponsors in order to make the event the most amazing HQ ever and bring you, the fans, the most dynamic ""Conversations"" and the newest in gaming and technology. Not to mention the most epic nights Nerd HQ has ever seen.Nerd HQ, the best perk we can offer.We understand that a lack of a perk structure is a rarity, if not a brand new concept, for a crowd funding campaign. However, we believe, and hope you do too, that Nerd HQ itself is the best reward we can offer. Nerd HQ brings you twenty-five plus hours of ""Conversation for a Cause"" content, live-streamed to everyone, FOR FREE, no matter where you are in the world (some restrictions may apply based on country.) The physical event in San Diego is COMPLETELY FREE for everyone to enter and enjoy. AND, we throw the most epic dance parties for both fans and celebs, again, TOTALLY FREE. In fact, the only things that cost you money at Nerd HQ, aside from all the charitable activations, is Nerd Machine merchandise and the food & beverage that you may buy while enjoying the festivities.On top of that, perks cost a great deal of money, time, and labor to produce and fulfill. If we offer perks like tee shirts, posters, or even special access at Nerd HQ, then we have to ask for even more funding from you to cover those costs. No physical perks means we can put all the money raised toward making the best Nerd HQ to date, and bringing it to you FOR...wait for it…FREE!What we CAN offer you is your NAME on the ""Nerd HQ Wall of Honor,"" that will be on display at Petco Park. This wall will be used to commemorate your victory of making HQ a reality. Each and every contributor will have their name printed on this wall. We will also place your names on the Nerd HQ contributors page at thenerdmachine.com for everyone to see. No hierarchy, nothing based on your contribution. If you give $5, your name could be next to someone who gives $500. We are all in this together.Most importantly, for your contribution, you will receive our eternal gratitude, loyalty and our pledge to bring you the best Nerd HQ ever! Fans enjoying the day at Nerd HQ 2013For those who have experienced our event, you know how amazing Nerd HQ is. For those of you that have not, we simply ask that you go to our YouTube page and watch a few ""Conversations."" We believe these amazingly unique and inspiring panels will give you all the reason you need to support our cause. Here are a few examples…Highlights of the Tom Hiddleston Conversation at Nerd HQHighlights of the ""DOCTOR WHO"" Conversation at Nerd HQ 2013Why is Nerd HQ important?The Nerd Machine's Nerd HQ is important to us because we know it is important to YOU. It is an event for YOU, by YOU. Fans make Nerd HQ what it is and they always will, this year more than any other. YOU are the heart and soul of everything we do. Since 2011, we have done everything we could to provide the most amazing and unique fan experience outside of the convention center. Attendees always say that Nerd HQ is one of their best memories ever and we want to create more of those memories with you. There are so many opportunities to meet new friends, connect with old ones, and have a personal interaction with the biggest celebrities in Hollywood. Fans around the world get the chance to watch amazing panels online that are only available from Nerd HQ. Hundreds of thousands of dollars are raised for the charity we support, Operation Smile. Fans worldwide are able to experience Nerd HQ through tweets and posts by Zac and the Nerd Machine as well as the thousands of fans and celebs in attendance. All of this ONLY continues with YOUR SUPPORT!Party time at Nerd HQGaming at Nerd HQHighlights from Nerd HQ 2013Nerd HQ 2013 showcased cutting
edge technology and gaming demos, exclusive parties, autograph signings, photo opportunities
with celebrities, and the very popular “Conversations for a Cause” panel
series, which to date has helped raise over $415K for Operation Smile. Fans and celebs in the Nerd HQ Photo BoothPanels consisted of the most talked about
films and television shows including “Sherlock,” “Hannibal,” “Orphan Black,”
“Doctor Who,” “Robot Chicken,” “300: Rise of An Empire,” “Kick-Ass 2,” “The Maze
Runner,” “Riddick,” and “Supernatural,” to name just a few. Each panel is
packed with curious and excited fans asking meaningful questions, anxious to

learn more about their favorite films and shows. Shots from the ""Conversations"" at Nerd HQ 2013Dylan O'Brien during ""The Maze Runner"" Conversation at Nerd HQ 2013Nerd HQ 2013 highlights also included Tom
Hiddleston’s impression of a velociraptor, “Doctor Who” actor Matt Smith and
Jenna Coleman jumping on stage to surprise “Game of Thrones” star Richard
Madden during his panel, and Stan Lee dropping by to take photos with fans at
one of our awesome photo booths. The excitement continued with Nerd HQ’s
energetic and fun-filled after-parties for fans and celebrities alike. A
Thursday Night Fan Party gave everyone the opportunity to mingle, play games, and
dance the night away with all of the nerds in town, all for FREE.

The festivities continued on Friday, when Nerd HQ hosted the hottest party of the weekend: The NERD Party. Saturday night included the amazing screening of ""SERENITY"" on the field of Petco Park. ""SERENITY"" screening at Nerd HQ 2013Can't contribute but still want to help? Here's how...We believe the power YOU hold isn't just in your wallets, but in your voice as well. YOU have the ability to make this happen by sharing our collective mission.
Share the campaign url, http://www.IWantMyNerdHQ.com

Tweet your support on Twitter, post your support on Facebook, use Instagram, Google Plus, Reddit, Carrier pigeon, and/or Pony Express and then call your grandparents to let them know we need their help too.
Follow @zacharylevi and @thenerdmachine for updates.
Always use the #IWantMyNerdHQ hashtag in your tweets to create awareness and to generate buzz around the campaign.
Tell your friends and find others who want to get involved and join the cause.
Get the twibbon for your social media avatars to show your support for the ""I Want My Nerd HQ"" campaign at http://twb.ly/1gd4DvF
Use all the sharing options Indiegogo has to offer. Let's make history together.

Update (December 21, 2014): just wanted to make an update that the project is under heavy development at the moment. Sorry for a delay but it was inevitable since only 6% of the goal was reached. Thank you for your understanding!
column2:
>




Have you ever wanted to make your own role-playing game?

Did you feel limited by other game makers which require coding, additional software, work on limited platforms or do not offer multiplayer mode?

Heraldon solves all this by providing a game editor which is accessible for everyone and powerful yet easy-to-use.



Online platform where anyone can create, share &
column3: play browser-based 2D multiplayer role-playing games on any device with a web browser. No coding skills needed!
column4: >Works on any browser: desktop computers, tablets, smartphones, other mobile devices, or even a black &amp
column5: white Kindle!
column7: >Touch-friendly navigation on a grid map. Resized or text map versions for a smaller screen devices.
column8:
/>
Participate in live battles or other events!


We believe that communication is the key gameplay element - chat with your friends or enemies, find raiding partners, etc. Be social!


Yes, you've heard it right! Easy-to-use drag &
column9:
drop interface with adjustable parameters and clear step-by-step instructions. More information will be unclosed soon!

So ultimately Heraldon will allow you to create your own MMORPG game and publish it online for your friends &
column10:
the whole world. Revenue opportunities are being researched as well!

We are currently preparing our blog posts to reveal Heraldon development process, and provide more details on any questions you have.
column11: >Please stay tuned by subscribing to our
column13: target=""_blank"">Heraldon Newsletter or follow us on our Facebook page
column15:
>Thank you!


We offer many amazing rewards to help motivate you to contribute! 50% or higher discounts and authentic collector items.

If there is any other perk you would prefer, please contact us to discuss - we are open for any opportunities.

Check our current rewards on the right and pledge to get the following:

","Update (December 21, 2014): just wanted to make an update that the project is under heavy development at the moment. Sorry for a delay but it was inevitable since only 6% of the goal was reached. Thank you for your understanding!Have you ever wanted to make your own role-playing game?Did you feel limited by other game makers which require coding, additional software, work on limited platforms or do not offer multiplayer mode?Heraldon solves all this by providing a game editor which is accessible for everyone and powerful yet easy-to-use.Online platform where anyone can create, share & play browser-based 2D multiplayer role-playing games on any device with a web browser. No coding skills needed!Works on any browser: desktop computers, tablets, smartphones, other mobile devices, or even a black & white Kindle!Touch-friendly navigation on a grid map. Resized or text map versions for a smaller screen devices.Participate in live battles or other events!We believe that communication is the key gameplay element - chat with your friends or enemies, find raiding partners, etc. Be social!Yes, you've heard it right! Easy-to-use drag & drop interface with adjustable parameters and clear step-by-step instructions. More information will be unclosed soon!So ultimately Heraldon will allow you to create your own MMORPG game and publish it online for your friends & the whole world. Revenue opportunities are being researched as well!We are currently preparing our blog posts to reveal Heraldon development process, and provide more details on any questions you have.Please stay tuned by subscribing to our Heraldon Newsletter or follow us on our Facebook page.Thank you!We offer many amazing rewards to help motivate you to contribute! 50% or higher discounts and authentic collector items.If there is any other perk you would prefer, please contact us to discuss - we are open for any opportunities.Check our current rewards on the right and pledge to get the following:

column1: Hall of FameYour name on Heraldon website.
Beta Player AccessEarly private Beta account with access to private players discussions.
Beta Developer AccessEarly private Beta account with access to private developers discussions.
Heraldon StarsUsed for premium in-games features, extensions of developer memberships, and as a virtual platform's currency.
Bronze / Silver / Gold Backer badgesDisplayed on your Heraldon account. Special for backers only!
GOLD Developer MembershipAllows to make a public game using our pre-made templates. Recurring monthly payment needed to continue.

A considerable amount of time and money has already been invested to create nearly half of the initial platform.However, we need a final push from the community which would raise it yet to another level!The budget excluding the taxes & Indiegogo fees will be used for the following:
Game design (35%)
Fast world-wide game servers (15%)
Necessary back-end game development (50%)

In case we succeed reaching our funding goal, stretch goals will be unlocked and all backers will decide what it is: a new concept game graphic, iOS / Android apps, or something even more exciting.We have AMAZING global community which trusts in us and is waiting for Heraldon! Around 100 fan photos & videos were received already.Please HELP make it happen for everyone by sharing the campaign using social buttons above, and spreading the buzz! Every little helps!Sincerely THANK YOU for supporting the dream!

The main person behind Heraldon is Giedrius Gliozeris, CEO & Founder of Wapdream, who has been developing social browser-based games for 10 years.There are more people helping out with a platform development but they will remain disclosed.

- What is the best way to contact you?If you have any questions, please just send us an E-mail to hello@heraldon.com- Will it be available in other languages?Yes as we plan to translate the platform into as many languages as possible (requests are welcome!).- Will it be possible to earn revenue from my game?Most likely - we are currently exploring all possible payment opportunities. More details will be announced.- Who owns the game I make?The content belongs only to YOU - Heraldon just hosts the game for you.- Will I have to pay monthly for a developer membership?Yes but you may cancel anytime and your game will be safely archived then. Virtual platform's currency can be used for extension as well.- What device do I need to develop a game?ANY device with an internet browser can be used both for playing, and making of the games.- How much will it cost to play?It will always be FREE to play games on Heraldon. Even a trial developer membership will be offered for FREE! Freemium games model will offer optional premium services. - What will happen if the funding goal is not reached?Nothing will stop me from finishing Heraldon but it might take more time, have a poorer design, slower game servers and a less powerful game engine. Help to avoid this!",15.0,0,"1 Campaign

Summary...
Hi, my name is Keith Anderson, Game Developer and Creator of Numinis Online.

Numinis Online is a Fantasy Based FPS game, inspired by a passion for fantasy action, and the desire to feel quick accomplishments and progression.  Numinis has been in development for a little under 2 years now, and with the help of my great friend and phenomenal programmer Jonathan Hockman, we were able to accomplish a great deal of development during this time period.

Though Numinis was originally slated to be in beta by the end of 2012.  We were unable to keep the pace, due to real life scenarios.  Fortunately, our families support has been tremendous,  and we were able to keep the development alive by meeting up before and after work, and in between daily activities.

We have turned to the popular crowd-funding, because we are nearing completion of the game, and we still have some financial requirements to fulfill. We have been able to scrape up enough “out of pocket” funds to get us this far, but we aren’t there yet.  We still need to acquire specific licenses, servers and minor hardware / software components to see this project to completion.
Jonathan and I are “true” indie developers. We want to avoid knocking on large corporate doors, instead, we are asking people who really make all this happen.  The community! People just like you!
We hope that you become a supporter of Numinis Online.
The Impact...

We honestly didnt know that Game Development would be our ultimate destination.  Between us, we have 4 college degrees, and have probably held at least 50 different titles within the job market. From military to retail, and law enforcement to photography... we finally hit home with a passion for game development.  Its a unique story and a long road as to how we met and finally began developing, but neither of us will deny that it has been difficult.  However, we can honestly and faithfully say that it is a welcomed choice!

Our ultimate goal is to bring the game development industry to the local area of Kansas City. With successful funding, we will have a successful game! With a successful game, we will lead a successful company. With a successful company, we will create jobs, having successful, talented and creative teams, delivering unique games to the world!
<div>
What we are asking for...

Funding Numinis Online will be, “a dream come true” for us.  We will have the capability to properly complete this project.  We are seeking $2500 from the community.  Achievement of this goal will allow us to purchase the necessary license required to complete the project in its entirety.  In addition, we will be able to increase our server capacity and bandwidth in preparation of beta, leading us into, the “Launch”.
Your contribution will be rewarded with the following perks:
Supporter:  As a supporter, you will receive guaranteed beta access (when the game becomes available for beta) and a copy of the game at release!

Gamer:  A Gamer will receive an additional copy of the game to do with it as you please, and earn 1000 ability points to spend on your characters unlock-able abilities.  Also gain an in-game special ability earned by the achievement title ""Gamer"". Plus receive the Subsequent perk Supporter.

Game Master:  The Game Master is included on the in game credits screen under the “Special Thanks” section. Also gain the in game achievement title “Member”, which unlocks a special ability that only a Game Master will have access to. Plus receive the Subsequent perk Supporter and Gamer.

Adviser:  Gain alpha development access and testing with the dev's to give on the spot input and feedback before we take it to beta! You will be able to help the direction of the game and its later development. Additionally, you will gain the achievement ""Adviser"" which will unlock a unique special weapon and award you with 5000 ability points to spend on your characters development. Plus receive the Subsequent perk Supporter , Gamer and Game Master.

Game Master Supreme: Game Master Supremes are able to customize and host their own unique maps, and regulate who and how many players can participate.  In addition, you will have the capability to traverse standard maps and spice up game-play with randomized and timed abilities.  Become a dragon, create an earthquake, and devastate a battlefield with meteor strikes (to name a few). Plus receive the Subsequent perk Supporter , Gamer, Game Master and Adviser.
<div>
<h2><span style=""font-size: 1.17em
<div>
We understand very well the inability to contribute with funds.  If you are not able to contribute with money, we will still be blessed and very greatful for contributions in a few key areas:

Though we have quite a few facebook likes, and thousands of steam votes, we could always use more! Spread the word through your social media sites, contacts, email, or blogs.  Anything that will get the game in front of more players.
Like us on Facebook   Here
Join us on Google+   Here
Vote for us on Steam   Here
Subscribe to us on YouTube Here

>Inspired by games of yesterday, Foxtail draws from such classics as Legend of Kryandia, King’s Quest and Monkey Island. True to the point n’ click genre, Foxtail is a wonderfully animated pixel adventure, with a deep personal story, and challenging puzzles.
