Short Summary

Strategic Africa Foundation is a section 21 not-for-profit organisation whose main mandate is to provide comprehensive domestic violence and sexual assault prevention programs in South Africa. We believe everyone has the right to a safe and healthy relationship and work every day to make that right into a reality

Mission
Our mission is to engage, educate and empower South Africans to build lives and communities free from violence

From bullying, domestic and dating violence, to child abuse and sexual assault, Strategic Africa will work hard to end some of the most pressing national issues of our time

We promote the health, stability, education, and security of women and girls, men and boys in South Africa through campaigns, advocacy, policy and education to build sustainable community leadership and educating people everywhere about:
* nurturing kids and keeping then safe
* building healthy relations
* mentoring South Africa's youth
* helping people choose respect
* Connecting people and organizations and communities.

Adolescent dating violence (ADV) can range from verbal abuse to physical abuse to rape and murder. Ten to 40% of high school students in the US are victims of teen dating violence and 45% of teen girls know someone who has been coerced into having sex. One in 3 teens reports knowing a friend or peer who has been hit, punched, kicked, slapped, or otherwise physically hurt by a partner. Survivors of ADV have higher risks of injury, binge drinking, suicide attempts, physical fights, risky sexual behavior, and their educational outcomes tend to be poorer than those of their peers. ADV may also lead to higher incidence of HIV infections and unintended teen pregnancies.
Many of these teenagers will become victims of abusive relationships in adulthood. Girls and women between the ages of 16 and 24 are most at risk for intimate partner violence, and it is important that education starts early.
<h3><strong>What We Need &amp

We are looking for US$7000 to develop the app by engaging graphic designers and programmers  as will have already put up you the content, image, writing, sound, etc. This will cover the cost of creating the logic within the app and architecting all the usability of the DVApp. The content will usually be dropped in and then parsed accordingly. These projects tend to be front heavy since the data is what’s driving the entire app and the framework is so important.
Our unique packs includes hand made post cards, to beautiful South African hand painted T Shirts as well as stickers.... The biggest donor will have a chance to attend the launch of the App.
<div>
The Impact

Preventing and responding to adolescent dating violence can break the cycle of violence in romantic relationships that starts early in life. DVApp is an app that builds upon the accountability, respect, and trust of tight-knit friendships to help prevent sexual abuse and dating violence. Students with smart phones can pre-program six of their closest friends' phone numbers into the app, and with two taps, ask for an interruption, to be picked up from an uncomfortable or dangerous situation, or just let each other know that they're supported. The app provides an easy way to ask for help without victims feeling the need to explain themselves.

The foundations of the  DVApp lie in the Social-Ecological Model (a framework for violence prevention). DVApp intends to prevent sexual assault and teen dating violence by promoting a self-driven understanding of factors that influence teen dating violenceand the safety measures to be taken. DVApp is a prevention tool based on a thorough use of avenues like relationships, communities, and societal factors.

DVApp is being developed based on the multiple levels of influence on today's young people and how each of these levels of influence could be used to prevent teen dating violence. This approach is multifactorial, explores the interplay between several factors affecting teens and their safety, and is more likely to generate a comprehensive sexual violence and teen dating violence prevention and response effort.?

INDIVIDUAL
DVApp starts with the individual. Because of individual differences - age, gender, race, socioeconomic standing, etc.- every individual will use DVApp differently. Regardless of these differences, the app provides an opportunity for individuals to start talking about and understanding dating violence

INTERPERSONAL
The second level of the model refers to the relationships between individual students and their friends and peers. The App creates a network of people who can intervene to prevent violence, whether they're friends, parents, teachers, or other trusted individuals.

ORGANIZATIONAL
This level of the model is all about setting - in what settings do violence occur? DVApp allows students to take control of their surroundings in a new way by linking settings that may be uncomfortable or scary (a party where you don't know anyone
column2: a bedroom of someone you don't want to be with) with settings that are more comfortable (school
column3:
home) through the ability to quickly contact people they trust.

COMMUNITY AND SOCIETAL AVENUES
As more individuals, peers, and settings are linked together through the app and through students' and educators' anti-violence efforts, students can look outside their immediate communities for other resources, like anti-violence hotlines, professional advocates, or law enforcement officials.

PUBLIC POLICY
The fifth and outermost level of the model surrounds the DVApp user and his or her physical and social environment. DVApp enhances the knowledge of users about their rights, laws and regulations to prevent teen dating violence, and policies aimed at responding to the incidents of teen dating violence. In addition, by using DVApp teenagers gradually acquire insights about policies and activities that are intended to prevent and reduce the problem of teen dating violence through engagement in regulation, communication, promotion, development, and implementation of local and national policies to prevent teen dating violence.

column1: <div>
Other Ways You Can Help

Say you don't have funds to help, no problem. We would welcome your support in any capacity. If you would like to volunteer your services or equipment  we would gladly welcome both. Please contact us at info@saf.org.za.  Also we would love you to share this link with your friends and family too ! Don't forget to follow us on twitter https://twitter.com/nomore_sa.
Just knowing that you are behind this DVapp in any way is priceless. Thank you :o)

Explore the unknown frontier! Discover and conquer new civilizations! Grow your small populace from a struggling hamlet into a thriving metropolis! Lay siege to your friend’s cities as you cripple their empire! Protect your lands as your enemies close in around you! You rewrite the chronicles of history as you compete with up to three other friends to construct history’s most glorious NATION!
<table border=""0""><tbody><tr>

Nation is a worker based civilization card game where 2 to 4 players (up to 6 with further expansions) can play, vying to have the most victory points at the end of the game. Place worker tokens on map cards to play cards from your hand that give unique and sometimes game changing abilities and resources. Build up towns which give you victory points and battle your opponents to overthrow their towns or remove civilian cards they have placed in their nation. Explore new map areas to annex tribes or obtain more civilians.

Here is a video explaining who we are, what we hope to accomplish and at the end of the video there is a few minute example of game play. It will give you an idea of how easy of a game it is to play while still a depth of strategy that will keep you playing again and again.

Click here for a complete pdf of the rules.

Nation consists of five map types: Water, Mountain, Plains, Forest and Desert each having their own inhabitants. These inhabitants are the civilians that build up your nation. Each Civilian has a unique ability that takes effect when you play that civilian into your nation. The Civilian also provides you with materials to build towns, food to play more workers, or military power to defend your towns and nation or battle your opponents.

4 Artists are contributing their talents to the look and feel of this game.
In the game for each worker that you can play based upon the food you have, you can take 1 of 4 actions. Develop, Draw, Build or Battle.
The Develop action allows you to play a civilian card into your nation taking its unique action. The civilians in your Nation also work towards gaining victory points at the end of the game.
The Draw action lets you discard and draw cards from the civilian deck.
The Build action caused you to build a populous on a map card. The populous are important to obtaining victory points at the end of the game.

The Battle action allows you to take over other players populous' as well as gives you the opportunity to remove civilians from their Nations. Giving you the advantage when it comes to count vitory points at the end of the game.

We (Jason and Dyson) are two avid boardgamers that have a great idea for a game. We want to raise the money for the initial printing of the game. With a goal of supplying all of the copies that you, the wonderful backer, deserves. As well as extras to market the game further. Our end goal is to be able to sell our game nationwide, and we want your help. After we get this game complete we have other great ideas that we want to be able to finish and produce.

Currently our artists are feverishly working on getting the artwork complete, once that happens and our backing goal is met, we will be sending the game to the printers where the cards and components will be sent back to us. Then we will be boxing up the game and mailing it to you within 2 months of the art and backing complete.
<table border=""0""><tbody><tr>
<td><span><span><span><span>Along
with the base game, there will be six expansions and a final backer
expansion each adding their own aspect to the game without increasing
the overall length of game. Expansions will come in packs of two.
Expansions are interchangeable, in that, you may play one, some or all

of the expansions if you so choose.

Expansion #1: Magic vs. Technology
The
Events Expansion can be a great bane or boon to all nations. From
floods, volcanoes to bumper crops the effects of the events will leave
their lasting impression on the nations.
The Magic Expansion opens the realm of the arcana into the game nation
allowing spells to be flung back and forth slowing your opponents’

growth or expediting yours.

The Technology Expansion adds
technological advancements to your nation, from gunpowder to the

printing press their benefits will allow your nation to flourish.

Expansion #2: Political Intrigue
The Political Expansion brings the chance for you to vote on a political system that gives your continuous benefits throughout the game.

The Intrigue Expansion can drastically change the outcome of a battle and adds randomness into every battle that have interesting effects.
<td>

Expansion #3: The Race for Space
The Race for Space Expansion brings the element of space exploration to your nation. Will you grow your nation on other planets or meet alien races willing to help you build the greatness of your nation? This expansion also allows for 2 more friends to join in for a total of 6 playing the game.

Expansion #4: Custom Catds
An
expansion of 12 cards to add to your nation game designed by some of
the special backers who contribute over 120$ to the game.

This just isn't about us raising money to pay the artists, pay the printers and hopefully have enough left over to buy a cup of coffee. This is about you getting your own copy of the game and possibly more.
<table border=""0""><tbody><tr>
<td>

When you donate a certain amount of money to our dream and we send you something. The more you donate the more you get. Also, be aware that you are responsible to pay the shipping and handling for the perk you request.
For a 30$ donation we will send you a copy of the game. So you can play
it with all your friends so they will see how great it is and will want
their own copy. The base game contains 90 high quality civilian and location cards, 40 wooden worker and populous tokens, and 5 six sided dice. This will be shipping at the end of November, 2013.

For 50$ you get a copy of the base game as well as expansion 1:  Magic vs Technology. This expansion consists of 72 civilian, spell and technology cards of the same high quality as the base game. Which is due to leave the printers at the end of November, 2013.

For 70$ you get a copy of the base game and expansions 1 and 2, Magic vs Technology and Political Intrigue. And as a bonus you also get a signed glossy of the creators to leave in the box as a thank you every time you play. The Political Intrigue expansion consists of 50 high quality political system, voting and battle changing cards, as well as 4 black six sided dice. The second expansion is due to be released the end of February, 2014
<table border=""0""><tbody><tr>
<td>
For 100$ you get all of that as well as the
Race for Space expansion. So you and up to 5 friends can play for total

galactic conquest. This expansion is still under development and we are still finalizing the game structure. It will still use the same high quality cards and components used in the base game . We plan to be shipping this expansion the end of February 2014, as with expansion 2.

And for 120$ you get the whole shebang as well as yourself or a loved one immortalized in a separate expansion. We are offering 12 of these cards up to donors. You will be included in the full design of the card
column2: of course in the spirit of the game. After the design is completed each of the 12 will be sent a pack of cards to include in their game.

column1: With so many to choose from it is important for you to know that we are using a print on demand service to print the game so we can print any number of copies.

Also note: Jason and Dyson will personalize, number and sign every copy of this original, limited edition print run. So hurry and get your copy asap!

Copies 1 to 10 are already gone!

IMPORTANT: Please note that your donation will not include the cost of shipping you the game.
Wanna spread the word on the street? Click here for a printable pamphlet to hand out!

If you have any questions please email Jason or Dyson:
jadysongames@gmail.com.

Thank you for your time and support!

Keep playing everybody!

SpawnFirst.com needs you!

Hi, my name is Corey Kelley and I am the Editor-in-Chief of SpawnFirst.com. We are a fully volunteer website dedicated to gaming. We all have our own jobs and families, but put time every day into our passion: gaming. 

Today, we were accepted as media into the E3 conference, the premier convention for gaming! Only problem is, we didn't receive much notice. One way or another, we will make it to LA, (even if it's hitchhiking across the USA) but we hope the gaming community will help us out!

What We Need:

This is where the $1,000 will go:
• Hotel rental for two employees (Don't worry, one room! We aren't looking to be fancy).
• Two tickets to LAX. We will figure out how to get home or we will live on the beach. I'll take the second, honestly.
• If we don't reach the goal, it will still help us on our journey to E3.
<li>If we happen to get more than the goal set, it will all go towards the website and the staff. We want to overhaul the theme and have it more in line with our YouTube channel &amp
column2: social media. Add more to the Youtube channel to push out more content.

column1:
What Your Contribution will do for SpawnFirst

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

• The impact you will make on the website is immense. You will be helping us take the next step in turning our passion into a job. Help not only what I consider staff, but friends, follow their dream.
• Tons of coverage of games on the show floor (footage, hands-on demos, photography, articles, and more).

• It will have a huge impact on me. I honestly want to take my staff into something they never believed. When I took over as Editor-in-Chief, there wasn't even a thought we could get review copies from developers, let alone get into E3. We now receive review loaners and now I want to show the staff our legitimacy.

• I genuinely care about these people and want to lead them. I've turned to you guys for that. I've dug into my own pockets to buy incentives, photoshop and after effects, games to review if we don't receive copies. I'm hoping I can show them one more time what length I will go to keep growing the site.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know the deadline is short, we only found out hours ago...so you might not be able to help.
• Talk to friends or colleagues who love gaming and let them know about us.
• Visit our site, make us feel pretty good there.

column1: series and we welcome everything related to it, whether it be music, art or
games. Not long ago we came up with the idea to create a small-scale
TRON-themed game — best of its kind — in which people would be able to compete
and fight in the martial cyber games of the TRON universe. As of now, we have a
complete concept with little groundwork for the project. We know exactly what

has yet to be done, but to achieve the goal we need your assistance.


It is going to be a free-to-play
browser/Android/iOS multiplayer game.

The game will have many multiplayer game modes such as:

""DiscWars"", ""LightCycle"",  ""Light Platforms"",  ""LineWars"",  LightAirPlanes""..
Missions, with a rating and
achievement systems.
Global quests, with all

players participating, and with top performers rewarded with special prizes.


To spice up the
gameplay, we will implement such features as levels, stats, various maps,
leaderboards, news block for the latest TRON-related news, passive abilities,

active abilities, auxiliary abilities, quests and much more.


       


Abilities in the game
will be divided into three groups:
• Passive abilities. Their effectiveness is proportional to your
character’s level. Every time you level up, you get points for upgrading your
character’s stats and points for upgrading your lightcycle.
• Auxiliary abilities. All characters, in addition to the main XP bar,
will have an auxiliary XP bar which, when filled, gives you a random ability bonus. The bar is emptied after you receive a bonus, and you need to
fill it up again, and then again and again indefinitely. The auxiliary XP can be gained on the arena or
by completing daily quests. You collect these abilities to use them only on the
arena.
• Active abilities. These abilities will work only when pressing hotkeys
on the arena.
is our final goal to release the game on smartphones.

column37: >The beginning of an RPG universe
column39: >I have been playing, and creating house rules for, tabletop role playing games since the first box edition of D&amp
column40: D.  One day in 2007 while I was busily writing a house-rules supplement for another tabletop RPG I played, I began to get ideas well beyond the simple weapons manual I was drafting.  I caught myself pondering rules, and fantasy realities outside the universe I was writing for. At this point I chucked the whole supplement and began work on a unique universe and system of

column1: play culminating in the APOCalypse 2500 Main Rule Book. Since then it has grown to include the GM's Campaign Guide with bestiary, a reference book called Magic &amp
column2: Techno-Sorcery, and a Zombie source book as well as several adventure scenarios and other GM resources.

column1: world of APOCalypse 2500
The
game is set in the 26th century (hence the reference to the year 2500 in the
name) in a world markedly changed from the one we know in the 21st century. The
basic premise of the game is that science in its zeal to create instantaneous
pan-oceanic travel opened an uncontrollable wormhole. This new phenomenon
became self sustaining in the Arizona desert where it connects earth to
alternate realities in time and space.
Not
to retell the whole back story of the game, which can be read in the main rule
book, however the ""vortex"" as it is referred to in the game cause's
major changes to the world leading to reformation of continents and worldwide
civilization collapse. The time of the game setting is 400 years after the
vortex's formation. The world of Apocalypse 2500 is populated by humans,
mutants, and aliens, and nearly all the ancient legendary races like elves,
dwarfs, and trolls. In this new world of the 26th century, or 4th century AV in
game time, it is entirely possible to encounter creatures using a mix of magic
and technology. This leads to some interesting scenarios where you have Orc
armies with horse drawn carts mounting .30 cal machine guns led by a
techno-sorcerer warlord.
In
writing this game I have gone to great lengths to explain the technology,
magic, and create new twists on the familiar creatures and monsters of legend.
The reason that magic exists in this post apocalyptic future and the reasons it
permeates ancient human legend is well explained in a very unique and believable
way.
This
mix and match of technology and magic is also available to player characters as
well, who are not bound to the rigid ""class"" systems allowing cross
vocational skill acquisition leading to an endless number of custom character types.
A large number of player character species are available as usage of many
creatures from the bestiary is possible.
I
hope you enjoy the APOCalypse 2500 universe...
Learn more about the game at www.apocalypse2500.com

column1: What's the money for
After exploring the world of traditional publishing, I
decided that self publishing was the way to go. I am having some success

selling in the US, UK, and EU, through my own website, lulu.com, and Amazon.com, but more is needed.  With so many thousands of pages on the web talking about gaming, if one doesn't have a professionally built well promoted website one will fade into obscurity. I am here on Indiegogo, to raise capital
for a professionally designed website and to finance continuing internet
promotion.  The funding will
maintain such efforts until the game itself reaches a large enough audience
to sustain a promotional cycle.  A small percentage of the money will be spent to establish a product presence in a local game shop. Should this campaign fall short on its goal,
what money is raised will still be spent to promote the game and develop a better internet presence.

Those who are due perks because of their contribution will receive them regardless of the final contributions received. 


Planned Advertising 

www.Projectwonderful.com 

Google.com

Facebook.com

If you can't contribute funds, as I know folks can find themselves a bit broke these days, you can still help by spreading the word. Share this campaign, tell folks about APOCalypse 2500, acquire the books and play the game...

column1: ","The beginning of an RPG universeI have been playing, and creating house rules for, tabletop role playing games since the first box edition of D&D.  One day in 2007 while I was busily writing a house-rules supplement for another tabletop RPG I played, I began to get ideas well beyond the simple weapons manual I was drafting.  I caught myself pondering rules, and fantasy realities outside the universe I was writing for. At this point I chucked the whole supplement and began work on a unique universe and system of

play culminating in the APOCalypse 2500 Main Rule Book. Since then it has grown to include the GM's Campaign Guide with bestiary, a reference book called Magic & Techno-Sorcery, and a Zombie source book as well as several adventure scenarios and other GM resources. The
world of APOCalypse 2500
The
game is set in the 26th century (hence the reference to the year 2500 in the
name) in a world markedly changed from the one we know in the 21st century. The
basic premise of the game is that science in its zeal to create instantaneous
pan-oceanic travel opened an uncontrollable wormhole. This new phenomenon
became self sustaining in the Arizona desert where it connects earth to
alternate realities in time and space.
Not
to retell the whole back story of the game, which can be read in the main rule
book, however the ""vortex"" as it is referred to in the game cause's
major changes to the world leading to reformation of continents and worldwide
civilization collapse. The time of the game setting is 400 years after the
vortex's formation. The world of Apocalypse 2500 is populated by humans,
mutants, and aliens, and nearly all the ancient legendary races like elves,
dwarfs, and trolls. In this new world of the 26th century, or 4th century AV in
game time, it is entirely possible to encounter creatures using a mix of magic
and technology. This leads to some interesting scenarios where you have Orc
armies with horse drawn carts mounting .30 cal machine guns led by a
techno-sorcerer warlord.
In
writing this game I have gone to great lengths to explain the technology,
magic, and create new twists on the familiar creatures and monsters of legend.
The reason that magic exists in this post apocalyptic future and the reasons it
permeates ancient human legend is well explained in a very unique and believable
way.
This
mix and match of technology and magic is also available to player characters as
well, who are not bound to the rigid ""class"" systems allowing cross
vocational skill acquisition leading to an endless number of custom character types.
A large number of player character species are available as usage of many
creatures from the bestiary is possible.
I
hope you enjoy the APOCalypse 2500 universe...
Learn more about the game at www.apocalypse2500.com  This Game is rated Teen...   The Team The Author   J L Arnold Primary Artist  Loran Cook

After exploring the world of traditional publishing, I

New Fundraiser
Participate in our new fundraiser to help make Foxotic possible! Go to the new campaign by clicking on the link below!
http://foxotic.com/indiegogo
Short Summary

Hi, I'm Ben! I'm the founder/CEO of Foxotic, an upcoming Flash-based virtual world targeted for kids! We plan on developing a virtual world for kids by summer of 2013 that is fun yet educational. All work will be done in Flash and we will be programming with our own servers. We have servers to maintain, artwork to create, and a lot of in-game and external features to develop.
<h1>Donation Goals<span style=""font-size: 10px
<div>

$100 in donations - New game play sneak peek
$300 in donations - New castle location sneak peek
$600 in donations - New waterfall location sneak peek (Fund our server)
$1200 in donations - New game play sneak peek
$2500 in donations - Exclusive Foxotic Hat giveaway (Fund artwork and programming)
$5000 in donations - Exclusive Foxotic T-shirt giveaway
$10000 in donations - Game funded &
column2: Exclusive Foxotic Hoody giveaway (Fund Foxotic Land)

column1: <h1>What We Need &amp

We currently need around $10,000 in order to develop Foxotic and make the game the perfect safe online environment for all ages. All donations are used to develop and maintain Foxotic. Donors will receive special rewards depending on how much is contributed.
Why Should I Donate Money For Foxotic?
<div>
Rather than considering your contribution a donation, look at it as pre-purchasing a membership to a fantastic universe!

But you don't need to wait until we reach our goal to have fun. We are ready to give rewards right now. You give us the resources we need to complete Foxotic and your child gets countless hours of entertainment and creative fun - on and off the computer!

We are pretty confident that Foxotic is going to become a place of fun and creativity for millions of kids from all over the world - just think about how proud you'll be to know you helped get it off the ground. (Maybe even have your name carved in our Supporters Stone) :)
Please take a minute to check some of the cool rewards we are giving - you can see them in the list to right.
Other Ways You Can Help
<ul>
• Follow the official Foxotic Twitter
• Follow Ben via Twitter
• Like the official Foxotic Facebook page
• Send us your ideas, fan art, and suggestions!
• Spread the word about Foxotic!

Users that can get at least three people to donate in our fundraisers earn a special 'Community Manager/Helper' medal for their upcoming Foxotic account. Thanks for reading and we hope that you help make our game possible!

 About Us 

 We are Redlight Entertainment, a small game developing team from Italy, formed by five seventeen-to-twenty highschool and university students. Our first project, Scissors, will be a horror scarejump type game, with simple gameplay and clear objectives, as well as the purpose to scare you shitless. Our first purpose, except creating entertainment for people like us, was to discover what this sort of career would require and wether we'd like it or not. Your donation would help us greatly in improving Scissors' menus, graphics, story, gameplay, and spreading
column2: and maybe saving up a little for future projects. <div>

column1: What we need&

<div>For this project, we need to raise a total of 3,000 € (euros). These will be used for funding game gadgets, purchase professional software, and drink a lot of energy drinks to keep us awake and at work at night! The software we need include the professional Japanese digital painting program Paint Tool SAI and an Adobe CS5 suite (containing programs such as Flash, Photoshop, AfterEffects, Illustrator and Dream Weaver) –  in case we get more than what we need, we'll also purchase Autodesk's 3D modeling program 3DS Max and a sound editing software like Cubase or Ableton. In case we don't make it to our goal – well, we'll still try to purchase as much as we can, with a priority for the badges. <span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: > For any amount you will donate, you will receive something! Even if you only donate a few coins – just as much as ice-cream! – you will receive the beta version of Scissors two months before its actual release, the 24th of November, 2013. You can check our perks to the right of your screen. Featured game badges include:

column1: <div><ul>
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >the beta version of Scissors two months before its official release

column1: <li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
<li>
<span style=""line-height: 1.45em
column2: >our official thanks to you on our game and website! Because we are so grateful to those willing to help us!

column1: <div><big><b><i> More info about Redlight&amp
<div>

Scissors will be released as beta version, only available for anyone who donated to us and/or registered to our website among the first 20 users, on September 24th, 2013. This version will include a sort of basic gameplay and only one quest: go home. In the official version, released on November 24th, 2013, there will be a series of secondary quests as well as more professional menus, design, and a better developed story. We want you to know that the official release of Scissors will be completely free, available to anyone willing to play it in our website
column2: and that we are only asking funds to make our work easier and better-looking! Our purpose, as we said before, is simply to make entertainment for people like us, have fun working, and maybe get down the bases for making a career out of it in the future.

column1: We would like you to simply think of us as a bunch of students doing what they like to do, because that's just what we are!
Short on savings? You can help us anyway!

You're short on money? We can understand you. If you like us and our game, you can subscribe to our website (there is still a chance to get the beta being one of the first twenty users, so hurry up!), and to our official YouTube channel and FaceBook page. Also, don't forget to spread the word if you think we deserve it! Share it with your friends and fellas, tell people about us in your favorite website, anything like that can help, really. And don't be afraid to use the IndieGoGo sharing buttons, they will love it!

","About Us  We are Redlight Entertainment, a small game developing team from Italy, formed by five seventeen-to-twenty highschool and university students. Our first project, Scissors, will be a horror scarejump type game, with simple gameplay and clear objectives, as well as the purpose to scare you shitless. Our first purpose, except creating entertainment for people like us, was to discover what this sort of career would require and wether we'd like it or not. Your donation would help us greatly in improving Scissors' menus, graphics, story, gameplay, and spreading
column2: and maybe saving up a little for future projects.

column1: What we need&what you get

For this project, we need to raise a total of 3,000 € (euros). These will be used for funding game gadgets, purchase professional software, and drink a lot of energy drinks to keep us awake and at work at night! The software we need include the professional Japanese digital painting program Paint Tool SAI and an Adobe CS5 suite (containing programs such as Flash, Photoshop, AfterEffects, Illustrator and Dream Weaver) –  in case we get more than what we need, we'll also purchase Autodesk's 3D modeling program 3DS Max and a sound editing software like Cubase or Ableton. In case we don't make it to our goal – well, we'll still try to purchase as much as we can, with a priority for the badges.  For any amount you will donate, you will receive something! Even if you only donate a few coins – just as much as ice-cream! –  you will receive the beta version of Scissors two months before its actual release, the 24th of November, 2013. You can check our perks to the right of your screen. Featured game badges include:
the beta version of Scissors two months before its official release
three different official Scissors wallpapers
three different official, hand-signed Scissors A3 prints
six different Scissors 1” pin badges
five different Scissors 1” keychain badges
our official thanks to you on our game and website! Because we are so grateful to those willing to help us!
More info about Redlight&Scissors

Scissors will be released as beta version, only available for anyone who donated to us and/or registered to our website among the first 20 users, on September 24th, 2013. This version will include a sort of basic gameplay and only one quest: go home. In  the official version, released on November 24th, 2013, there will be a series of secondary quests as well as more professional menus, design, and a better developed story. We want you to know that the official release of Scissors will be completely free, available to anyone willing to play it in our website
column2: and that we are only asking funds to make our work easier and better-looking! Our purpose, as we said before, is simply to make entertainment for people like us, have fun working, and maybe get down the bases for making a career out of it in the future.

column1: We would like you to simply think of us as a bunch of students doing what they like to do, because that's just what we are!
Short on savings? You can help us anyway!

You're short on money? We can understand you. If you like us and our game, you can subscribe to our website (there is still a chance to get the beta being one of the first twenty users, so hurry up!), and to our official YouTube channel and FaceBook page. Also, don't forget to spread the word if you think we deserve it! Share it with your friends and fellas, tell people about us in your favorite website, anything like that can help, really. And don't be afraid to use the IndieGoGo sharing buttons, they will love it!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Short Summary

Minecon Server Edition is one of, if not the, largest virtual Minecraft convention around. The whole premise of us is that if you cannot make proper Minecon, then, no matter where you are, you can get online and login to ours. Best of all, the tickets are free!
<h3>What We Need &amp
The demand for, well, pretty much everything this year has been overwhelming
column2: you guys are amazing! However, we want to make this event the best in every single (and double) way. Having the Management Team all in England, as well as most of the Lead Staff means that all our Internets are slower than a dead creeper. As such, we really need to find a place where multiple streams in 1080p are possible, as well as creating an environment for the Lead Staff that means instant communication as well as un-interrupted work. Offices, ladies and gentlemen, offices!

column1: We are looking at an office
column2: > that can hold 6 of our team/livestreamers for a week during the event. However, obviously this isn't cheap. Then coupled with lodgings as well, everything very much so stacks up!

column1: But we don't want to be a boring piece of dirt. Instead, we offer you diamond like awards for pledging for this cause, as you can see below:
The Impact

If we have offices, the streams will greatly increase in quality. The main one will be in 1080p, and we will also have a second one that currently exists in the form of a popular Spreaker.com radio broadcast. Two 1080p streams, peeps!
Of course there is also the perfect environment created as well
column2: we're all together, and can shout at each other instead of messaging in Skype. Much better! This means less derps by the team. We all know how difficult it is to keep tabs on Skype when you're livestreaming to thousands of people, right? This'll fix it!

column1: Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't want to, or cannot pledge us money, but still support the cause, then please spread the word! Tweet this page, Facebook it, or whatever the kids do these days. Tell your friends! Your parents! Your children! Your uncles and aunties!
But most of all, spread the word to your dog. Woof.

UNBRACKETED

By the time March rolls around, everyone is a basketball fan. 

The tournament captures our attention. 48 games in the opening four days. The upsets. The Buzzer Beaters. Cinderella wreaks havoc and pandemonium reigns! 

And yet, the brackets don’t quite capture the greatness of the tournament. By the second round, millions of us are suffering from a nasty affliction: Busted Bracket Syndrome.

That’s it. The rest of the tournament is dead to us.

Enter 13 UNBRACKETED, a simple, interactive game soon to be launched on Facebook and later as a mobile app. 

By selecting the right mix of darkhorses and favorites to create your “Lucky 13”, you'll be engaged in the tournament longer and have more fun. 

The dual scoring system encourages participants to select a range of low to high seeds. This brings an (otherwise missing) element of strategy to the selection process. 

Cinderellas definitely have a place at this ball. 

But best of all, no more busted brackets after the first round! 

SIMPLE. STRATEGIC. FUN.

13 Unbracketed has a user-friendly interface and is easy to play. Here’s how it works:

The home page provides you with a quick overview of the game and allows you to GET STARTED or LEARN MORE if you want to see additional details.


13 UNBRACKETED is an exciting new game with a unique scoring system. This page describes how to play. You can either join a public league or create your own private league and invite friends to join!

column2:
>

Public Leagues are an easy way to try 13 Unbracketed. Simply choose the league that best fits you and grab a spot!
column3:
>

Create a private league so you can invite up to 23 of your closest friends. You can even create multiple leagues for your many social circles.
column4:
>

Now you are ready to start selecting your 13 teams! Use the Full Bracket View or the Region View. Try to create the optimal “Lucky 13” and win your league! (actual team names will be used)
column5:
>


After selecting your teams, your “Lucky 13” is set. The scorecard will be your tournament companion from here on out. Track your team’s success here. Also, check out the Smack Talk Forum and let’s see what kind of game you really have!
column6:
>

Whether you’re lone-wolfing it in a public league or you’re the commish of your own private league, this is where you see how everyone in your league stacks up.

JOIN THE TEAM

After years of playing with friends and family and a successful beta test, we are excited to offer this as a brand new digital, social platform! With a true entrepreneurial spirit and passion, we’ve dedicated (and donated) many hours over the last few years to developing this game. 

And, while we have been extremely thoughtful in effectively bootstrapping this effort, there are some hard costs associated with bringing this game to market. 

We humbly ask you to please join us in launching 13 UNBRACKETED. The somewhat modest stretch goal of $6,000 we have set for the Indiegogo campaign will pay for approximately one fourth of the launch costs. 

Should we exceed our initial goal, the additional money raised will be used to pay toward the balance of the programming and other launch costs. The Team has contributed our own personal resources to further this effort but need your help in meeting programming costs to successfully launch a FREE version of the game on Facebook.

We are also offering a mobile version of the Facebook game this year!

Some screens from the mobile version.

There are many things we would like to do with 13 UNBRACKETED. iOS and Android development are high on the list. Additional money raised will be put to good use to expand the game and it’s functionality.

THE GAME THAT FANS DESERVE.

We think Indiegogo is the perfect place to launch 13 UNBRACKETED. We hope to begin building a loyal fan base right here.

As an Indiegogo backer, you have the opportunity to be a pioneer of the game. Your participation and feedback will help us shape the game as we move forward.

13 UNBRACKETED is the game that fans of the tournament deserve and you’ll play an integral it making it the best it can be!

A PIONEERING SPIRIT.

Do you have a pioneering spirit? If so, be among the first to play this landmark game. And if you pledge $15 or more, you will be permanently listed on the game’s Hall of Fame.

Only those who participate in this original launch will be designated as ""pioneers.” The more you donate, the higher you’ll find yourself on the Hall of Fame list. And the more glory you enjoy.

The only other way to claim a spot in the Hall of Fame is to be listed on our Top Scores section. That will include the top 100 scores of all time. 

There are three levels of Pioneers in the Hall of Fame:

Pioneer Player – This is our entry-level Hall of Famer. Rewards vary for contributions from $15 to $60. 

Pioneer Boss – This level lets others know that you’ve got game. Enjoy the spoils of being a commish. Rewards vary for contributions from $75 to $150. 

Pioneer Elite – Welcome to the gold standard of Hall of Fame glory. This is the big time. Contributions from $200 to $500+.

Here are the levels of participation we’re offering and their rewards:

Click here for a larger view of the rewards. 


Very cool designer-quality poster with detail and depth.
column7:
>

A quality T-Shirt with a custom logo design.
column9:
>

A sweet hat with the custom logo. Very sharp.

MEET THE TEAM.

Lucky 13 UNBRACKETED LLC is not your typical gaming company. We’re advertising and design creatives with a passion for doing great work and building brands. We have a lot of digital experience (including gaming) and are also fantasy sports fans. More importantly, we’re friends who share a passion for the tournament and this game. 

Gale is the driving force behind the game. A talented, award-winning Creative, he’s responsible for the vision, concept, design and format of 13 UNBRACKETED. His attention to detail and focus on a user-friendly experience help deliver the goods in a simple yet fun way. http://venosdeladvertising.com

Collaborating from the beginning with Gale, James is our UX and digital design expert. His deep understanding of web architecture is critical to the game’s success and he helps guide the project through the user’s perspective. http://rogueantdesign.com

Erik handles the programming as well as all of the fancy back end technology that brings 13 UNBRACKETED to life. He is a can-do problem solver with deep database experience. He also brings a designer’s attention to detail to the front end. http://www.upperhouse.us

In addition to the core creative team there’s Scott and Lea Ann. True believers and early investors in the game. They're Pioneer Elite #1 in our books. Also, we'd like to thank Lynn for helping behind the scenes and for her support.
column10:
>

James, Erik, Gale, Scott &
column11:
Lea Ann

13 UNBRACKETED is an opportunity for our team to expand our horizons and grow creatively. We have carefully crafted what we feel is a great experience for the user. 

TIMING.

We have planned the timing of the Indiegogo campaign to coincide with important dates of the tournament. 

The Indiegogo campaign will end at midnight on Tuesday, March 18th. Selection Sunday is March 16th and the first email invitations to the league creators and the public league players will go out that evening. Additional invitations will be sent as people continue to back the project.

The tournament (minus the ""play-in"" games) begins on Thursday the 20th. Participants will have until a few minutes before tip off to make their ""Lucky 13"" team selections. 

Our goal is to have the posters, shirts and hats ship in April while the tournament is still going.

Join us and play along with the tournament in a new and exciting way, we hope to see you at tip off!

My name is Neil Owen and I am the founder and Senior Pastor of Liberty Ministries, located in Quebec Canada. Liberty Ministries is an English ministry in a predominantly French province. There are over 8 million people in Quebec of which 1 million are English speaking. According to statistics, Quebec’s population is the second largest in Canada. This alone makes it a province that is in need of the Light of the Gospel. There are only .05% of Quebec’s population that are Christian, less than Japan’s 1%. Quebec is a mission field that is ripe for the Light of Jesus Christ to penetrate the darkness that surrounds it. If we were to take Quebec’s English speaking population alone it would still be Canada’s 6th largest province. English speaking people of Quebec are neglected because the focus is on the French speaking people – the larger population of Quebec.

There is a large percentage of Quebec that follows the Catholic faith. Some of these followers have been frustrated and/or disheartened because of the child abuses perpetuated by Priests that have come to the forefront of the news lately. We know that God has a true and living relationship to offer to these wonderful individuals and we believe the time is now. We believe the Lord wants to woo the Quebec people back into His family, no matter what language, color or creed.

God is in the mist of blessing Liberty Ministries and we are growing. We presently share a building with a French congregation – a wonderful brother in the Lord – but we feel God wants us to spread our wings so we can fulfill what the Lord has called us to accomplish in Quebec. The French Pastor and his congregation have been very kind and patient with us, and we appreciate all the sacrifices they have made to accommodate Liberty Ministries over the last 5 years. However our Sunday school program has been exploding and we are barely able to seat the new people that are coming to Sunday services. We have a building that we believe the Lord has selected for us and we also believe this building will be completely paid for the day we move into it. We are looking to raise $400,000 in order to purchase this building. $50,000 is our first phase of this project. The price is not very high considering it is a church. A lot of houses cost that much and more.

We would appreciate any amount you would feel led to give towards this work. Liberty Ministries is a fully licenced church which means we are able to supply charitable donation receipts for funds received from Canadians, if so desired.
Please feel free to check out our website at www.libertyministries.ca
Thank you for your time and consideration.
Pastor Neil Owen
Liberty Ministries

MAC OS/ LINUX Versions in the stretch goals!
SURVIVE
Max must battle the elements of a post apocalyptic world against hunger, thirst, sleep deprivation, zombies, bandits, limb injuries and the virus itself.
SCAVENGE
Max must loot items he finds throughout the wasteland including abandoned homes, cities, military compounds, hospitals, malls and dungeons.
THE STORY

Zomba: Surviving Wasteland follows the epic journey of Max as he wakes up in the Coachella Valley containment prison in Southern California designed to house ""the infects"" of society. Having no idea to how he got there, he struggles to grasp the fallen world around him overrun by hordes of infected humans.  Traveling throughout the valley in search of water, food and answers, so begins the epic 3 world journey of Max.  World's include an overrun Las Vegas and abandoned Los Angeles.  Each world has multiple dungeons that come in the form of hospitals, military camps, bunkers and malls.  Max must fight his way through each dungeon solving puzzles along the way to defeat the worlds mini-boss.  After he defeats the mini-bosses he can then defeat the world boss which unlocks the next world.
FEATURES:
<ul>
• Isometric open world top down 3/4 view RPG Survival Horror
• 16 Bit Era Style graphics (Zelda: Link to the past, Street Fighter 2, Megaman X)
• Primarily a traditional single story campaign (Plans to add multiplayer and open world PVP but not a fundamental principle of the game)
• Randomly generated Minigames to enter Dungeons (that are also generated by a world seed.) Mini Dungeons per world that lead up to a main Dungeon and World Boss
• Randomly generated loot tables based on weapon type (Think Borderlines 2)
• Game will be released primarily on PC
• Game modes will include Average, Above average, Hardcore and Nuke (Nuke will give each world a countdown timer until the world gets nuked)
<li>Game development Video Blogs will be released periodically regarding concept and art completion
column2: however, story line and the music score are going to be completely un-revealed until launch.

column1: • Unofficial Launch December 2015
• Story line will contain paradoxes of social issues (mass consumption, white privilege, narcissism, greed, human fear)
• Enemies will be primarily infected humans, bandits and infected animals
• 3 Primary large Zelda type worlds. (Palm Springs, Las Vegas, Los Angeles)

• Tremendous amounts of 80s music, film and video game easter eggs to pay homage to the games predecessors but not too take away from the experience of the story or be overbearing to the experience of the game.
STRETCH GOALS
In the event that we over fund this project, I would really like to push the boundaries of Max to the limits and have its true potential realized.
100K - Character Customization / MacOS / Linux Versions
We will add a MacOS and Linux version of the game to be distrubuted.
You will be able to change Max's appearance via hair color, eye color and name.
250k - Multiplayer Support.
We will create an online PVP sandbox mode for players. (like DayZ)
350k - Co-Op mode.
We will create a co-op mode to beat the game with friends.
500k - 4th World.
We will create a 4th world that has all the mini-bosses, dungeons and a main world boss like the other 3 worlds.
750K - Base Building / Crafting
In the event that we fund this project to this length, Max's world will be dramatically changed with the addition of hundreds of new items used to craft weapons and bases.
1mil - Max's Controller
Max will get a plug and play USB SNES inspired controller as his game disk.  You plug in the controller, and pick up Zomba where you left off.
UPDATES

(Updates on the Kickstater progress will be posted here!)

","MAC OS/ LINUX Versions in the stretch goals!
SURVIVE
Max must battle the elements of a post apocalyptic world against hunger, thirst, sleep deprivation, zombies, bandits, limb injuries and the virus itself.
SCAVENGE
Max must loot items he finds throughout the wasteland including abandoned homes, cities, military compounds, hospitals, malls and dungeons.
THE STORY

Zomba: Surviving Wasteland follows the epic journey of Max as he wakes up in the Coachella Valley containment prison in Southern California designed to house ""the infects"" of society. Having no idea to how he got there, he struggles to grasp the fallen world around him overrun by hordes of infected humans.  Traveling throughout the valley in search of water, food and answers, so begins the epic 3 world journey of Max.  World's include an overrun Las Vegas and abandoned Los Angeles.  Each world has multiple dungeons that come in the form of hospitals, military camps, bunkers and malls.  Max must fight his way through each dungeon solving puzzles along the way to defeat the worlds mini-boss.  After he defeats the mini-bosses he can then defeat the world boss which unlocks the next world.
FEATURES:
Isometric open world top down 3/4 view RPG Survival Horror
16 Bit Era Style graphics (Zelda: Link to the past, Street Fighter 2, Megaman X)
Primarily a traditional single story campaign (Plans to add multiplayer and open world PVP but not a fundamental principle of the game)
Randomly generated Minigames to enter Dungeons (that are also generated by a world seed.) Mini Dungeons per world that lead up to a main Dungeon and World Boss
Randomly generated loot tables based on weapon type (Think Borderlines 2)
Game will be released primarily on PC
Game modes will include Average, Above average, Hardcore and Nuke (Nuke will give each world a countdown timer until the world gets nuked)
Game development Video Blogs will be released periodically regarding concept and art completion
column2: however, story line and the music score are going to be completely un-revealed until launch.

column1: Unofficial Launch December 2015
Story line will contain paradoxes of social issues (mass consumption, white privilege, narcissism, greed, human fear)
Enemies will be primarily infected humans, bandits and infected animals
3 Primary large Zelda type worlds. (Palm Springs, Las Vegas, Los Angeles)

Tremendous amounts of 80s music, film and video game easter eggs to pay homage to the games predecessors but not too take away from the experience of the story or be overbearing to the experience of the game.
STRETCH GOALS
In the event that we over fund this project, I would really like to push the boundaries of Max to the limits and have its true potential realized.
100K - Character Customization / MacOS / Linux Versions
We will add a MacOS and Linux version of the game to be distrubuted.
You will be able to change Max's appearance via hair color, eye color and name.
250k - Multiplayer Support.
We will create an online PVP sandbox mode for players. (like DayZ)
350k - Co-Op mode.
We will create a co-op mode to beat the game with friends.
500k - 4th World.
We will create a 4th world that has all the mini-bosses, dungeons and a main world boss like the other 3 worlds.
750K - Base Building / Crafting
In the event that we fund this project to this length, Max's world will be dramatically changed with the addition of hundreds of new items used to craft weapons and bases.
1mil - Max's Controller
Max will get a plug and play USB SNES inspired controller as his game disk.  You plug in the controller, and pick up Zomba where you left off.
UPDATES
(Updates on the Kickstater progress will be posted here!)",15.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Northridge, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/zomba-surviving-wasteland/pica

Short Summary

LiveAce is a subscription-based online poker site that allows players to play in ring games (limit hold’em, no limit hold’em, pot limit omaha) and convert their chips into real money and valuable prizes.  We are planning a live launch in June 2013.  Please check if you reside in an eligible state (in ""Eligible States"" below) before contributing.
The Team

LiveAce was founded by a dedicated group of poker entrepreneurs to fill the void left in the online poker market after Black Friday when the U.S. government shut down the three largest offshore poker sites that catered to U.S. players. We’ve created a U.S.-based, legal poker site and have used our background in casino and online poker to comprehensively design a poker gameplay experience which caters to both serious and recreational players. We think you’ll agree that LiveAce brings back all the excitement of traditional online cash games - where you can play on your schedule and win real money – all while improving your skills.
Why We're Different

Today online poker players have a choice between tournament sites and “social” poker sites.  Because no money can be won, “social” poker sites are plagued by poor play as players assign no value to their chips and therefore don’t take the game seriously. While tournament sites allow the player to win cash or prizes, tournaments are a big time commitment and only a lucky few are able win anything of value.
<div>
The Solution

Because the chips you win on LiveAce can be used to win real cash and prizes, the quality of the gameplay more closely resembles a real money game.  Plus, we focus exclusively on ring games which allows you to play on your schedule.  Best of all we auction off real cash every day - paid right to your Paypal account or mailed via check without hassle or delay.
If you want to play competitive ring games as well as have the ability to win real money, LiveAce is your home.
<h3>What We Need &amp

Funding a startup is expensive and time consuming.  In addition to working tirelessly on the business, the founders and investors have invested significant money to develop the site through our recent beta testing phase.
The funding for this project will be used to pay salaries for our U.S.-based software development team.
We’ll be offering two types of memberships: Basic and Club Live.
<div>
Basic Membership

A basic membership does not require you to spend anything to enjoy the games or win money.  You receive a modest amount of chips upon signup and also have the ability to “top up” reload once per day if you run low on chips.  Additional chip packages are available for purchase from $2.49 to $39.99.
Club Live Premium Membership

Club Live is the best way to enjoy LiveAce.  In addition to a large signup and monthly chip award, you get access to Handmaker (which shows you real time odds of making strong hands) and a higher daily “top up” reload.  You may also choose from over two dozen custom avatars and enjoy advertising-free poker.  As a Club Live member you may also purchase chip packages a la carte.  Club Live is only $24.99 per month.
<div>
Eligible States
LiveAce operates within the U.S. sweepstakes laws (where applicable).  Please only contribute if you reside in one of the following US states:
<div>

Alaska, Arizona, California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, District of Columbia, Florida, Hawaii, Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Louisiana, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Nebraska, Nevada, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, Ohio, Oregon, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Texas, Utah, Vermont, Virginia, West Virginia, Wisconsin, Wyoming.
<div>
Club Live Custom Avatars
You'll be able to choose from over two dozen avatars including:
<div>
Club Live Handmaker Feature
Handmaker shows you real time odds of making strong hands by the river.  It updates dynamically on the flop, turn and river.
Closing Words
Thanks for your support.  Please check the Updates section for the latest news.  Even if you're not able to contribute please tell your friends about our campaign.

column13: >Ten students, one goal. To produce a game from scratch. We called it Fallen from Space. In our game you play as Captain Science, a space captain stranded on a planet trying to get back.
column31:
>

To finish the game we need your support.  To give the game the nice look you want it to have, we need the cool features of Unity Pro. That's nearly the half of the money we put as goal.

Unity Pro offers a lot of options to simply improve the looks and performance of the game.



The rest is split into costs for merchandising, more working time, to make the game multiplayer, and the high quality perks you will get! You should definitely take a look at the list!



First: spread our message. Follow us on Facebook and Twitter and stay tuned to share us all over the world. We're happy for every share and retweet you could give us.

Now here comes the tricky part. Without your financial help, the game will not get to his whole glory. It will stay as a playable beta version, but never could be the game you want it to be. With your help we can finish the game as a whole masterpiece.

column3:
explore San Diego Gun Shops. Then north to L.A. where I'll track down the addresses of all the ""Ring of Fire"" manufacturers. Then headed back to Arizona to see how the van did on the mini-trip.  

The 3rd Leg of the Tour 
September 30th - December 5th
The third leg of the Gun Show Loophole Tour will take us North to Denver to a gun show where Biker Bob will join us on his return to the USA. then we will head south east to Tulsa, OK to set up at the worlds largest Gun Show in Nov. We will also explore the J.M.Davis firearms museum, one of the best. Gun Channels members will meet up in Tulsa for a machine gun shoot after the big gun show. bob will join us headed south to Texas for a few weeks and two gun shows as we explore the gun shops of Texas. We will then head back west to Arizona for the Small Arms Review gun show in Phoenix. Then we break and get ready for the 4th leg of the tour

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div style=""""> <h3 style=""text-align: center

Off The Track is an online browser based horse sim game that is geared around the lives of ""off the track horses"". Many times people think these horses are just put out to pasture or are now useless. We are here to show that these horses can be rehabilitated and turned into some of the best hunter/jumpers or even barrel racers!
• Choose from 5 different breeds currently (we will be expanding our breeds as we do more research into racing breeds).
• Purchase a retired race horse from the track.
• Complete the rehab time before you being training a new discipline.
• Use training tickets to help give your horse an extra boost.
• Choose from 8 disciplines to train and compete your horse in.
• Build your barn up to be the top barn in whatever category you choose.
• Achievable goals.
• Genetics
• Dynamic images to match your horses genetics.
• Plus many more features to come!

The main thing we currently need is extra funding. We can only provide so much out of pocket at the current moment which is hindering the progress. The contributions we receive will go towards paying for programming and site artwork. With your help we will be able to open the site even sooner!
Main things funds will be used for:
• Programming costs
• Site artwork costs
• Hosting costs
What do you get in return?
• A functioning site you can visit and play!
<ul>
• Buying Horses
• Horse Profiles
• Buying and Selling Horses
• Player Profiles
• Messaging
• Forums
• Search Forums
• Bank
<h3 style=""text-align: center

Unfortunately there are many risks involved in these types of sites. Issues may arise such a programmer going missing for a time, artists not completing their work, or running out of funding for a period of time.  We currently feel these issues will be something we can push through if we do encounter them. We will explore every option to keep the site up and running for our valuable members!

We are very aware that some of you just may not be able to contribute financially. If this is the case, there are still ways you can help! Please feel free to share the site anywhere you see fit (as long as no rules are broken!). Any exposure we get will be greatly valued!
Thank you for your support!

MorVee Mobile Coupons
Tired of spending time clipping coupons only to realize at the checkout line that you forgot them at home? So are we, that's why we created MorVee!
MorVee is a mobile app that allows you to find the best deals nearby from your phone. Save only the coupons you want, then just present your phone to the cashier: Instant savings and no worries!
We are very close to launching MorVee! We needto add a few more features to the iOS app and finish development of the Android app, and that's why we need your help!
<div>
MorVee is a win-win

We believe that MorVee is a win-win solution for merchants and customers. Merchants want to find new customers, and you want to save money. With MorVee, stores can send out their coupons to your phone with the MorVee app, and you can take advantage of those special savings instantly! There is no need to wait for the Sunday paper, you'll get the best deals in real time. As and added bonus: MorVee can send notify you of the coupons you're interested in as you approach your favorite stores! you approach your favorite stores, MorVee can even send a FREE text of the deals being offered!
<div>
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can contribute Great! If not, you can stil help! Please share this campaign with as many contacts as you can! Thank you!!!
