All the backers who have paid for postage and told us their address have now received the boxed set and other physical perks. You can also purchase it in Finnish gaming stores (
column6:
etsittava=_170088"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Fantasiapelit or Puolenkuun pelit) or in Sweden at SF Bokhandeln. All three also ship the game anywhere around the world.

The look for more retailers and distributors has begun...
column7:
>Update March 8, 2016:

The boxed set is now published! We will start sending copies to backers...
column8:
>Update December 22, 2015:

Dear backers, thanks for your patience!

* I hope to go through proofreader comments before the New Year, and finally send the game to my designer to get the lay-out done. That way we could print the game early next year.
* We have ordered some new illustrations for the translation, based on feedback we've received from the Finnish players. Three out of four are finished, you can see one of them at the end of this message.
* The translator is starting work on the adventure supplement over the holidays. We hope to have that, too, out early next year.

Over all, things are slowly moving forwards, and we are set to get Age of the Tempest to you next year!

Have a great winter holiday! Here's a little sneak preview of the cottage of the good witch Inya. The concept is inspired by Baba Yaga's house in Russian fairytales. The art is by Marko Laine.
column9:
>

Update, April 30, 2015: 
While still finalizing the proof reading and beginning work on lay-out, we've opened the campaign in ""InDemand."" It means you can use this site to pre-purchase the game even if you didn't participate in the campaign -- or pay for postage, if you did.

column1:
Update, June 27, 2014:

The campaign is over. We will publish the game and the adventure in English, and contact each contributor to make sure they get what is theirs.
We made 5,535€ reaching 111% of our goal. We had 109 backers, and did all this in 42 days. We will get the next generation roleplaying.
Thank you!
Update, June 26:

We reached our goal! Thank you so much! This means all of you who believed in the campaign will get at least a PDF copy of Ville Vuorela's fairytale-like adventure for Age of the Tempest. (And whatever else is in your Perk.)

We have seventeen hours to go, and if we raise another 881€, we'll unlock our first stretch goal: a mini monster manual. It's going to be great, so let's keep on rocking on, and remind everyone this is their last chance to jump on board...
Update, June 25:

First stretch goal announced! If we reach 6000€, we will release a second supplement: A monster manual. And I hope to make it the best monster manual in the world with not just statistics, but also great pictures, stories, and references to real world science, mythology and psychology from which these creatures come from. All backers will get this as a PDF, and everyone who contributed for 50€ or more will get a physical copy.
Let's keep pushing, friends!
Update, June 24:

We have reached our second Social Goal: 1000 shares on Facebook. If we make our goal, everyone who backed the campaign (even if it's for just 1€), will now get a PDF of the supplement. See Updates for more info, and a great sketch from the supplement artist. Let's get those kids roleplaying, friends! :)
Update, June 5:

First Social Goal reached: 500 shares on Facebook! As a thank you we're announcing a collaborative Author's Commentary, and the opportunity to become a playtester! See Updates for more info! And keep spreading the good word! :)
Update, June 3:
We went over 400 shares and 20% of funding yesterday! Thank you!
I also added some links to reviews and news about Age of the Tempest at the bottom of the page. Check them out! :)
Update, May 31:

We've received excellent attention on social media, and you guys have shared this campaign like there's no tomorrow. Thank you! Unfortunately our goal has been badly formulated, and people coming to the site haven't become funders, even though they've loved the concept.

So we're revamping the campaign a little bit: The initial goal is much lower with the aim of creating a fancy supplement for Age of the Tempest. (Later on, we still have the stretch goal of making more translations, but that's too early for now.)
Short Summary

Age of the Tempest is a tabletop roleplaying game for kids and beginners. We crowdfunded it in Finland two years ago, published last year in Finnish, and distributed it to gaming stores, book stores and even supermarkets. Now we want to do the same in English, and later in other languages.

column3:
/>

We already have the game translated into English, and now we want to get it out there. (You can use this campaign to pre-order your own copy with the Boxed Set and Full Set perks.)

 

If we reach our goal, we'll also publsh a high quality supplement adventure for the game by designer Ville Vuorela, art by Marko Laine. If we reach our 6000€ stretch goal, we'll release a small monster manual.

The main motivation for this campaign is to introduce roleplaying to the new generation. Thanks for your help!

column1:
Who is this guy?

My name is Mike Pohjola, I'm a game designer and writer from Finland. I've written novels, screenplays, transmedia productions, mobile games, stage musicals, comics, and have been recognized for them in the real world with an Emmy nomination, a Prix Europa, and that kind of stuff. But my real passion lies with role-playing games.
I started playing role-playing games in 1988 when my scout master introduced us to the Dungeons &
column2: Dragons ""Red Box"" set. Since then I've played and run countless table-top role-playing games and larps, and designed four table-top role-playing games myself.

column1: I'm one of a generation that started playing with the many beginner-friendly games of the late 80s and early 90s. Since then there's always been role-playing games available for us, of increasing complexity, and always speaking to us at a level suitable for our age and interests. So right now there are really many excellent role-playing games for 30-40 year-old experienced gamers.

But there are no role-playing games for a kid of eight or ten or twelve who's kind of interested, but doesn't know where to start. We fixed this problem in Finland last year, and now you and I will to fix this problem around the world!
Roleplaying for kids
Age of the Tempest is an entry-level tabletop roleplaying game for kids. Nothing like this has been available for a generation, so it's up to us to remedy the situation.

The story is a fantasy adventure about a group of brave rebels who live in a secret camp in the forest and fight against an evil witch emperor, in the vein of Robin Hood, Star Wars and Knights of the Round Table. And yes, it has lots of strong female characters!
A good introductory roleplaying game and a good kids' roleplaying game are not necessarily the same, but this one is both.
The whole thing begins with a short solo adventure that is an introduction to roleplaying, to the world and the story, and to the basic rules mechanics. (If you remember the Dungeons &
column2: Dragons Red Box with Aleena the Cleric and Bargle the Magic-User, then this serves the same purpose.)

column1: After that we take our time explaining all the concepts you need to know when creating a character (from seven exciting archetypes), and so on.

Character creation is fairly streamlined with giving you a few choices (""choose one of two skills/weapons"", ""choose your weakness""), but not forcing you to go through skill lists or anything like that. There's plenty of time for more complex stuff later.

The Game Master's Guide is also targeted for beginners, meaning that if you just got the game as a birthday present this morning, you can run it for your friends at the party in the afternoon. While you're doing that, you learn the tricks of the trade, and eventually will get to do a bit of designing, too.

Most of the GM Guide is a pre-made campaign which continues directly from where the solo adventure left you. It has twists and turns, memorable characters and -- of course -- interesting opponents, puzzles and decisions. I'm a professional writer with experience in writing for children and young adults, so while the story is cool and exciting, it doesn't have any elements that you couldn't have in a Star Wars film or a Harry Potter book.

There are Age of the Tempest clubs and groups springing up all over, some of them with an experienced or adult GM, others where the kids play by themselves. Judging from the feedback, both have worked really well.

I've played the game with my 60+ parents, and my son who's almost four, and all of them have enjoyed it. It would help if he could read, but we're doing ok. (There's one monster that I won't show him until his six, though.)
What We Need

We're not asking your money to make the game. We already have the game! We crowdfunded it two years ago in Finland, and published it last year in Finnish. We have the game design, the story, the art, the lay-out, all the content is there. It's available in Finnish gaming stores, book stores, toy stores, libraries, and even supermarkets, and people are starting role-playing clubs all over the country.
We already have an English translation, and demoed it at the Essen game fair last October.

Next, and this is where you come in, we want to properly publish and distribute the English version in English speaking countries and for those who want it in other countries. And create supplements for it: adventures, new character classes and skills, monster manuals and such.
Our initial goal is an original Age of the Tempest adventure designed by Finnish game design guru Ville Vuorela (of Stalker and Praedor fame).

If we reach 6000€, we'll release a second supplement: A monster manual. And I hope to make it the best monster manual in the world with not just statistics, but also great pictures, stories, and references to real world science, mythology and psychology from which these creatures come from.

If we reach our 50000€ stretch goal, we'll be able to afford a new translation, and have Age of the Tempest available in a third language. We'll contact you then, and have a vote on which language it should be!

So thanks to the people of Finland, we already have the game. Now we need your help to make it available for you! (The game is in no way specific to Finland, international distribution was our secret master plan all along!)
What You Get

So what do you get out of it? For me one key motivation was to make sure my own son will have a chance to play role-playing games when he's a few years older. (Actually, I couldn't resist, we're already playing Age of the Tempest. He's almost four years old, and he plays the big brutish warrior guy Stallo.)
The main product of the campaign is, of course, a beautiful boxed set of Age of the Tempest - Sword of the High King. Plus we have tee shirts, wallpapers, and other fancy stuff.

Then, if we get enough funds, we'll be able to make supplements, sequels, adventures, monster manuals, new skills and character classes, prose anthologies, comic books, and apps to help you get further into the world of Age of the Tempest.
If you're feeling really generous, we have some high-end stuff available, as well, such as signed art prints, deluxe edition books, exclusive gaming sessions and more!
The story so far...
This whole thing started two years ago with a crowdfunding campaign that I launched in northern Europe's biggest RPG convention Ropecon in Finland. The goal was $12 500 and we made $16 029. Yay!

The project back then was to self-publish a prototype thousand-copy print-run of the game in Finnish re-using existing art I'd get from friendly artists. And to use that prototype to convince publishers, distributors, and retailers that they need to make a proper version of this game available for the kids of today.

Things escalated quickly. I got offers of help from artists, proof-readers and many other people, and suddenly we had a plan for getting proper new art for the game. Then we got lots of publicity for the project. Then we made our funding goal in about half of the time we'd reserved for it. It started to look like this would be a pretty well-made prototype.

And then the success of the crowdfunding campaign right here on IndieGoGo convinced Europe's fourth biggest board game publisher Tactic (based in Finland) that there was something to this thing. Boom! Now we had a publisher and a distributor, and a print-run of many thousands. And then together with them, we were able to use the successful crowdfunding campaign to convince retailers that they really have this game on their shelves.

And thus for the first time in twenty years bookstores, toy stores and supermarkets are selling a role-playing game. In a box! And people are buying it. And best of all, kids are playing it! Kids who'd never role-played before. (Also many other beginners, including my parents, who are both over 60.)
The Finnish-language boxed set was published in Ropecon in July 2013. We've shipped the copies to crowdfunders, and are planning sequels and supplements now.

At the Essen game fair in Germany in Octoboer 2013 we already had an English language prototype under the working title ""Heroes of the Storm"". Now we've settled on Age of the Tempest - Sword of the High King!
How your money is used

How will the money from the crowdfunding campaign be used? The exact percentages are dependant on the money we make and the perks selected, but if we make exactly 5000€ and everybody selects the ""Boxed set"" perk for 60€, the money will be divided like this.

Which means if we get 5000€, we'll have enough to make the new adventure supplement. If we get 6000€, we'll make a little monster manual. But if we get more, we'll have new stuff we can make. And (as per our earlier goal), if we make 50000€, we can afford a new translation to bring Age of the Tempest into a third language.
As we go bigger, some percentages go up, others go down. But this is the rough outline. We will keep updating the budget to reflect the current status of the campaign.

Postage

If you've paid for something physical (such as the game box), and you don't want to pick it up from wherever we happen to be, you will probably have to pay for the postage and packing. (Unless your perk says otherwise.)

Finland: 13€
Europe: 24€
Globally: 33€
The only exception to this is, if you just want the Player's Guide without the box. In that case we can send it as a regular letter, and it's only 5€ no matter where you live!

Risks

No crowdfunding campaign is entirely without risks, but the ones here aren't too big.

The worst case scenario is that we don't reach 5000 €, and can't afford a new supplement. But we will still have the game available in English and Finnish, and you get your perks in one of those languages.
After that, we can use the publicity, the good-will, the community, and the interest to generate translations and distribution deals through traditional channels.
But let's make sure it doesn't come to that, but instead we will get lots of supplements and translations, and have Age of the Tempest available in your local supermarket, too!
Other Ways You Can Help
We don't just need your money! I mean, we do need your money, but there are many other ways in which you can help us.
<ul>
• Tell everybody about Age of the Tempest!
• Use IndieGoGo's sharing tools, or just post the link to your social medias of choice.
• Join the team! We need translators, proofreaders, play testers, and lots of other people to help make this happen!
• Contact us with feedback about the campaign, and new ideas for perks, stretch goals, and other stuff.
• Get really excited about this. :)
Thanks!
In the news!
We've been featured on several media. Here's a small selection.
Daily Illuminator: Crowdfunding focus: Age of the Tempest

GMS Magazine: ""The game itself is fine. Fine indeed, I’d say. It’s easy to get to grips with. The division between the Player and the Game Master’s Guide is well thought out, the classes are very nice and with plenty of opportunity to expand… everything is there!""
Turun Sanomat: Mike Pohjola creates Finland's first crowdfunded roleplaying game. (In Finnish.)
Dome: Crowdfunded Age of the Tempest published. (In Finnish.)
Yle Radio: Mike Pohjola talks about roleplaying. (In Finnish.)
Burger's Notebook: ""the concept and theme of Myrskyn Sankarit are solid gold. If you want to use a traditional fantasy setting for drawing in new players, this is the setting for you.""

Kids who'd never role-played before. (Also many other beginners, including my parents, who are both over 60.)
The Finnish-language boxed set was published in Ropecon in July 2013. We've shipped the copies to crowdfunders, and are planning sequels and supplements now.

At the Essen game fair in Germany in Octoboer 2013 we already had an English language prototype under the working title ""Heroes of the Storm"". Now we've settled on Age of the Tempest - Sword of the High King!
How your money is used

How will the money from the crowdfunding campaign be used? The exact percentages are dependant on the money we make and the perks selected, but if we make exactly 5000€ and everybody selects the ""Boxed set"" perk for 60€, the money will be divided like this.

Which means if we get 5000€, we'll have enough to make the new adventure supplement. If we get 6000€, we'll make a little monster manual. But if we get more, we'll have new stuff we can make. And (as per our earlier goal), if we make 50000€, we can afford a new translation to bring Age of the Tempest into a third language.
As we go bigger, some percentages go up, others go down. But this is the rough outline. We will keep updating the budget to reflect the current status of the campaign.

PostageIf you've paid for something physical (such as the game box), and you don't want to pick it up from wherever we happen to be, you will probably have to pay for the postage and packing. (Unless your perk says otherwise.)
Finland: 13€Europe: 24€Globally: 33€
The only exception to this is, if you just want the Player's Guide without the box. In that case we can send it as a regular letter, and it's only 5€ no matter where you live!
RisksNo crowdfunding campaign is entirely without risks, but the ones here aren't too big.

The worst case scenario is that we don't reach 5000 €, and can't afford a new supplement. But we will still have the game available in English and Finnish, and you get your perks in one of those languages.
After that, we can use the publicity, the good-will, the community, and the interest to generate translations and distribution deals through traditional channels.
But let's make sure it doesn't come to that, but instead we will get lots of supplements and translations, and have Age of the Tempest available in your local supermarket, too!
Other Ways You Can Help
We don't just need your money! I mean, we do need your money, but there are many other ways in which you can help us.
Tell everybody about Age of the Tempest!
Use IndieGoGo's sharing tools, or just post the link to your social medias of choice.
Join the team! We need translators, proofreaders, play testers, and lots of other people to help make this happen!
Contact us with feedback about the campaign, and new ideas for perks, stretch goals, and other stuff.
Get really excited about this. :)
Thanks!
In the news!
We've been featured on several media. Here's a small selection.
Daily Illuminator: Crowdfunding focus: Age of the Tempest

GMS Magazine: ""The game itself is fine. Fine indeed, I’d say. It’s easy to get to grips with. The division between the Player and the Game Master’s Guide is well thought out, the classes are very nice and with plenty of opportunity to expand… everything is there!""
Turun Sanomat: Mike Pohjola creates Finland's first crowdfunded roleplaying game. (In Finnish.)
Dome: Crowdfunded Age of the Tempest published. (In Finnish.)
Yle Radio: Mike Pohjola talks about roleplaying. (In Finnish.)

Burger's Notebook: ""the concept and theme of Myrskyn Sankarit are solid gold. If you want to use a traditional fantasy setting for drawing in new players, this is the setting for you.""",17.0,0,"2 Campaigns

Hi, I’m John of Game Maker Industries, and I’d like to tell you about a FREE online card game that we are trying to bring to everyone, called Legacy of the Craftsman.

To create LotC, I've taken competitive card gaming, and combined it with cooperative story telling. This gives us a setting much like traditional Dungeons and Dragons, but without so much of the role-play. When we create character avatars and develop our back story, you can think of the process as being much more like piecing together the elements of a graphic novel. We keep this process clean and simple
column2:
allowing us to jump in and out of our fantasy with the speed and ease of a video game.

Legacy of the Craftsman is a deep and compelling universe
column3:
in which you can craft your own legacy, by using innovative card mechanics in free-style Story Play. But, of all of LotC’s amazing Story Play features, the speed, strategy, and intensity of its highly competitive League Play, is unparalleled in the fantasy card gaming genre.

To create that speed and ferocity in a match, LotC uses a defined rule set, giving us a game reminiscent of Poker, Spades, or Euchre. With the League Rules minimized, Legacy of the Craftsman is an easy game to learn, but challenging to master.

League Play happens once a week for approximately twenty weeks
column4: and at the end of the each season, we shake up the rules. Abilities, Classifications, Types and their advantages, as well as banned or restricted lists are all eligible for amendment. But the real kicker is that these changes aren’t made up at GMI
column5:
they are in fact, decided by you the player! These decisions are crafted from the communal vote of all LotC players, with the choices of league leaders and tournament winners weighing more heavily on the scale.

This means that you and your friends can now band together, develop a fighting style, and actually attempt to craft an advantage for yourselves from one season to the next, by both competing well and spamming that “like” button!

LotC is a card crafting game meaning you will never need to buy packs full of filler cards, or hunt down overpriced singles to build a competitive deck
column6: you simply craft whatever card you want. By using our visually driven online interface, you can drag and drop elements to build cards with ease
column7:
or choose from a number of available free and premium premade products. You can even download and use the cards, decks, and other content shared by other community members.

If you play on-line for FREE, you will never need to pay to play, compete, or win. Or better yet, if you prefer table top gamming, print your very own league legal cards at home, compete face to face with your opponent, and submit the results! We can even get 52 professionally printed custom crafted cards delivered to your door in just a few days, for less than 10 bucks!

Would like to play a game that brings infinite fantasy, hardcore card play, and a shot at cash and prizes, as well as control over the future of your gaming experience
column8:
all together in one FREE online game? Then we need your help! Right now, Legacy of the Craftsman is an idea, trying to become a product. Of course a monetary contribution is welcome, but the most helpful thing you could do is like, follow, and share Game Maker Industries on Facebook and Indiegogo.

I thank you for your consideration and contribution to making the future of gaming better.

*figure 1: synopsis

All of my life I have loved to play and create games
column9:
using them to teach my children, entertain my friends, and as a vector for storytelling. Games are my passion, and I want to share that passion with others. LotC is not just a card game, but also a community in which people from across the street or across the world collaborate to craft the game experience that they have always wanted.  

We are currently in the Alpha Phase of development
column10: meaning that, we are testing the game rules (Alpha) and crafting elements
column11:
and are finishing the main storyline while we continue to develop the collaborative story creation features. Funding for this phase secures resources and expertise we cannot generate in-house, but must have to continue.

*figure 2 bullets of features.

Goals

For the Alpha Phase we are setting a goal of $2000. This is going to be allocated to some basic start up expenses: Legal, marketing/promotional, product development and miscellaneous expenses.

 

Every dollar counts and not every resource is a dollar. Just as in LotC, there are many ways to help. Are you an artist? Are you a word smith? Do you like to play games? The ways in which you could help and contribute to making the Legacy Universe a reality are immeasurable. If you would like to see where you fit in, email us at  moreinfo.gmi@gmail.com. Please use “human resource” as the subject line. And if you can’t do anything else share us, this is an investment that we recognize and appreciate, as your contribution.

PERKS Detailed

$1: Every dollar counts. You will receive a thank you in the comments on our Indiegogo and on our Game Maker Industries Facebook page. In addition, there will be a special thank you given to all of our Alpha phase contributors in the credits of the final game.

$5: Still counting. You will receive a thank you in the comments on our
Indiegogo and on our Game Maker Industries Facebook page. In addition, there will be a special thank you given to all of our Alpha phase contributors in the credits of the final game.

$15: Backer. In this tier you receive everything from the “Still Counting” Tier, plus you get a digital copy of the Limited Edition Alpha Contributor’s League Starter Deck.
**This deck will have special markings designating it as being from the Alpha campaign. You can show your friends that you were one of the first to begin carving out your Legacy.

**This will be an approximately 40card, league ready deck with bonus customizable spares.

**If we beat our goal then this Tier will also receive another digital deck of the Game Maker’s choosing.

$30: Contributor. In this tier you receive everything from the “Backer” Tier
column12:
in addition you will receive a second digital deck of the Game Maker’s choosing.

**If we beat our goals then this tier will then receive a printed copy of the Alpha Contributor’s Starter deck.

**Shipping outside of the continental US is not included

 

$500: Designer’s Package. In this tier, you receive everything from the “Contributor’s” Tier, plus you also get the exciting opportunity to collaborate with the Game Maker to create a race within the Legacy Universe. This will be an exclusive perk during the Alpha phase, as these races will be written into the prologue of the accompanying story of the Legacy of the Craftsman. You will have direct input as to: the type of Crafter they are (i.e. magic, technology, psionics, etc), appearance, name, and help to flesh out a little bit about their Legacy. The most convenient method of collaboration will be discussed with the individual contributors. If you have questions please email: moreinfo.gmi@gmail.com.

***all decks will be furnished just prior to the official
release, giving our contributors a sneak peek before the general public

***shipping outside the continental US is not included on
any perks that include physical merchandise

Myrddin Tales is a point and click adventure about a young wizard and his first few days learning magic at an academy. As the story unfolds, the wizard begins to learn that his destiny is much bigger than he ever expected.

Better Bug Games has already released two titles this year but, this title is more art intensive than anything else we've done before. With that in mind, we have expanded our team and now have a true artist providing the art for this title. Your funding will help us procure the necessary art assets and provide us the ability to properly test and refine our biggest project yet!

Please help anyway you can The Better Bug Games team is dedicated to bring you fun, innovative games to play but we need your help! Follow us at http://www.betterbuggames.com/ or on fb http://www.facebook.com/betterbuggames and also enjoy daily messages from our old pirate friend Slow Pete follow him at http://www.facebook.com/slowpete.thepirate or http://twitter.com/slowpetepirate

The Problem

Have you ever had your buddies over and wanted to have a big game of Call of Duty, Halo or Madden? Then you realized that you only have one TV and one console, so some of your friends would have to sit and wait? Have you wanted to throw a party for your child but were worried about 20 kids running through your house causing havoc? GameTruck can solve those problems and plenty more!
Here it Comes!
The Solution!

GameTruck is a mobile video game platform designed to give a premiere console multiplayer experience to groups of people. It's great for parents and kids. Inside the GameTruck trailer there are large flat-screen TV's and console systems like Xbox, Playstation and Wii. Gamers come in and pick from a wall of games to play and off they go. GameTruck is exploring ideas for an education program, taking the power of gaming and using it to educate school age children on a variety of subjects.
Core Values
<ul>
<li>

Respect the Games: The GameTruck generation is one that will get to re-experience the thrill of collaboration and playing together. Today’s video games offer great opportunities for learning and socialization. We are here to help parents learn to use games as a tool for socialization rather than as a catalyst for isolation.
<li>

Respect the Video Game Lifestyle: GameTruck players get moving! Physical activity and gaming cannot be mutually exclusive. This generation of kids is learning to play in a new way and we are on a mission to show how to embrace the games in a manner that leads to a healthy life style.
<li>

Respect Mom: Parents are the decision makers when it comes to gaming and we are here to help you learn how to manage your child’s gaming activities even if you are not a gamer. We will help you not only sort through the labyrinth of games, but also give you core tactics and strategies for creating a positive and healthy gaming environment in her home.
<li>

Respect Education: Behind every game is a great mind. Game developers are mathematicians, scientists, computer programmers, and artists. Leveraging the unique connection kids have with gaming to spur their interests in math and science is a core objective of GameTruck. We work with schools to create programs that help kids to explore the possibilities of the world around them.
The Need

We are here at IndieGoGo to get the last amount of funding needed to start business, We've already raised about half of what we need though loans but we've done as much as we can with traditional funding. We're so close, it's so exciting! This business is all about having fun and bringing video games out of the basement! We need $40,000 to complete our funding. The money will go to buying a truck to tow the trailer, the wrap on the truck and the franchise &
column2: territory fee's. Remember this is an all or nothing project so I need any support you can give.

column1: Once funding is complete we just have to wait for the trailer to finish construction then we are in business!! The Rewards will start being sent out as soon as the project ends.
If you have any questions or if you have something specific you'd like as a reward, please feel free to send me a message.

Also - for the Etched glass designs, if you'd like something specific let me know and I'll see if we can work that out.

Hello, my name is Cameron ""Seki"" Znojemsky, Co-Founder of Nexrus, i have been with Nexrus for over 5 years.

Project: OVH, is a game i have been developing over the past 3 months, why is this project important to me you might say?, Well this is actually my first Solo Project, myself Producing, Art, Programming and even Sound!.

Your contributions will help IMMENSELY, as this game started off small, but includes things such as Race Morale!, after deciding to finally study networking in games(as my background as a Network Engineer) and developing client server relations, i have decided to put OVH ONLINE!, But before i do that, I need you!

Project: OVH, is a Sidescrolling Tower Defense game for Windows, Android and iOS, and if we reach past our Goal, Linux, Mac and even Windows 8 Phone!, OVH is based on a Fantasy world, where you select your own Race, VS People on Different Platforms, you can Fire the Cannons, Protect your Castle with a Wall, Make a Mill to quickly get Wood back to base, OR that Mill can make Soldiers fall into a Pit where they are destoried!, make Soldiers to take out Archers and Other Soldiers, or even Hero's to annilate them all including other Hero's!

Using your tactics to guide these warriors, you will need the help of the kings! These kings boost your Morale, to allow you to gather more wood, or if your doing badly, they will start to try and boost your Morale, to lead you to victory!
Check out a Alpha Version of the game in the video above! (watch it in HD for Art Goodness)

By supporting OVH, you support Single Indie developers, trying to reach out to a broad media, i know this is a big task, and i have working Alphas of Online Play!, Its hard to get noticed as a Indie Developer these days, especially on Mobile devices, as it seems to be over grown by AA Developers, I would just like to fullfill my dream of becoming a Full Time Game Developer, like most of you might.

I have bundled some nice perks, for you AND your friends!, i have tried my hardest to deliver a nice quality of perks, so maybe you would support me!, Villager perks are cheap and fun, AND really do feel that you would get the full game experience on your Mobile without Ads!
The other great perk, Hero, lets you become a VIP, giving you Quick Gameplay ASWELL AS, 3 Serials for Windows and 3 Serials for iOS and Android, allowing 5 other friends to play with you.

But ultimately, the funniest perk of them all, is Founder, You will work with me designing your OWN Race, wether it be a Werewolfs or Pandas, the limit is your imagine with my help via skype, we will work together and add a race to your design!

I think all of us here want Indie's to eventually break out of the mold to deliver quality games even to the standard of AA Developers, we all have different dreams, But for some like myself, Game Developer or die trying.
Developing for nexrus has showed me alot, including a full Scale Windows based MMO, using the latest server technology and theroms to deliver a immense gaming experience.
Working with developers who are passionate i have created Blow Away and Ice, on Android App Store, the timeframe within those 2 games were 2 months each, and we delivered a quality product.
With OVH, i have set a longer time frame dedicated myself, leaving my full time job, just to work on OVH!
Sure you can help there are plenty of ways...

Like us on Facebook? http://www.facebook.com/nexrusnation
Follow us on Twitter? http://twitter.com/#!/officialnexrus
Subscribe to our Youtube Channel? http://www.youtube.com/officialnexrus

Or even download Blow Away or Ice from the google play store (FOR FREE!)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
I thank you all for EVEN considering helping me with this project, and, With your help we can make a difference for indie gamers, including myself!

I would appreciate it, if you could share this with other people, that would be great!

But ultimately, the funniest perk of them all, is Founder, You will work with me designing your OWN Race, wether it be a Werewolfs or Pandas, the limit is your imagine with my help via skype, we will work together and add a race to your design!

I think all of us here want Indie's to eventually break out of the mold to deliver quality games even to the standard of AA Developers, we all have different dreams, But for some like myself, Game Developer or die trying.
Developing for nexrus has showed me alot, including a full Scale Windows based MMO, using the latest server technology and theroms to deliver a immense gaming experience.
Working with developers who are passionate i have created Blow Away and Ice, on Android App Store, the timeframe within those 2 games were 2 months each, and we delivered a quality product.
With OVH, i have set a longer time frame dedicated myself, leaving my full time job, just to work on OVH!
Sure you can help there are plenty of ways...
Like us on Facebook? http://www.facebook.com/nexrusnationFollow us on Twitter? http://twitter.com/#!/officialnexrusSubscribe to our Youtube Channel? http://www.youtube.com/officialnexrus
Or even download Blow Away or Ice from the google play store (FOR FREE!)https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
I thank you all for EVEN considering helping me with this project, and, With your help we can make a difference for indie gamers, including myself!
I would appreciate it, if you could share this with other people, that would be great!",7.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Ipswich, Australia",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/project-ovh/pica

About Objective Deck
We are a small team of Pokemon TCG fanatics that are looking for unique ways to grow the skill level of eSports:
<ul>
• Our team consists of Professional Pokemon TCG Player Zach Lesage and Data Scientist Mikey Wityk.
• We've already bootstrapped our website without any outside investors and would love some help from the community to implement new functions to the website.
• Contributing to this project allows us to hire on our existing developers to implement new functions to the website ASAP.
<h3>What We Need &amp
Break it down for folks in more detail:
<ul>
• We're looking for $2000.00 USD to pay our developers to implement a handful of new functions to objectivedeck.com to help the Pokemon TCG community for free.
• Rewards for contributors include virtual meet-and- greets, gaining access to new website functions, and full website advertisement sponsorships.
• We won't stop to see our dreams come true and any funds that are below our goal or of excess to our goal will go towards developers implementing new functions on our website.
The Impact
We've already launched Objective Deck without any outside funding so we're all in. We want to see this website reach it's true potential and we see the value to share it with the Indiegogo community.
<ul>
• We've effectively raised the skill gap in Pokemon by sharing data-driven analytics that the game hasn't shared before.
• Zach has been a professional Pokemon TCG player for half a decade now and has most built up a successful social media branding under his own name.
• Mikey has received numerous awards for his contributions, such as the 2020Nikola Tesla Best in Innovation Award.
• Our winning team has great chemistry, charisma, and we will make Objective Deck the best way to improve players in the Pokemon TCG Online.
<h3>Risks &amp
We've invested countless hours, bootstrapped the website ourselves, and have vigorously found the best development team for the job:
<ul>
• Few websites can implement new functions as quickly and effectively as ours can due to our passionate working nature.
• Our current obstacle is the financial cost to implementing new features because website developers aren't free.
• We will look for unique ways to raise money while keeping this project ""ours"" as much as possible.
Other Ways You Can Help
If we donated to every project we believed in, we we need much more than Indiegogo funding, so we understand that everyone isn't able to contribute to this project.
<ul>
• Let people know about https://www.objectivedeck.com and feel free to use it yourself
• Join our Discord community to help grow our passionate userbase https://discord.gg/4KGXmVmCn6
• Feel free to use the Indiegogo sharing options to spread the word

Thank You

What is Reincarnated As A Monster?


Reincarnated As A Monster is an RPG game. You will be the player who became a monster and tries to survive on Fantasy World. At the beginning of the game, you will choose which monster you want to become. Of course, is weak at first, but you can evolve to a stronger monster when you meet the requirements. Every kind of starter monster can evolve into many kinds of monster, not just one way like Pokemon. For example, slime can become stronger slime or even another type of monster like Golem!

Evolution Chart for Ball Beast


It is total freedom on what you want to do and what you want to become, but I need to warn you this world is CRUEL, you will easily rip by stronger monsters or just because you eat something wrong. Every time you die will be a direct game over(Unless you use the revive item). SO, You need to be PREPARED, you will die a lot in the early game!

Make a wise choice, or just...Game Over

At the beginning of the game, you are so weak that even have a chance to lose to a group of slime, so we added a training system. You can increase your stats other than just battle and level up, you can also train it, just by a single click! Of course, it will cost you time and stamina. There are no such things can let you became strongest just by clicking.

Became stronger just by one click! (Of course, it cost time too)

Skill can be said as the most important part of an RPG game, in this game you can learn a new skill by using skill points or doing something. Yes, you can learn a skill by doing something or eating something in the game! Of course, when you level up or defeat some monsters you will also gain some skill points. Skill Points are for learning a new skill or upgrade skill. And when you learned some of the skills and reach the max level they will evolve and become new and stronger skill!

Skill Evolve when reaching max level

 

MEMBER:

Hi Everyone! We are SPIRITWING. We are a group of gamer(to be exact,2 of us now). 

 I am the founder of SPIRITWING and also the game programmer. My Name is Ting Chok Kiat, a guy who enjoy playing 2D games more than 3D games, single-player games than multiplayer games. I like RPG and ADV game which more focus on the story. 

 

Another member is Ystyle, he is too shy to show his face, so no photo. He is a UI artist, our game icons and looks is designed by him.

 UNITY 3D:   This opens up the possibility for unparalleled visuals, cross-platform support, and faster development! 

 SINGLE PLAYER: No PvP, no need to compare to others. 

 100+ Playable characters:  You can have more than one choices every time you can evolve, some choices need special requirement to unlock! Below just show the beast starting race evolution chart. So you can imagine there will be a lot more hidden Evolution waiting for you to discover.

A lot of choices you can choose to evolve!

 1000+ events:  Have a lot of story events waiting for you to explore! Every choice you make will affect some part of the world! At first, you just reincarnated into a monster. After some time, you will encounter some forced event. 

You can choose to join the devil army to help monster defeat humans. Then discover some SECRETS of this world.

Join the Devil Army?

Or join the human party, it will lead you to another part of the SECRETS of this world.

Replaying the game as a different side, it will finally unlock the TRUTH of this world.

 Active Time Strategy Battle System: It is a classic strategy battle system with a tweak, who will move first depends on character stats. And character can move multiple times if speed is higher than other characters multiple time!

according to your speed, it decide how far you can move

Select your skill to attack enemy

Enjoy Skill animation

Gain Experience after defeating an enemy

 Party &
column2:
Recruit System: In some events or win in a battle with other monsters, you can recruit enemies into your party!

 

 300+ skills:  You can learn different skills in the game! But depending on your character's stats there may use different skill learning point!  As your character is a water element, it will be harder to learn fire skill, easier to learn water skill.

Learn different skills!

Skill will evolve to higher-level skill when it reaches max level!

 Title System: Some move you do in the game may gain you a title. For example: Slay a dragon will get ""Dragon Slayer"". There will be different effect for some titles, more than 100 titles waiting for you to dig out!

After you achieve something special, you will gain a title

 MAP Encounter: You will be moving around the world and encounter events when you walk! It will make every time you playing experience different!

Encounter events when you walk on the map

 AND SO MUCH MORE!  (NEW Character? Skill? PLEDGE NOW TO MAKE IT HAPPEN!) Beta Test will be around the end of June! Support us now to get early access to beta test!  

 We’re not looking to stretch, we’re looking to FLEX! We’re a small team of people who will conjure the best possible adventure with even the minimum amount, but there are certain goals that could summon forth this beast’s final form. Here’s what we want to do, with even more over-the-top additions revealed as we climb higher and higher!  

The minimum goal is used for us to sustain during development time, not starve to death. If got extra more, we will modify the game to make it better.

Backer Reward Tier

THANK YOU INDIEGOGO BACKERS

We have completed our Indiegogo campaign with over 9000 backers! Thank you for helping us to design, manufacture and deliver the Ultimate Gaming Grip for the Switch. 

We are currently taking orders on our website at www.satisfye.com online. There, you can order the Satisfye Pro Gaming Grip, Elite Bundle, Mini-Grip and other, brand new products. Our Grip is acclaimed for providing a comfortable and sturdy experience featuring our unique asymmetric design. The Pro Gaming Grip is designed for mobile mode, and the mini-grip is designed for docked mode.

Visit www.satisfye.com online to order with immediate availability and fulfillment! 

Below you can still learn about the Satisfye Pro Gaming Grip! 

Thank you,

Phillip and the Satisfye Team

 

Pro Gaming Grip for the Nintendo Switch®

The small switch controllers put the burden of supporting the switch on your fingers, limiting control and making the switch uncomfortable for adult hands. The secret to our design is its asymmetrical layout. By angling your hands outward we are able to set your thumb at the ideal angle for accessing the joystick. The result is a grip that feels just like holding a pro console controller. The bottom hooks on our design hold and secure your Nintendo Switch in place and also act as a convenient stand to set your device down vertically.

 

The Satisfye pro gaming grip is more comfortable and ergonomic. Designed here in California by the founder and a team of mechanical engineers and ergonomics experts, we have worked to create the absolute best gaming grip for the Nintendo Switch.

The natural resting place for your right thumb is inward, toward the interior of the controller. The Satisfye pro gaming grip has an asymmetric design which places your thumb closer to its natural resting position. Most grips fail to place your right hand in the correct, ergonomic position, and the result with these grips or going gripless is your hand can become fatigued or cramped. With the Satisfye pro gaming grip, your hands are always in the perfect position.
 
 

Check Out the Final Shipping Pro Gaming Grip in Action In This Comprehensive Overview
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

Elite Bundle - With Case Designed to Hold Your Battery and Charge Your Switch Inside the Case

Our Elite Backers receive the Satisfye Pro Gaming Grip, contoured Thumb Pads, premium Travel Carry Case, and quick charging USB-C cable. The Elite Bundle includes our super-premium case which has room for a large battery below your switch so you can charge your Switch, on the go, in the case. We bundle a low profile USB-C cable so you can charge in the case or standing upright on your tabletop. If you want the full Satisfye Pro Gaming Grip experience - PLEDGE THE ELITE BUNDLE.
 

    Over-engineering is our motto and we have meticulously thought out each major feature. This includes a rubberized grips that not only feel amazing in your hands but prevents long term fatigue by sticking to them naturally.

     

    Our premium carrying case is unlike any other on the market. From material to craftsmanship, you will find it hard to source another case at this level of quality.

column1: • Elastic velcro straps to secure your Nintendo Switch
• Battery Bank compartment designed to hold almost every batter bank and is secured into place with an elastic band
• Cable trays keep things nice and neat when you are charging your Switch while it waits for you inside the case using our quick-charging 2.4a USB A to C cable.
<li>Holds your Switch &amp
• Carrying up to 20 Game Cards
<li>Secret Cash &amp
• Massive storage for Joycons and other accessories in the top pocket
• Rubber zipper inside and out to protect your Switch from scratching
• High quality stitching and carrying handle

Your Nintendo Switch® is secure and well seated in the Satisfye pro gaming grip, but going from dock to handheld is easy. The pro gaming grip is designed for easy insert and extract - it eliminates the fuss and frustration of taking off an annoying sleeve or protective case every time you want to dock the Nintendo Switch. Dropping in and removing the Nintendo Switch is just as satisfying as clicking in your JoyCons®.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Satisfye was established by a group of millennials who love video games. We are passionate designers, sourcing gurus, and mechanical engineers. We all have a love for gaming and especially gaming on the Nintendo Switch. One thing we all noticed early on was that there is a lack of premium and well designed third party accessories for the Switch. Team Satisfye stepped up and our goal was to create the highest quality and properly designed accessories for the Switch.

 

 

Our first project was a smashing success, the SwitchCase Classic. We launched this phenomenal case on Amazon in 2017 and have received rave reviews. Specifically for being the highest quality case on the market.

Our team collaborates with one of the best industrial design firms in California to create and prototype amazing products.

 

Risks and challenges

We have done thorough prototype evaluation and worked for fast progression to sign off on the final molds. We have already built in time for production evaluation and tool corrections into the schedule and worked to mitigate delay risks by initiating tooling a full month prior to the start of the Kickstarter. We have no known financial risks - unlike many projects, we will be 100% funded for the full production run and all associated costs with the Kickstarter. All we need is your support!

Edit: Minimum Goal Reached!

Incredibly, we have reached the minimum 10,000$ the moders said would be nice. We are going to add stretch goals to see if we can reach the 50,000$ which they said a normal team would be paid for a mod like this.  This will include trying to get the mod localized for South American and Chinese communities!
<span style=""letter-spacing: 0px
column2: >A Simple Goal

column1: Valve, for a variety of reasons, would have a very hard time making a tutorial for the release of the new Netflix Dota 2 anime. Assuming that there will be an influx of new players brought in from the anime's release, we have banded together as a community to create a tutorial for these new players in the form of a custom game.
This indigogo exists soley to fund this project, and pay the team. We have only 1 month to create this game, and they will need to be working full time on it to make it a success!
What We Hope to Achieve

The custom game mode will exist as a resource for new players entering Dota via the Netflix Anime. Our main goal is to get them used to the game, learn its mechanics, and prepare them for their first bot match.

Furthermore, we can do what Valve cannot: directly link community resources like discords, content creators, and guide websites to the players so that they may start on a more advanced journey to learn Dota 2.
Understanding Our Limitations

We are not setting out to make ""the official tutorial for the game"". Our custom game will be affected by the same issues all custom games are, such as breaking as soon as there is a major update (Icefrog removes outposts, and our game has a outpost guide).  WE WILL NOT BE UPDATING OR MAINTAINING this tutorial, unless we have some sort of insane fund raising here. Our goal is simple: make a tutorial for the current patch, with the current map, talking about current mechanics, at the time of the release of the netflix show to help first time players.

Furthermore, there is currently a 30 game limit on custom games (you must play 30 regular games of dota before accessing custom games). This being a first time players guide, we hope to sway Valve to change this. However, we have no power over Valve, so should they choose to not change this rule we are at their mercy.
How You Can Help
Many Dota community members have offered to help or be part of the project! Here is how:
<ul>
• donating to the indigogo to fund the mod makers and team will be a huge help, as the team will need to spend their full time to make our insane deadline
• at certain levels, donating will allow you to see our scripts and gain access to the direct info. we would love feedback on those scripts and how we could improve!
• donators will also be able to suggest community members to be included in the mod, for review. we will add these resources in for new players.
• supporting the mod efforts by sharing the update blogs, playtesting the mod, and spreading the word!
• help us get the 30 day limit removed by voicing your support!
","Edit: Minimum Goal Reached!

Incredibly, we have reached the minimum 10,000$ the moders said would be nice. We are going to add stretch goals to see if we can reach the 50,000$ which they said a normal team would be paid for a mod like this.  This will include trying to get the mod localized for South American and Chinese communities!
A Simple Goal:

Valve, for a variety of reasons, would have a very hard time making a tutorial for the release of the new Netflix Dota 2 anime. Assuming that there will be an influx of new players brought in from the anime's release, we have banded together as a community to create a tutorial for these new players in the form of a custom game.
This indigogo exists soley to fund this project, and pay the team. We have only 1 month to create this game, and they will need to be working full time on it to make it a success!
What We Hope to Achieve

The custom game mode will exist as a resource for new players entering Dota via the Netflix Anime. Our main goal is to get them used to the game, learn its mechanics, and prepare them for their first bot match.

Furthermore, we can do what Valve cannot: directly link community resources like discords, content creators, and guide websites to the players so that they may start on a more advanced journey to learn Dota 2.
Understanding Our Limitations

We are not setting out to make ""the official tutorial for the game"". Our custom game will be affected by the same issues all custom games are, such as breaking as soon as there is a major update (Icefrog removes outposts, and our game has a outpost guide).  WE WILL NOT BE UPDATING OR MAINTAINING this tutorial, unless we have some sort of insane fund raising here. Our goal is simple: make a tutorial for the current patch, with the current map, talking about current mechanics, at the time of the release of the netflix show to help first time players.

Furthermore, there is currently a 30 game limit on custom games (you must play 30 regular games of dota before accessing custom games). This being a first time players guide, we hope to sway Valve to change this. However, we have no power over Valve, so should they choose to not change this rule we are at their mercy.
How You Can Help
Many Dota community members have offered to help or be part of the project! Here is how:
donating to the indigogo to fund the mod makers and team will be a huge help, as the team will need to spend their full time to make our insane deadline
at certain levels, donating will allow you to see our scripts and gain access to the direct info. we would love feedback on those scripts and how we could improve!
donators will also be able to suggest community members to be included in the mod, for review. we will add these resources in for new players.
supporting the mod efforts by sharing the update blogs, playtesting the mod, and spreading the word!
help us get the 30 day limit removed by voicing your support!",0.0,0,"3 Campaigns
|","Denver, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/community-made-dota-2-tutorial/pica

Pick3 Dominator is back for it's second round of funding!  But only for a very short funding period! 

As we've told our first round funders, we're almost ready to launch the product that will have Lottery Officials and online casino's quaking in their boots!

Expected delivery is May 15th and after the official launch this product will cost $147.  You can get in now for much less as we finish up our research and development!

Here's what it's all about:

Pick3 Dominator is the easiest way to ""intelligently"" pick numbers each day for the pick 3 lottery games offered around the country.  The program does all the work for you!

The
Pick 3 Lottery is played by ten millions of people around the USA EVERY

day.  So popular that in most USA states Pick 3 is played twice daily.

We've developed a fully automated program, Pick3 Dominator,
that takes advantage of the same skills we use to successfully trade
stocks and commodities, the skills of defining and following PATTERNS.
During our research we found a pattern in the Pick 3 lottery with the
following characteristics:
• It's found in 50+% of all draws.
• It is found in all State Pick 3 lottery games.
• Gives you a real chance to win in every other draw.

Pick3 Dominator exploits that pattern to your benefit!

With the click of the mouse, Pick3
Dominator will provide you with a short list of combinations to play

each day.  That's it, we cannot make it any simpler.

Our
algorithms narrow down the playable combinations to a manageable number,

bettering your odds of winning!  

We've also
back tested"" our program in multiple State Pick 3 drawings to find that
this unique pattern has worked for over 6000 past draws in
each state lottery tested with good history.  When we added
additional pattern algorithms, that take in to consideration additional
probabilities, then winning is no longer a guess but just a matter of

time.
(""Back testing"" is a hallmark of creating profitable stock
trading algorithms before implementing them. If they don't back test,

then you don't use them.)

Pick 3 lotteries are in every state
with a lottery program.  The game is simple.  Pick 3 numbers from 0-9
with the hopes of getting the correct 3 numbers in a row.  Pick the
number exactly in order, such as 123 and you win $250 for a 50 cent
bet.  Pick the numbers out of order ( 321) and you win $40 for a 50 cent
bet.  $1 bet pays $500 and $80 respectively.  There are 1000 possible
combinations for the exact order and 220 for the out of order

combinations.

Here's what we need:
Pick3 Dominator is a complicated BUT fully automated 7 step
formula (each step a separate algorithm itself) and we need to hire a
couple of highly skilled mathematicians who are also programers to do
the final programing so all you'll need to do is push a button and out
will come your picks for that days Pick3. We have our programers lined
up but they're not cheap!  So your funding will go to pay additional,

research  programing and marketing.

Here's what you'll get:

  • You'll
get the first copies of this program before it's offered to the public

at a substantially higher price than it will be offered to you!

If we don't meet our financial goal:

  • Regardless,
even if we fail to reach our financial goal, this project will be
completed. We will put up whatever balance is needed.  It may take us a

little longer but you'll get your copy of the Pick3 Dominator!

This
project was started by a 30 year Wall Street veteran with a financial
analysis background, a Russian professor of math, and an experienced

VBnet programer.

We have been studying the lotteries for years, identifying trends and patterns for most lotteries.

Our passed experience with the lottery is the highly popular LotterySlayer program  ( http://lotteryslayer.com
) which is the most detailed statistical analysis program available and
suitable for all lottery games,  Pick 3,4,5, Lotto, PowerBall and

MegaMillions.  Pick3 Dominator is our first program to actually chose the winning numbers for you.

If you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
• We all know someone who plays the lottery, get the word out to them.
• Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

Get in now before it's too late!

column3: >Darts Connect is the first smart electronic dartboard connected to smartphones and tablets. It is empowered by an online social platform where you could play darts and interact with each other globally. We want to connect everyone in the world by building the largest offline-to-online darts global community. Join us now!

column1: <div>
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
People who want to have fun! Whether you are new to darts or a professional, this home-use electronic dartboard is perfect for you, and it is especially for people who want
<ul>
• to play darts at home
• to play against friends or random players around the world
• to have a great party game
• to have a fair game with other online players
• to be a part of the global darts community
• a really pretty and stylish dartboard that decorates your home
• ANYONE WHO LOVES FUN!
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<div>
<div>
<figure style=""margin: 0px

With our user-friendly UI supported by iOS/Android platform you could easily navigate our classic and party game modes. Easily customize the themes, animation and sound effects, as well as enjoy our expandable games modes and contents. Possibilities are unlimited!

You can also compete for the global league table with our social online platform. Interact with your opponents with real time voice and text message. And we will ensure a fair and competitive competition with our built-in camera and anti-cheating reporting mechanism.
<div>
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

column1: <figure style=""margin: 0px
Darts Connect comes with various game modes including:
<ul>
• Cricket – Standard, Cut-throat, Hidden
• Practice modes - Shoot-out, Count-up
• And more downloadable game modes!

Select your favorite advanced settings. We make sure to suit your every need, whether you are a casual player or a professional. For both local and network games, up to 4 players can be supported in each game.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
You can also expand your game mode collections by downloading various FREE or paid new game modes from our shop! Don’t forget to customize with your favorite theme and sound effects.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Whenever you hit an extraordinary results, we’d love to celebrate your achievements with engaging reward animations. Want to be unique and special? Download other graphic effects from our online store!
<figure style=""margin: 0px
For network games, you can either play against a designated player or a random opponent on the other side of the world.

Through our intelligent match making system, Darts Connect links you up with darts players around the world according to their rankings and geographical locations. You can always find the best opponents whether you are a rank A player, or a beginner.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Darts Connect is the world’s first home use dartboard equipped with a built-in camera. The wide-angle camera not only allows you to observe every shot of your opponents, it also serves as the most important anti-cheating mechanism that ensures the fairness of the game during a network match.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

column1: <figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
To make the online battle experience even better and enhance interaction between players, you may enjoy the in-game real-time voice and text messaging with other opponents!
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

We believe your excellent skills and precision need to be recognized. That’s why we’ve created the Global League Table. Everyone is given a Power Rating based on your own performance as well as a relative rating on an adjusted ELO score. Play more and improve your skills. Challenge the best players globally to climb to the top of the League!
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Noise could be the worst nuisance to your family members during your practice. We perfectly understand your concern and we’ve strived to create the most silence dartboard without any compromise on the solid feeling upon every single hit.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

With silicon film installed inside and high quality nylon polymer as the exterior, Darts Connect holds every dart firmly producing only a rarely audible noise. Soft pads are also pre-installed at the back of the dartboard to reduce noise produced by impact, making it the perfect choice for every living room.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

On the other hand, our dartboard is well built for intensive practice and we place durability as one of the highest priorities. Nylon plastic is used for the impact compartments to ensure both durability and elastic recovery. The precise engineering ensures every hole extremely durable compared to all the other soft-tip boards in the market.
<figure style=""margin: 0px

We know you hate putting screws in a wall. So we have made our board compatible with 3M Picture Hanging Stripes to ensure a damage-free hanging exprience. (Don’t worry, we have three holes for you to hang the dart board with screws just in case.)
<figure style=""margin: 0px

To make the hanging even easier, we’ve tried our best to reduce the weight of the dart board by using the water droplet design to minimize the size and hollowing the back of the board to minimize the weight.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

column2:
>

When we hit $85,000, we will introduce a traditionally colored Darts Connect smart dartboard!

column1: <figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Darts Connect is a revolution that could only come true with the seamless integration of precise engineering, mechanical design and intelligent software programming. That’s why we have formed a team of darts enthusiasts and seasoned entrepreneurs to realize our dream.
Hardware Breakthroughs

It is no easy task to strive for the best balance between durability, noise reduction and exterior design. Having partnered with one of the best OEMs (Original Equipment Manufacturer) in the world, we have experienced the combination of different materials, modules and assembly methods through numerous prototypes for more than one year. We’ve made sure Darts Connect is fully functional and perfectly ready for mass production before launching our campaign. And we will not stop to continue improving our product.
Software Programming

We have worked with our UX designers to create an intuitive and simple user interface. We also understand a stable network match is crucial to your online darts experience. Our computer engineers have built a solid server framework that ensures uncompromised and secure connections. Our server is also well prepared for a large number of active players online simultaneously.
<figure style=""margin: 0px
<figure style=""margin: 0px

Risks and challenges

Each mechanical and electrical part needs to be faultlessly integrated into each other to make the perfect Darts Connect. Our OEM is publicly listed and has ample of experience in manufacturing electronics with absolute precision. Our team also maintains frequent communications to make sure all the components are manufactured to our strict quality standards. 
Failure in tracking software bugs in our program will also lead to malfunctioning of our Darts Connect platform. We have put tireless efforts into UAT (User Acceptance Testing) to ensure a bug-free Darts Connect. Otherwise, we will act swiftly and place debug as our highest priority when players discover new flaws in the platform. 
We understand that even the world’s biggest server could crash one day. And there will be no exception to Darts Connect. Despite we have constructed a very stable server framework, we cannot rule out all the possibilities and thus we have prepared for the worst. Our computer engineers are always ready 24/7 for emergency management to restore our server in case things go wrong, so that you could resume your exciting online battle without delay.

Our stated delivery schedule has already been a prudent estimate after considering many potential production risks. We cannot, however, prevent shipment delay due to external factors such as weather or disaster breakout. But we will adhere to our production schedule and communicate with our logistics partner frequently to ensure Darts Connect to arrive at your door step on time.


","Introducing Darts Connect

Darts Connect is the first smart electronic dartboard connected to smartphones and tablets. It is empowered by an online social platform where you could play darts and interact with each other globally. We want to connect everyone in the world by building the largest offline-to-online darts global community. Join us now!
People who want to have fun! Whether you are new to darts or a professional, this home-use electronic dartboard is perfect for you, and it is especially for people who want
to play darts at home

to have a great party game

to be a part of the global darts community
a really pretty and stylish dartboard that decorates your home
ANYONE WHO LOVES FUN!

With our user-friendly UI supported by iOS/Android platform you could easily navigate our classic and party game modes. Easily customize the themes, animation and sound effects, as well as enjoy our expandable games modes and contents. Possibilities are unlimited!

You can also compete for the global league table with our social online platform. Interact with your opponents with real time voice and text message. And we will ensure a fair and competitive competition with our built-in camera and anti-cheating reporting mechanism.
1. Turn on the device
2. Open our app on your smartphone/tablet
3. Connect the app to the dartboard by our built-in wi-fi
Darts Connect comes with various game modes including:
Cricket – Standard, Cut-throat, Hidden
Practice modes - Shoot-out, Count-up
And more downloadable game modes!

Select your favorite advanced settings. We make sure to suit your every need, whether you are a casual player or a professional. For both local and network games, up to 4 players can be supported in each game.
You can also expand your game mode collections by downloading various FREE or paid new game modes from our shop! Don’t forget to customize with your favorite theme and sound effects.
PLAY

Whenever you hit an extraordinary results, we’d love to celebrate your achievements with engaging reward animations. Want to be unique and special? Download other graphic effects from our online store!
For network games, you can either play against a designated player or a random opponent on the other side of the world.

Through our intelligent match making system, Darts Connect links you up with darts players around the world according to their rankings and geographical locations. You can always find the best opponents whether you are a rank A player, or a beginner.

Darts Connect is the world’s first home use dartboard equipped with a built-in camera. The wide-angle camera not only allows you to observe every shot of your opponents, it also serves as the most important anti-cheating mechanism that ensures the fairness of the game during a network match.
1. When the dart hits the dartboard, the pressure sensor underneath is activated
2. The camera takes a photo instantly
3. The photo is sent to your opponents immediately
To make the online battle experience even better and enhance interaction between players, you may enjoy the in-game real-time voice and text messaging with other opponents!

We believe your excellent skills and precision need to be recognized. That’s why we’ve created the Global League Table. Everyone is given a Power Rating based on your own performance as well as a relative rating on an adjusted ELO score. Play more and improve your skills. Challenge the best players globally to climb to the top of the League!

Noise could be the worst nuisance to your family members during your practice. We perfectly understand your concern and we’ve strived to create the most silence dartboard without any compromise on the solid feeling upon every single hit.

With silicon film installed inside and high quality nylon polymer as the exterior, Darts Connect holds every dart firmly producing only a rarely audible noise. Soft pads are also pre-installed at the back of the dartboard to reduce noise produced by impact, making it the perfect choice for every living room.

On the other hand, our dartboard is well built for intensive practice and we place durability as one of the highest priorities. Nylon plastic is used for the impact compartments to ensure both durability and elastic recovery. The precise engineering ensures every hole extremely durable compared to all the other soft-tip boards in the market.

We know you hate putting screws in a wall. So we have made our board compatible with 3M Picture Hanging Stripes to ensure a damage-free hanging exprience. (Don’t worry, we have three holes for you to hang the dart board with screws just in case.)

To make the hanging even easier, we’ve tried our best to reduce the weight of the dart board by using the water droplet design to minimize the size and hollowing the back of the board to minimize the weight.
When we hit $85,000, we will introduce a traditionally colored Darts Connect smart dartboard!

TO ALL WHO DONATED PROJECT ON GOOGLE PLAY BEFORE:
1 year ago, Almora Darkosen was a paid version as donation and support for us.
because Google Play don't show the emails of all buyers, so if You want extra credit in game, please sent to us an email with transaction ID. Sorry, but it's only one way to find You. Thank You.

Almora Darkosen is a role-playing game set in a fantasy world. The current version of the game have only piece of story, but perfectly introduces into climate of game world. Player has the opportunity to explore different locations:
fields, swamps, forests, dark forests, towns, crypts and other locations.

What's included in the current version of the game?

* Original retro atmosphere
* Simple interface
* Dynamic fight
* Skills (spells, special hits)
* Inventory (diablo style)
* The system levels and experience
* Quests
* Dialogues
* Trade
* Various items
* Various locations, including the town
* Many opponents of different power
* Boxes, chests with treasures
And many others ...
Game is fully free without additional ( in game ) payments!
Try it! ( BETA - androidOS version at Google Play )
You can download the beta version of a game. At this moment there is only version for AnroidOS. Try it and support us to make it for more platforms!
Follow us on Facebook! ( news, screenshots, movies... )
Stay with us in contact! There are a lot of screenshots, movies, progress of project and news about the future of the game! Feel free to leave a comment.
About us:

column3:
/>

Gear-Studio is a group of developers from Poland formed in 2000 year. We create games for PC and mobile systems. We participate in various events in the gaming world, to get the knowledge about new game making engines and to meet new amazing people. We got couple of finished games and some in progress, one of it is Almora Darkosen. Actually it's our main goal.

column1: This is the real huge project. We want to release it for more platforms ( Actually it's only for AndroidOS ). So we need money for testing devices and licences.

Also we want to port this project to the desktop platforms: Windows and Mac.

Second thing that we need it's professional english translation. We are from Poland and english  is not our primary language. We know that in available project of the game there is no correct spelling... It's really bad.

Maybe with Your help there will be more languages?

Also we need additional music for the game, actually we got some music clips from our friends, but they don't have enough time to always compose for us for free... They have another jobs too...
We don't want to make in game payments, because it's really bad. So the only one way to finish this project is crowdfunding :)

We had done a really much things at this time. Half of these You can check by downloading the beta version. We plan to make large world with a lot of dungeons, secret places and other locations. At this time we have a lot of items graphics, quests, monsters and new locations. We really don't want to drop away this project... Also project have a good opinion about beta version in Google Play:

Planned release date:
We plan to release the ( Android version ) game in first quarter of 2016.
Would be really cool!
You can share this project via Facebook or Indiegogo share tools.
Let's build this game together!
You can donate us and we will give You some perks:
