About us:

Gear-Studio is a group of developers from Poland formed in 2000 year. We create games for PC and mobile systems. We participate in various events in the gaming world, to get the knowledge about new game making engines and to meet new amazing people. We got couple of finished games and some in progress, one of it is Almora Darkosen. Actually it's our main goal.
This is the real huge project. We want to release it for more platforms ( Actually it's only for AndroidOS ). So we need money for testing devices and licences.

Also we want to port this project to the desktop platforms: Windows and Mac.Second thing that we need it's professional english translation. We are from Poland and english  is not our primary language. We know that in available project of the game there is no correct spelling... It's really bad.

Maybe with Your help there will be more languages?Also we need additional music for the game, actually we got some music clips from our friends, but they don't have enough time to always compose for us for free... They have another jobs too...
We don't want to make in game payments, because it's really bad. So the only one way to finish this project is crowdfunding :)

We had done a really much things at this time. Half of these You can check by downloading the beta version. We plan to make large world with a lot of dungeons, secret places and other locations. At this time we have a lot of items graphics, quests, monsters and new locations. We really don't want to drop away this project... Also project have a good opinion about beta version in Google Play:
Planned release date:We plan to release the ( Android version ) game in first quarter of 2016.Would be really cool!
You can share this project via Facebook or Indiegogo share tools.
Let's build this game together!
You can donate us and we will give You some perks:",44.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Szczecin, Poland",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/almora-darkosen-rpg/pica

0,"

Choose your first miniatures, traveling to new lands, fight with other collectors,
wins, gets more thumbnails, and enters the world of ""MiniQuest"".


MiniQuest is the first project on my part to enter the great world of video games representing Mexico, where the platform will start Android, then IOS, and so gradually to expand into all mobile platforms, the game will be distributed F2P (Free to Play) mode.

 

 

 

The Game

MiniQuest involves an ancient game of miniature figures sized chess pieces, with heroes and creatures of the past of this world, the adventure begins in the shop of your town that sell those figures that's where you will find the shopkeeper named Gustav, which will explain how the game is, it is the game board, miniatures, objects used in the game and how to start your travel.

Gustav will give away the magical board game, which takes the form of diverse terrain of your choice that you unlock with mana crystals (VitroTerram), use the terrain to your advantage.

We also explain how the miniatures are classified with which you play

 - Types of miniatures
 - Equipment to be used
 - Objects that you can use
 - Limits and Basic Rules
 - As expand the capacity of your board
 - and more

You will choose your first miniatures, your first battle ground, and a bag of objects and be ready to travel to collect more miniatures.
column5:
/>                              

 

 

All pictures except the logo, they are not finished yet, day by day I will show you the progress of the project, within my means, because part of the proceeds here is for computer equipment to continue developing and designing the game

Campaigns

Campaigns are trips that you do with a group of your choicest miniatures which you used in all your battles outside your place of origin, as you fight your miniatures magic ran out so it is very important to instill magic occasionally.

If you lose, your miniatures will wear to the point that you cannot use them until you get home and regenerate, and restore magic infuse your miniatures can also do special items that you can buy at the store you visit each village and so can you go farther and have confrontations with various collectors in each village.

With each victory you get coins, with which you can buy more miniatures, objects and more, remember that you also carries travel expenses (food, transportation, lodging, your miniatures should not eat or sleep but you do).

 

 

Tournaments

The collect and play with miniatures is not all you can also go in search of fame and glory.

In some towns and cities have local, regional and kingdoms tournaments, where you will play with all kinds of collectors, some who've seen others that are legend in the game, win fame and not only get more challenging but also will unlock more places to travel, exclusive miniatures, a lot of coins among other things, (do not forget to defend your title in tournament kingdoms, to keep your title of champion of the kingdom).

 The esenario published here is only illustrative, still working on the design but because my computer is not as powerful my progress has been very slow, so I ask for your support to the project.


Dynamic Game

The game basically involves visiting different places and fight local area collectors and some errant players, roads in towns and cities, the achievement of every win coins with which you can buy more packs of figures coming out at random in the each village shop (if available) can also buy items with which maintenance can be given on thumbnails cure or equip them to raise their effectiveness, power, life, among others.

The game focuses on the magic board where clashes occur, the board takes the form of a field's choice winner of the coin toss to start the game, then the money to bet that wins the game, depending on how much risk it is the fierceness your opponent to attack you, so be careful with gain much from a single blow, then the figures with which you were faced with your opponent are selected.

Each figure has different abilities, some powers are triggered by the passage of turns, each figure has a mode of attack, melee, distance, direction, range, area, and breath, how they combine skills and types of attacks up to you to victory, beating win prestige in the area, which will open new places, other challengers appear, among other benefits.

If you lose, you lose your coins bet and your miniatures will deteriorate, if your miniatures reach the maximum deterioration you may not use them until you return to your home or use a special object to regenerate, if all your miniatures with traveling reach the maximum of deterioration, your trip is over, you lose prestige, money, and go back to your hometown, be careful how you manage it and risking your miniatures.

You can increase the number of thumbnails with which you travel buying an expansion for your board, the better prepared further away you travel, you have to take into account the costs of your character and you pay transportation, lodging, food, tournament entries and other things.

Miniatures: They will be grouped into 4 types according to their power and rarity

 Common (C)
 Uncommon (UC)
 Rare (R)
 Unique (U)

The meetings may vary by town or region tournament trips.
 (1 vs 1) (3 vs 3) (5 vs 5) (7 vs 7)
 Bear in mind that you took in choosing your miniatures as the number of thumbnails you put one type will be limited by rarity strategy.

Example:

In a standard game of 5 vs 5, you can only use 1 miniature rare maximum, 3 uncommon miniatures maximum or up to 5 maximum common miniatures, you must complete a set of 5 miniatures for the encounter, respecting these limits, in other words you may not put on two rare per encounter, or 4 uncommon.

1 (R), 1 (UC) and 3 (C) but you cannot make a team of 2 (R), 1 (UC) and 2 (C) because the maximum is 1 rare.

You can buy more models in 2 ways, the first is the standard collection you can buy a set of 5 or 10 miniatures randomly with coins that you seek the truth, this collection will consist of 50 different figures and every 6 months 10 new figures added to this collection.

The second is the Premium collections contain 50 different figures come out every 6 months and 50 new figures and can buy in sets of 5 or 10 models randomly, you paid real money.

What happens to repeated figures or do not want?

In your home you can store all the thumbnails on your shelves that you can expand later, the figures that have repeated or no longer want, you can sell them in the store for coins, also open merchants and events where you can exchange them for other models so you can get rid envelope supply of cards you have.

Objects / Equipment

Some thumbnails are able to carry objects or equipment for use in battle, you can buy these in the store, and are classified into three groups.

Consumables are single use items like potions, poisons, antidotes, Geomana less.

Equipment: These are weapons, armor, you can use them as often as you want as long as you give them maintenance (using Geomana).

Primordial Objects: These are two very important items and the Geomana Geovita, Geomana are for the maintenance of objects and thumbnails, Geovita are regenerating your models because of the losses.

Magic board

at the beginning of your adventure will deliver your game board, which takes the form of a ground thanks to the magic of magic crystals (Vitroterran), as you go in the world can buy more Vitroterran to have more variety of land to choose for your meetings.

 

                                                                                       

The Universe MiniQuest

MiniQuest takes place in a distant time in a very different world to ours in which not only human living, but also other humanoid creatures and some not so mythical forms.

You will travel along different paths and territories facing several collectors of all types and races in which are elves, dwarves, gnomes and many more creatures will go along knowing your adventure.

Each town is different, some have shops, taverns or common rooms where you will find several collectors, as things will accumulate more wins in the village you visit, even if you become famous you have challengers seeking to challenge you.

Time passes, choose very well as you think to travel to walk to a town or wagon makes a difference how much evening time coming, tournaments and events expire after publication, do not try to save on travel walking or go very fast you run out of money, remember to manage your resources well.

 

Rewards

$ 1  ->
column7:
10 Models of the Premium Collection +Traveller Package II (x2)

$ 10 ->
column8:
10 Models of the Premium Collection + Traveller Package III (x2) + 1 VitroTerram

$20 ->
column9:
10 Models of the Premium Collection + Traveller Package III (x2) + 2 VitroTerram + Equipment package I (x2) + 5 squares of expansion board + Unique figure.

$ 50 ->
column10:
10 Models of the Premium Collection + Traveler Package IV (x2) + 3 VitroTerram + Equipment package I (x2) + 5 squares of expansion board + Unique Figure +  10 Miniatures of the next expansion + Beta Game.

$ 100 ->
column11:
20 Premium Miniatures Collection + Traveller Package IV (x2) + 4 VitroTerram + Equipment package II (x2) + 10 squares of expansion board + Unique Figure + 15 Miniatures of the next expansion + Beta Game + Poster map of the game.

$ 200 ->
column12:
25-thumbnail of the Premium Collection + Traveller Package IV (x2)  +  5 VitroTerram +  Equipment package III (x2)  +  20 Squares expansion board  +  Unique Figure +  20 Miniatures of the next expansion +  Beta Game  +  Poster map of the game.

$500 <
column14:
30 Premium Miniatures Collection +  5 VitraTerram + Traveller Package IV (x2)  +  Total expansion board +  Team Package III (x2) +  Unique Figure + 30 Miniatures of the next expansion +  Beta Game +  Poster map of the game.


Where will the money go?

Most of the money will be allocated to purchase new computer equipment because I have currently is not layers of supporting the design and programming of the project, is also to pay licensing softwer, to avoid problems in the future, other part is to pay off the project documentation, the remaining money is to confront any subsequent issue of the project (Emergency Fund) as commissions, taxes and other things.



 

Finally

I thank you to visit my campaign, comments your friends, the project is not so fast because they do not have proper equipment, much of the collected money is used to purchase a computer equipment, the rest is to pay for licenses and permits, with your help this dream can come true, help me achieve the goal, is not the only project that I have in progress, there are many more on the way and you always take this into account with every progress and new project, for your great help when started, every great dream is achieved with a little help.

I also wish you luck in your projects and goals.

This is the new Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for Kensei to create a great set of miniatures inspired in creatures from japanese mythology. We would like to create as many Fantasy Japanese creatures as we can. These miniatures would be used in Kensei Miniature Wargame, but they could also be used in roleplaying games or for artistic painting.

Our friend Adam Ferrando is creating the creature designs for this project, so you can have a new way to look at this fantasy creatures. We are also working in the Kensei rules for every creature or character included in this campaing.
We hope you like this campaign and that you help us reach our goals by sharing it with your friends and choosing one of our Perks.
CAMPAÑA DE MINIATURAS FANTÁSTICAS DE KENSEI

Esta es la nueva campaña para conseguir fondos de Kensei. Nuestro objetivo principal es crear una gran serie de miniaturas inspiradas en la mitología Japonesa. Nos gustatía crear tantas criaturas fantásticas como sea posible. Estas miniaturas serán utilizadas en Kensei y también podrán ser usadas para jugar a rol o pintura artística.

Los diseños de este proyecto serán totalmente nuevos, creados por Adam Ferrando, de modo que tendréis la oportunidad de ver estas criaturas desde un nuevo punto de vista. A su vez nosotros ya estamos trabajando en las reglas para cada criatura y personaje incluido en esta campaña.
Esperamos que os guste y que nos ayudeis a alcanzar nuestras metas
column2: compartiendo la campaña con vuestros amigos y seleccionando alguno de nuestros Perk.

column1: We are company with long experience in the miniature world. We love what we do and we love Japanese mythology.
You can find us at http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/ and Join our Facebook Official Site https://www.facebook.com/OficialKensei
Our rules: http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/downloads
¿QUIENES SOMOS?
Somos una compañia con larga experiencia en el mundo de las miniaturas. Amamos nuestro trabajo, el mundo japones y su mitología.
Puedes encontrarnos en http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/ y puedes unirte a nosotros en nuestra página oficial de facebook https://www.facebook.com/OficialKensei
Nuestras reglas: http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/downloads
All these fantasy miniatures will be brand new and made in metal. There will be four sizes: 55mm +, 45mm +, 30mm + and 20mm.
We are also offering our samurai series of miniatures at an opportunity price just to help us reach our highest goal and thus, make these creatures.
NUESTRAS MINIATURAS
Todas las miniaturas estarán hechas en metal. Habrá cuatro tamaños: 55mm, 45mm, 30mm, y 20mm.
También tendrás la oportunidad de conseguir nuestra serie de samuráis a un precio reducido tan sólo para ayudarnos a alcanzar el mayor goal posible y realizar estas criaturas.
This campaign will be structured in three phases
column2: when the first one is complete, the next one starts. Every phase is full of new creatures and extra miniatures, and the last one will include two new clans for the game. We would like to reach the final phase, so please help us spread this campaign and make our dream come true.

column1: PHASE ONE:
We have planned more than 30 different miniatures inspired in characters and creatures from Japanese mythology. Whenever one goal is reached, a new one will be available.
PHASE TWO:
This phase includes four new goals and 16 new types of creatures, + extra miniature rewards.
PHASE III - WE THINK THAT THIS WILL BE IN FUTURE:.. BUT THIS WAS THE MAIN IDEA:
75000 - WAKO CLAN
ESPECIAL UNIT: PIRATES
ESPECIAL UNIT: BANDITS
ELITE UNIT: BOMB UNIT
85000- OCEAN CREATURES I + ONMYOUJI (2 SHIKIGAMI)
OROCHI 1
KIJOHIME 1
NAGAS 2
NYNGIO 3
95000  OCEAN CREATURES 2
RIUJIN (Ōwatatsumi) 1
SAMEBITO 1
HEIKEGAMI 2
AMIKIRI 3
OBJETIVOS DE LA CAMPAÑA

La campaña se estructura en tres fases. Si completamos una pasaremos a la siguiente. Cada fase está llena de nuevas criaturas y miniaturas extra de recompensa. Además, en la última, incluiremos dos nuevos clanes para el juego.
FASE UNO:

Hemos planeado más de 30 miniaturas diferentes inspiradas en criaturas de la mitología japonesa. En esta fase tendremos cuatro metas, cada vez que alcancemos una descubriremos los diseños de la meta siguiente.
FASE DOS:
Incluiremos cuatro nuevos Goal con 16 nuevos tipos de criaturas y nuevas miniaturas extra como recompensa.
PHASE III - CREEMOS QUE NO SERÁ POSIBLE AHORA.... PERO QUIZÁS EN UN FUTURO PRÓXIMO.... ( VER ATRÁS)

If you choose one of our perks, you will get, as reward, metal miniatures, plastcraft scenery elements, T-shirts,osters, etc... Moreover, if we reach our goals, you will have extra miniatures as gift.
PERKS:
Every perk has a description of what will you receive as a reward for choosing it. In most of them, you will have to choose among the different packs.
Add the end of the Indigogo we will send you a e-mail asking you what options will you like to choose for your Perks.
All the miniatures will be made in high quality metal.
ALL THE MINIATURES IN THE CREATURE PACK WILL BE COMPLETELY DIFERENT. ( DIFERENT SCOULPT)
YOU WILL SAVE IN SOME CASES MORE THAN 50% OF THE OFICIAL PRICE!
RECOMPENSAS

Si escoges uno de nuestros Perk recibirás como recompensa miniaturas de metal, elementos de escenografía de Plastcraft, camisetas, posters, etc... Así mismo cada vez que alcancemos un objetivo tendrás miniaturas extra de regalo en cualquiera de los Perk.
PERKS:
Todos los Perk describen que conseguirás como recompensa por elegirlo. En la mayoria de ellos deberás escoger entre los diferentes Packs y sets que se te muestran a continuación.
Al final del Indiegogo os enviaremos un mensaje preguntado que opciones os gustaría elegir para vuestros Perks.
Todas las miniaturas estarán realizadas en metal de máxima calidad.
TODAS LAS MINIATURAS DEL PACK DE CRIATURAS SERÁN DISTINTAS. ( DIFERENTE ESCULTURA)
¡EN ALGUNOS CASOS AHORRARAS MAS DEL 50% DEL PRECIO OFICIAL!
SHIPPING-
We will make only one free shipping to our backers. We will give the choice to our backers to have some stuff in a early date but they will have to pay this shipping cost.
We will start shipping around two months after the end of the indigogo. (Creature pack I)
ENVIOS: Se hará un sólo envio gratuito a nuestros backers. Daremos la opción a nuestros backers de tener algún material en una fecha temprana pero para ello deberán pagar los costes de dicho envio.
Empezaremos a realizar envios alrededor de dos meses después de la finalización del Indigogo. (Pack de criaturas I
CHANGE YOUR PERK:

To change your perk to an superior perk you will only have to make an extra contribution adding the diference between the two perks. Go to contribute now and add the amount without choosing any perk. Then let us know by a comment.

CAMBIAR DE PERK: Para cambiar to perk a uno superior tan sólo tendrás que hacer una contribución extra añadiendo la diferencia entre los dos Perk. Ve a contribuir ahora y añade la cantidad sin seleccionar ningún perk. Después haznoslo saber mediante un comentario.
Thanks to all of you for your support and for helping us make our new dream come true!
¡Gracias a todos por ayudarnos a hacer realidad este nuevo sueño!
CREATURES AND CLANS IN THE GAME:
KUGE- HELL CREATURES
BUKE- HEAVEN CREATURES
SOHEI- EARTH CREATURES
OTOKODATE-DEATH CREATURES
EXTRA EXCLUSIVE MINIATURES REWARD FOR ALL OUR BACKERS ( IF YOU PLEDGE YOU WILL HAVE ALL THE MINIATURES REACHED BY OUR GOALS)
--AT THE BOTTON OF THIS PAGE YOU WILL SEE AN EXAMPLE OF ALL OUR PERKS AND ADD ONS--
-- AL FINAL DE ESTA PÁGINA ENCONTRAREIS EJEMPLOS DE TODOS NUESTROS PERK Y LOS ADD-ON ---

","This is the new Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign for Kensei to create a great set of miniatures inspired in creatures from japanese mythology. We would like to create as many Fantasy Japanese creatures as we can. These miniatures would be used in Kensei Miniature Wargame, but they could also be used in roleplaying games or for artistic painting.

Our friend Adam Ferrando is creating the creature designs for this project, so you can have a new way to look at this fantasy creatures. We are also working in the Kensei rules for every creature or character included in this campaing.
We hope you like this campaign and that you help us reach our goals by sharing it with your friends and choosing one of our Perks.
CAMPAÑA DE MINIATURAS FANTÁSTICAS DE KENSEI

Esta es la nueva campaña para conseguir fondos de Kensei. Nuestro objetivo principal es crear una gran serie de miniaturas inspiradas en la mitología Japonesa. Nos gustatía crear tantas criaturas fantásticas como sea posible. Estas miniaturas serán utilizadas en Kensei y también podrán ser usadas para jugar a rol o pintura artística.

Los diseños de este proyecto serán totalmente nuevos, creados por Adam Ferrando, de modo que tendréis la oportunidad de ver estas criaturas desde un nuevo punto de vista. A su vez nosotros ya estamos trabajando en las reglas para cada criatura y personaje incluido en esta campaña.
Esperamos que os guste y que nos ayudeis a alcanzar nuestras metas
column2: compartiendo la campaña con vuestros amigos y seleccionando alguno de nuestros Perk.

column1: We are company with long experience in the miniature world. We love what we do and we love Japanese mythology.
You can find us at http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/ and Join our Facebook Official Site https://www.facebook.com/OficialKensei
Our rules: http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/downloads
¿QUIENES SOMOS?
Somos una compañia con larga experiencia en el mundo de las miniaturas. Amamos nuestro trabajo, el mundo japones y su mitología.
Puedes encontrarnos en http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/ y puedes unirte a nosotros en nuestra página oficial de facebook https://www.facebook.com/OficialKensei
Nuestras reglas: http://kensei.zenitminiatures.es/en/downloads
All these fantasy miniatures will be brand new and made in metal. There will be four sizes: 55mm +, 45mm +, 30mm + and 20mm.
We are also offering our samurai series of miniatures at an opportunity price just to help us reach our highest goal and thus, make these creatures.
NUESTRAS MINIATURAS
Todas las miniaturas estarán hechas en metal. Habrá cuatro tamaños: 55mm, 45mm, 30mm, y 20mm.
También tendrás la oportunidad de conseguir nuestra serie de samuráis a un precio reducido tan sólo para ayudarnos a alcanzar el mayor goal posible y realizar estas criaturas.
This campaign will be structured in three phases
column2: when the first one is complete, the next one starts. Every phase is full of new creatures and extra miniatures, and the last one will include two new clans for the game. We would like to reach the final phase, so please help us spread this campaign and make our dream come true.

column1: PHASE ONE:
We have planned more than 30 different miniatures inspired in characters and creatures from Japanese mythology. Whenever one goal is reached, a new one will be available.
PHASE TWO:
This phase includes four new goals and 16 new types of creatures, + extra miniature rewards.
PHASE III - WE THINK THAT THIS WILL BE IN FUTURE:.. BUT THIS WAS THE MAIN IDEA:
75000 - WAKO CLAN
ESPECIAL UNIT: PIRATES
ESPECIAL UNIT: BANDITS
ELITE UNIT: BOMB UNIT
85000- OCEAN CREATURES I + ONMYOUJI (2 SHIKIGAMI)
OROCHI 1
KIJOHIME 1
NAGAS 2
NYNGIO 3
95000  OCEAN CREATURES 2
RIUJIN (Ōwatatsumi) 1
SAMEBITO 1
HEIKEGAMI 2
AMIKIRI 3
OBJETIVOS DE LA CAMPAÑA

La campaña se estructura en tres fases. Si completamos una pasaremos a la siguiente. Cada fase está llena de nuevas criaturas y miniaturas extra de recompensa. Además, en la última, incluiremos dos nuevos clanes para el juego.
FASE UNO:

Hemos planeado más de 30 miniaturas diferentes inspiradas en criaturas de la mitología japonesa. En esta fase tendremos cuatro metas, cada vez que alcancemos una descubriremos los diseños de la meta siguiente.
FASE DOS:
Incluiremos cuatro nuevos Goal con 16 nuevos tipos de criaturas y nuevas miniaturas extra como recompensa.
PHASE III - CREEMOS QUE NO SERÁ POSIBLE AHORA.... PERO QUIZÁS EN UN FUTURO PRÓXIMO.... ( VER ATRÁS)

If you choose one of our perks, you will get, as reward, metal miniatures, plastcraft scenery elements, T-shirts,osters, etc... Moreover, if we reach our goals, you will have extra miniatures as gift.
PERKS:
Every perk has a description of what will you receive as a reward for choosing it. In most of them, you will have to choose among the different packs.
Add the end of the Indigogo we will send you a e-mail asking you what options will you like to choose for your Perks.
All the miniatures will be made in high quality metal.
ALL THE MINIATURES IN THE CREATURE PACK WILL BE COMPLETELY DIFERENT. ( DIFERENT SCOULPT)
YOU WILL SAVE IN SOME CASES MORE THAN 50% OF THE OFICIAL PRICE!
RECOMPENSAS

Si escoges uno de nuestros Perk recibirás como recompensa miniaturas de metal, elementos de escenografía de Plastcraft, camisetas, posters, etc... Así mismo cada vez que alcancemos un objetivo tendrás miniaturas extra de regalo en cualquiera de los Perk.
PERKS:
Todos los Perk describen que conseguirás como recompensa por elegirlo. En la mayoria de ellos deberás escoger entre los diferentes Packs y sets que se te muestran a continuación.
Al final del Indiegogo os enviaremos un mensaje preguntado que opciones os gustaría elegir para vuestros Perks.
Todas las miniaturas estarán realizadas en metal de máxima calidad.
TODAS LAS MINIATURAS DEL PACK DE CRIATURAS SERÁN DISTINTAS. ( DIFERENTE ESCULTURA)
¡EN ALGUNOS CASOS AHORRARAS MAS DEL 50% DEL PRECIO OFICIAL!
SHIPPING-
We will make only one free shipping to our backers. We will give the choice to our backers to have some stuff in a early date but they will have to pay this shipping cost.
We will start shipping around two months after the end of the indigogo. (Creature pack I)
ENVIOS: Se hará un sólo envio gratuito a nuestros backers. Daremos la opción a nuestros backers de tener algún material en una fecha temprana pero para ello deberán pagar los costes de dicho envio.
Empezaremos a realizar envios alrededor de dos meses después de la finalización del Indigogo. (Pack de criaturas I
CHANGE YOUR PERK:

To change your perk to an superior perk you will only have to make an extra contribution adding the diference between the two perks. Go to contribute now and add the amount without choosing any perk. Then let us know by a comment.

CAMBIAR DE PERK: Para cambiar to perk a uno superior tan sólo tendrás que hacer una contribución extra añadiendo la diferencia entre los dos Perk. Ve a contribuir ahora y añade la cantidad sin seleccionar ningún perk. Después haznoslo saber mediante un comentario.
Thanks to all of you for your support and for helping us make our new dream come true!
¡Gracias a todos por ayudarnos a hacer realidad este nuevo sueño!

Disrupting the juggernaut of corporate platforms to give users more choice and artists more profit.
We love creators.
Whether you're from a little town or big city
column2: have a full recording studio or simply a camera phone, ideas and dreams can be turned into reality like never before.  We live in an amazing time and wanted to create a site that captures that.

column1:
RHOVIT is an open post platform for FILM - TV - MUSIC - BOOKS - COMICS AND VIDEO GAMES. We love them all!

Why RHOVIT for artists?

Because it's time!  This is the digital age and you control your destiny.  For a flat fee of $9.99 a month you receive:    
 
   *Your own site within a larger marketplace to sell up to 49 products.
 
  * 100% OF YOUR NET PROFIT FROM SALES PLUS AD REVENUE.
 
  *Your project automatically featured on the main page free of charge.
 
  *Option to let users pay what they want
 
  *A promotional video to connect with your audience.

YOU created the work.  YOU should profit from it.
Why RHOVIT for users?

CHOICE: You search Indiegogo and sites like it to find something different, something straight from the hearts and minds of the artists.  We welcome all of them to our site as the natural next step and give you another opportunity and platform in which to discover them.  As well as all the other amazing independent and commercial projects from around the world.
FUN: Films and Games have trailers why not everything else?  Come and surf as many videos as you want and only pay if you purchase something.

CONVENIENCE:  Watch the video of your favorite song.  Buy the song.  Learn where the band is playing or when their next album is out all on the same page.  Plus see all their other albums for sale.  Easy.
The simplest idea can be revolutionary.
MATH:  0%.  It may not seem like an exciting number but here's what it does.
*Users spend a MILLION DOLLARS on their favorite digital entertainment.
*Platforms take 30% - 70% of that or $300,000 - $700,000.
*RHOVIT TAKES ZERO.  ZILCH.  NADA.  That money?  Back to the Artist.
*We also Ad Share giving Artists 2 ways to profit.
OPEN POST:  No middle man.  No barrier.  No third hand in your pocket.
*Upload your project and it is live in about an hour.
*No fees or percentages paid to 3rd parties to reach your audience.

*No turning down of projects that are ""too indie"".

Behind the curtain.
RHOVIT was started by artists for artists.  Founded by ""The McCulloughs"" a brother and sister film making team, the idea was simple.  Make a site they wanted to use.
The team remains small.  The mission remains giant.  And the idea remains the same...artists and users first.
Why Indiegogo?

We couldn't think of a better place to launch the site and seek support!  In some ways Rhovit owes it's ideals to the crowdfunding sites of the world.  Just like every artists should have a right to raise money for their project they should also have a right to sell it without asking permission or having multiple people reaching into their pocket.

When starting something like this there a million different ways money can be spent and you can never have too much of it!  We are not funded by deep pocketed individuals or corporations.  Everyone who is a part of Rhovit and who helped get it built did so because they believed in the idea behind it.  AND NOW WE ARE COMING TO YOU!!!!
WE NEED YOU TO SIGN UP AND LOAD YOUR WORK!
WE NEED USERS TO START SURFING AND DISCOVERING NEW ARTISTS!

WE NEED YOUR INPUT TO HELP US FURTHER DEVELOP THE SITE AND TURN IT INTO THE BEST PLATFORM EVER!

Where will the money go?
Better question may be where won't it go?  There's MARKETING.  There's DEVELOPMENT.  There's HIRING.
We're designing the iPhone and Android apps right now.  We have some cool ideas for a comic reader and we haven't even gotten to our originally designed PHASE 2 (super secret but very awesome).
The Basics for Content Providers.
*Sign up for an account.
*Upload your project(s) and fill out metadata
*Project will be live in about an hour
*Track all your sales in your backend
*Payed out monthly
The Basics for Users
*Sign up for a free account
*Surf all the promotional videos you want
*Purchase something.  Keep track of it in your Rhovit account.
*All popular formats (PDF, mp3, mp4) that work with almost any device.
FAQ
1.  If I don't live in the US can I sell on Rhovit?

Yes.  We are in the process of geoblocking for SELLING only in the US but you can send us your material and we will start an account for you.  International sellers will be payed once a month through PayPal.
2.  I live in the US and sell on Rhovit, how do I get paid?
We pay out using Dwolla so you will need to sign up for an account.
3.  What happens if I have more then 49 products I want to sell?

Content providers with over 49 products we consider commercial, which just means instead of the subscription fee you pay the cost of hosting your products on Rhovit. Contact us at info@rhovit.com about starting an account.
4.  Can I cancel my membership at anytime?
Of course.  And you can sell on as many other platforms as you want to.  We are non-exclusive.
Please let us know all the questions you have.  We're here and ready to answer!

What is RIAH Media

RIAH Media is a brand new innovative outlook on how customer service should be addressed.  It stands for ""Real-time Interactive Advertising Host"". With the successful completion of this Indiegogo Campaign, we plan to simultaneously launch two RIAH Media systems located at shopping centers in the Southern California market and two RIAH Media/Mobile system platforms as well. Of which we already have a functional prototype &
column2: green vehicles ready for production. These systems will employ LIVE broadcasters who will be ready to assist you, the customer, in any way possible. The interaction between the LIVE host &amp
column3: consumer is what we call: RIAHtalk. These four systems along with our studio will create the foundation for RIAH Media. The system will not only benefit the gaming industry &amp
column4: customer service, but several other industries as well.  Here's what we have lined up for the launch.

column2: Entertainment Locations"" class=""lazy"" data-src=""http://i1341.photobucket.com/albums/o745/Consumermedia/1.png"" src="""" style="""" title=""Two Southern California RIAH Media Gaming &amp
column3: Entertainment Locations""/>Two Southern California RIAH Media Gaming &amp

column1: The Gaming Industry

As stated earlier, the Gaming Industry is truly a market the RIAH system will be able to shine in. Game developers (Rockstar North, Bioware, Naughty Dog, etc.) along with game publishers (Microsoft, Sony, Rockstar, etc.) will be able to use our medium to test market their games and devices first hand and get instant feedback from consumers.  Gamers located at our RIAH Media systems will be able to compete with other mobile RIAH Media system gamers in games that will not be available elsewhere for months or even years.  After gaming matches, the gamers will be able to meet the game developers appearing LIVE on RIAHtalk for Question and Answer sessions.  For the first time being able to have their ideas and input have an audience with the gaming industry and hopefully become a part of the finished game.

This sort of Gaming experience isn't available anywhere else at the moment.  Gamers will be overjoyed and excited that they were able to be a part of an opportunity like this. Not to mention creating quite the hype &
column2: interest around the Gaming Industry. Development teams will be able to get direct feedback without having the gamer download anything. This same model can also be applied to games that have just been released. Or even older games in order to regenerate interest. Contests, tournaments, and other events can just as easily be staged on these systems. Our RIAH Media Mobile platform will be able to reach consumers who would otherwise miss out on an opportunity like this.

column1: RIAH Media/Mobile Gaming Prototype
Product Knowledge and Customer Service

Customer Service is another aspect where RIAH Media will be able to perform exceptionally well. When not playing games or having celebrities appear on RIAHtalk, the RIAH system will provide customer support. At our broadcasting center we will have specialists waiting for you to walk up to the RIAH system and ask a question.  The specialist will always be there ready to assist you in any way possible.  If you need directions in the retail location, they can provide them.  If you need to know which retial location is having the biggest sale, all you need to do is ask.  Just like the celebrity RIAHtalk experience, they can see you and you see them.

Product knowledge is just as important to us here as well. Whether you need assistance finding a product or even a demonstration video on how to use an item, the specialist can pull it up within seconds.  If they don't have the means to assist you with your question they can transfer you immediately to another agent who specializes in the field you need assistance in.  They can also email you literature and brochures about specific products along with instructions and help guides.  You will never have to wander around aimlessly looking for assistance.  You'll always know you can get it instantly at one of our RIAH Media systems free of charge.
RIAH Media Retail Example
The Film Industry and Celebrities

The RIAH Media system will benefit the Film Industry immensely by providing a public/industry interaction like never before.  At our studio, we will have celebrities and filmmakers from upcoming releases come in routinely and broadcast live to our RIAH Media systems nationwide through RIAHtalk. Do to the nature of this Industry, we believe Southern California to be the premier location to install our first RIAH systems. Its access to A-List talent and film studios that employ them is unparalleled. At each system, patrons will be lined up, ready to ask their favorite actor or actress a question and be able to talk to them live. You see them and they see you. Here they will answer any questions you'd wish to ask and just generally chat with you.

Likewise, the system is also perfect for anniversaries of classic films or TV shows. You might ask, why not just have a regular public appearances?  Well, a public appearance can only benefit one place at a time. But through the RIAH Media system they can be broadcast to multiple systems simultaneously, worldwide. Wherever there is a fan eager to talk. Just like in the Gaming Industry, this brings up the hype and appeal of the promoted entertainment.  Along with providing filmmakers valued feedback from their fans.  This once in a lifetime moment won't soon be forgotten. All patrons will generally have a positive attitude towards what's being promoted.  Unlike standard advertising practices, this is captivating. This interaction is the main draw of their attention. The system can be used for TV shows, webisodes, celebrity endorsements, athletes connecting with their fans, or just plain entertainment. This sort of connection is easily available through RIAH Media.
RIAH Media Capabilities, Las Vegas
Community Service

Community and City Service is of great importance to us here at Consumermedia. With having a tool like RIAH Media at your disposal, it would be impossible not to use it for the good of the community.  That's why we have come up with ways to help the surrounding communities of each RIAH Media system.  We can issue Public Service Announcements and Amber alerts as soon as they become available.  If people have information that is needed, we can patch them through to local officials who can help within seconds. We can also answer questions about recent big changes in the community or in more important cases
column2: have public officials show up to answer questions LIVE on RIAHtalk. orchestrate

Adding more locations in different cities (i.e. Las Vegas, New York, Miami, Atlanta, Chicago, Dallas, etc.) and increasing rewards in each level as it continues to grow.
RIAH Media/Mobile, Los Angeles, California
What To Expect After Campaign Completion

While all of these features we have created will really change industries. We need your help to bring them all into fruition. We have already developed a test functional RIAH Media system and RIAH Media/Mobile vehicle.  But we need your help in the form of financial backing so we can bring the system to market. We have recently been awarded a U.S. Patent (8,063,998) and another US Patent that is currently pending on this technology. So all we need now is your help Indiegogo backers!  At Consumermedia, we are committed to The Gaming Industry, Film Industry, and Product Knowledge. With your help, everything we have mentioned and more can be realized. Thank you for showing interest in our project and if you have any questions, feel free to contact us and please visit our website for amazing concept videos.

column1: He has been in this industry for over 25 years and has held critical positions that molded his managerial and leadership qualities. He has been the responsible lead Engineer on several classified projects that have met and exceeded both budget and schedule. His company was founded to introduce a ""New LIVE Medium"" in advertising utilizing a captive audience.

He's always had a deep passion for the Advertising Industry. This passion is what has driven him to introduce a ""New LIVE Medium"" in advertising. Which utilizes a captive audience. His efforts on this endeavor began in June 2006, with a live demonstration to the Entertainment Industry. Which also lead to the creation of his mobile platform. With Indiegogo's help, he plans to bring RIAH MediaTM Technology to every US Market.

","What is RIAH Media

RIAH Media is a brand new innovative outlook on how customer service should be addressed.  It stands for ""Real-time Interactive Advertising Host"". With the successful completion of this Indiegogo Campaign, we plan to simultaneously launch two RIAH Media systems located at shopping centers in the Southern California market and two RIAH Media/Mobile system platforms as well. Of which we already have a functional prototype & green vehicles ready for production. These systems will employ LIVE broadcasters who will be ready to assist you, the customer, in any way possible. The interaction between the LIVE host & consumer is what we call: RIAHtalk. These four systems along with our studio will create the foundation for RIAH Media. The system will not only benefit the gaming industry & customer service, but several other industries as well.  Here's what we have lined up for the launch.
Two Southern California RIAH Media Gaming & Entertainment Locations
The Gaming Industry

As stated earlier, the Gaming Industry is truly a market the RIAH system will be able to shine in. Game developers (Rockstar North, Bioware, Naughty Dog, etc.) along with game publishers (Microsoft, Sony, Rockstar, etc.) will be able to use our medium to test market their games and devices first hand and get instant feedback from consumers.  Gamers located at our RIAH Media systems will be able to compete with other mobile RIAH Media system gamers in games that will not be available elsewhere for months or even years.  After gaming matches, the gamers will be able to meet the game developers appearing LIVE on RIAHtalk for Question and Answer sessions.  For the first time being able to have their ideas and input have an audience with the gaming industry and hopefully become a part of the finished game.

This sort of Gaming experience isn't available anywhere else at the moment.  Gamers will be overjoyed and excited that they were able to be a part of an opportunity like this. Not to mention creating quite the hype & interest around the Gaming Industry. Development teams will be able to get direct feedback without having the gamer download anything. This same model can also be applied to games that have just been released. Or even older games in order to regenerate interest. Contests, tournaments, and other events can just as easily be staged on these systems. Our RIAH Media Mobile platform will be able to reach consumers who would otherwise miss out on an opportunity like this.
RIAH Media/Mobile Gaming Prototype
Product Knowledge and Customer Service

Customer Service is another aspect where RIAH Media will be able to perform exceptionally well. When not playing games or having celebrities appear on RIAHtalk, the RIAH system will provide customer support. At our broadcasting center we will have specialists waiting for you to walk up to the RIAH system and ask a question.  The specialist will always be there ready to assist you in any way possible.  If you need directions in the retail location, they can provide them.  If you need to know which retial location is having the biggest sale, all you need to do is ask.  Just like the celebrity RIAHtalk experience, they can see you and you see them. Product knowledge is just as important to us here as well. Whether you need assistance finding a product or even a demonstration video on how to use an item, the specialist can pull it up within seconds.  If they don't have the means to assist you with your question they can transfer you immediately to another agent who specializes in the field you need assistance in.  They can also email you literature and brochures about specific products along with instructions and help guides.  You will never have to wander around aimlessly looking for assistance.  You'll always know you can get it instantly at one of our RIAH Media systems free of charge.

column2: >

column1: <ul>
• Single-player
• Perfect match of puzzle and action games
• In English, Spanish, Italian, French, German and Portuguese.
• On PC, MAC, iOS, Android and XBox Live. Hopefully, also on PSN and WiiU e-shop

IslaBomba, a peaceful island in the middle of the ocean, is ruled by Nasty, a tyrant king who wants to bomb its inhabitants’ homeland to build a paddle court, a kart circuit, a bowling alley and other important stuff King Nasty obviously needs.

Your mission is to throw King Nasty’s bombs into different substances, such as water or quicksand, before the spark burns the whole fuse. In order to do it, you’ll control three of these inhabitants at the same time, each one of them with unique features and skills:
<ul>
• The penguins can grab bombs and throw them far away.
<ul>
• The rabbits can hop (surprise!) and push bombs with their body.
<ul>
• The turtles can push buttons with their legs and carry other animals on their shell.

Together with the characters’ skills, stages will include dynamic elements, such as: changing wind, quicksand, physics-related puzzles and even flocks of doves! All this will make the game more and more varied, funny and challenging.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >

column1: <ul>
• 3 different characters with unique skills.
• 200 challenging stages.
• 4 different environments: jungle, desert, ice and an unlockable location only available when finishing the game.
• Endless hours of fun and happines.

column2: > Please, have a look at this gameplay video!
>
>

column1: IslaBomba is the first game made by Sons of a Bit Entertainment, co-founded by Eduardo and Alberto Saldaña (Yes, we are brothers). We have been playing and making videogames as amateurs even before starting to talk (exaggerated version), so we think it was time to release our first complete videogame. This is the dream of our lives. Do you help us?

column2: >
>

column1: We've been working on the game partime for half a year and we've come to the conclusion we need your help to finish this exciting project.
We already have some equipment:
<ul>
• iPhone 3GS
• iPhone 4S
• iPad 3rd Gen
• MacBook Pro
• Some professional pieces of software: Adobe CS5, Maya, Blender, Final Cut Pro, etc.
• Midi instruments, screens, scanners, digital tablets etc.
The game is playable, although playability must be polished and we need to create new stages and environments. If you, dear backer, help us, that’s what we’re going to spend your money on:
<ul>
• Improving graphics, music, physics… Everything.
• Getting new devices to test our game. Emulators are not trustworthy.
• Getting the pieces of hardware and software we need to make the game exactly as we imagined.
• Our office expenses during the development of IslaBomba (light, water, professional Internet connection...)
• Testing and bug fixing.

Your contribution will go directly toward the project. We don’t want to buy a new car, we want to make our dreams come true thanks to your generosity. With your help we can cover some of the costs of creating, publishing, and selling IslaBomba. Of course, we will give you great rewards for your help!

column1: Q: When will the game be released?
A: We are working hard to release the game at some time in the first 6 months of 2014. We'll confirm the release date ASAP!
Q: What will happen if you don't meet your goal on Indiegogo?

A: We will release the game, whatever happens. However, if we don't reach our goal, the game will be released on App Store, Mac App Store, Windows and Linux. The console and Android versions will have to wait a little bit.
On the other hand, aspects such as graphics, physics and optimization will be affected.
Q: I really want to help you, guys. How can I do it if I don't have enough money to contribute?
A: There are many ways of helping us! For example, you can talk about us and IslaBomba to your friends, relatives, neighbours, classmates... Everyone!
If many people visit this campaign and share it on the social media, it will be more visible on Indiegogo website and more people might contribute.
So, if you want to help but you can't contribute with money, just spread the word!
Q: So, will the game be released on Wii U and PS3?
A: We can't confirm anything yet. What we can say is that the PS3 version is more likely than the Wii U's right now. Stay tuned!
If you have any other questions, please send an email to info@sonsofabit.com

column1: It’s really hard to make great video games. Everything has to be perfect if we want to create an unforgettable experience. However, we are committed to finish the game, whatever it takes. The only risk is that IslaBomba would take longer than expected if we don't reach our goal. But the game will be released anyway, for sure. Don’t worry about that! We know what we are doing!.

column1: ¡Actualización!
¿Quieres ver cómo se hace un videojuego? ¡Echa un vistazo a nuestro nuevo vídeo!

column2: >

column1: <h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >

column1: <ul>
• Desafío para un jugador.
• Mezcla perfecta de juegos de acción, puzzles y plataformas.
• Traducido al español, inglés, italiano, francés, alemán y portugués.
• Para PC, MAC, iOS, Android y XBox Live. Posiblemente también en PSN y WiiU e-shop.

El juego se desarrolla en una pacífica isla en medio del océano llamada IslaBomba. La isla está gobernada por King Nasty, un rey tirano que quiere bombardear las tierras de sus habitantes para construir una pista de paddle, un circuito de karts, una bolera y otras cosas que King Nasty cree vitales para el reino.

Tu misión es arrojar las bombas de King Nasty a diferentes sustancias, tales como agua o arenas movedizas, antes de que la mecha se consuma. Para hacerlo, tomarás el control de tres animales al mismo tiempo, cada uno con características y habilidades únicas:
<ul>
• Los pingüinos pueden agarrar bombas y lanzarlas lejos.
<ul>
• Los conejos pueden saltar (¡Sorpresa!) y empujar bombas, así como otros objetos pequeños con su cuerpo.
<ul>
• Las tortugas pueden cargar con otros animales sobre su caparazón y además son las únicas que pueden pulsar botones con sus patitas para activar diferentes mecanismos.

Junto con las habilidades de los personajes, cada fase incluirá elementos dinámicos, tales como: ráfagas de viento, arenas movedizas, puzles basados en físicas… ¡e incluso bandadas de palomas! Todo esto hará el juego cada vez más variado, divertido y desafiante.
<h3 style=""text-align: center
column2: >

column1: <ul>
• 3 personajes diferentes con habilidades únicas.
• 200 fases desafiantes y divertidas.
• 4 escenarios diferentes: el bosque, el desierto, las cumbres heladas y una ubicación secreta que estará visible una vez el jugador complete todas las demás.
• Infinitas horas de diversión garantizadas.

column2: > Por favor, echa un vistazo al siguiente vídeo del Gameplay pre-alpha:
>
>

column1: IslaBomba es el primer proyecto de Sons of a Bit, fundada por Eduardo y Alberto Saldaña. Sí, somos hermanos. Hemos estado jugando y haciendo videojuegos como aficionados desde antes incluso de empezar a hablar (dramatización de los hechos), así que creemos que ha llegado la hora de lanzar nuestro primer videojuego comercial. Es el sueño de nuestra vida, ¿nos ayudas?.

column2: >
>

column1: Hemos estado trabajando en el juego a tiempo parcial desde hace casi un año y hemos llegado a la conclusión de que necesitamos tu ayuda para finalizar este emocionante proyecto.
Ya disponemos de material en la oficina:
<ul>
• iPhone 3GS
• iPhone 4S
• iPad 3rd Gen
• MacBook Pro
• Paquetes de software profesinal: Adobe CS5, Maya, Blender, Final Cut Pro, etc.
• instrumentos MIDI, monitores, escáner, tableta digitalizadora etc.
El título ya es jugable, pero necesitamos pulir el control, añadir elementos dinámicos y crear nuevas fases y escenarios. Si tú, querido colaborador, nos ayudas, invertiremos el dinero en:
<ul>
• Mejorar los gráficos, la música, las físicas... Todo.
• Adquirir nuevos dispositivos para probar el juego. Los emuladores no son de fiar.
• Hacernos con los kits de desarrollo para PS3 y WiiU.
• Sufragar los impuestos y gastos de oficina durante el desarrollo de IslaBomba (luz, agua, conexión profesional a Internet etc.)
• Pruebas y solución de errores.

column1: P: ¿Cuándo saldrá el juego?
R: Estamos trabajando muy duro para que el juego salga durante el primer semestre de 2014. ¡Confirmaremos la fecha lo antes posible!
P: ¿Qué pasará si no conseguís vuestro objetivo en Indiegogo?

R: Vamos a lanzar el juego, pase lo que pase. No obstante, si no alcanzamos nuestro objetivo, el juego aparecerá en la App Store, Mac App Store, Windows y Linux. Las versiones para consolas y Android tendrán que esperar un poquito.
Por otro lado, algunos aspectos como los gráficos, las físicas y la optimización se verán afectadas de un modo u otro.
P: De verdad que me gustaría ayudaros, chicos. ¿Cómo lo puedo hacer si no tengo suficiente dinero?
R: ¡Hay muchas formas de ayudarnos! Por ejemplo, puedes hablar de nosotros y de IslaBomba a tus amigos, familiares, vecinos, compañeros de clase... ¡A todo el mundo!
Si conseguimos que mucha gente visite esta campaña y la comparta en sus perfiles de las redes sociales, será más visible en la web de Indiegogo y podríamos conseguir más contribuyentes.
Así que si quieres ayudar pero no puedes contribuir con dinero, ¡difunde la palabra!
P: Entonces, ¿el juego saldrá en Wii U y PS3?
R: No podemos confirmar nada todavía. Lo que sí podemos decir es que la versión de PS3 está más cerca de materializarse que la de Wii U en estos momentos. ¡Permanece atento!
Si tienes más preguntas, no lo dudes y escríbenos un correo electrónico a info@sonsofabit.com

column1: Es realmente difícil hacer juegos sobresalientes. Todo tiene que ser perfecto si queremos crear una experiencia inolvidable. No obstante, estamos comprometidos con la idea de terminar el juego, sea como sea. El único riesgo es que IslaBomba tarde en lanzarse un poco más de lo esperado, pero lo haremos de un modo u otro. No te preocupes, ¡sabemos lo que hacemos!.
","Update!
Do you want to see how games are made? Have a look at this new video
Single-player
Perfect match of puzzle and action games
In English, Spanish, Italian, French, German and Portuguese.
On PC, MAC, iOS, Android and XBox Live. Hopefully, also on PSN and WiiU e-shop

IslaBomba, a peaceful island in the middle of the ocean, is ruled by Nasty, a tyrant king who wants to bomb its inhabitants’ homeland to build a paddle court, a kart circuit, a bowling alley and other important stuff King Nasty obviously needs.

Your mission is to throw King Nasty’s bombs into different substances, such as water or quicksand, before the spark burns the whole fuse. In order to do it, you’ll control three of these inhabitants at the same time, each one of them with unique features and skills:
The penguins can grab bombs and throw them far away.
The rabbits can hop (surprise!) and push bombs with their body.
The turtles can push buttons with their legs and carry other animals on their shell.

Together with the characters’ skills, stages will include dynamic elements, such as: changing wind, quicksand, physics-related puzzles and even flocks of doves! All this will make the game more and more varied, funny and challenging.
3 different characters with unique skills.
200 challenging stages.
4 different environments: jungle, desert, ice and an unlockable location only available when finishing the game.
Endless hours of fun and happines.
Please, have a look at this gameplay video!

IslaBomba is the first game made by Sons of a Bit Entertainment, co-founded by Eduardo and Alberto Saldaña (Yes, we are brothers). We have been playing and making videogames as amateurs even before starting to talk (exaggerated version), so we think it was time to release our first complete videogame. This is the dream of our lives. Do you help us?
We've been working on the game partime for half a year and we've come to the conclusion we need your help to finish this exciting project.
We already have some equipment:
iPhone 3GS
iPhone 4S
iPad 3rd Gen
MacBook Pro
Some professional pieces of software: Adobe CS5, Maya, Blender, Final Cut Pro, etc.
Midi instruments, screens, scanners, digital tablets etc.
The game is playable, although playability must be polished and we need to create new stages and environments. If you, dear backer, help us, that’s what we’re going to spend your money on:
Improving graphics, music, physics… Everything.
Getting new devices to test our game. Emulators are not trustworthy.
Getting the pieces of hardware and software we need to make the game exactly as we imagined.
Our office expenses during the development of IslaBomba (light, water, professional Internet connection...)
Testing and bug fixing.

Your contribution will go directly toward the project. We don’t want to buy a new car, we want to make our dreams come true thanks to your generosity. With your help we can cover some of the costs of creating, publishing, and selling IslaBomba. Of course, we will give you great rewards for your help!
Up to 30 contributors.
Up to 20 contributors.
Up to 5 contributors.
Only one available.
Q: When will the game be released?
A: We are working hard to release the game at some time in the first 6 months of 2014. We'll confirm the release date ASAP!
Q: What will happen if you don't meet your goal on Indiegogo?

A: We will release the game, whatever happens. However, if we don't reach our goal, the game will be released on App Store, Mac App Store, Windows and Linux. The console and Android versions will have to wait a little bit.
On the other hand, aspects such as graphics, physics and optimization will be affected.
Q: I really want to help you, guys. How can I do it if I don't have enough money to contribute?
A: There are many ways of helping us! For example, you can talk about us and IslaBomba to your friends, relatives, neighbours, classmates... Everyone!
If many people visit this campaign and share it on the social media, it will be more visible on Indiegogo website and more people might contribute.
So, if you want to help but you can't contribute with money, just spread the word!
Q: So, will the game be released on Wii U and PS3?
A: We can't confirm anything yet. What we can say is that the PS3 version is more likely than the Wii U's right now. Stay tuned!
If you have any other questions, please send an email to info@sonsofabit.com
You can follow us on:
Twitter
Facebook
Our Youtube channel

It’s really hard to make great video games. Everything has to be perfect if we want to create an unforgettable experience. However, we are committed to finish the game, whatever it takes. The only risk is that IslaBomba would take longer than expected if we don't reach our goal. But the game will be released anyway, for sure. Don’t worry about that! We know what we are doing!.
¡Actualización!
¿Quieres ver cómo se hace un videojuego? ¡Echa un vistazo a nuestro nuevo vídeo!
Desafío para un jugador.
Mezcla perfecta de juegos de acción, puzzles y plataformas.
Traducido al español, inglés, italiano, francés, alemán y portugués.
Para PC, MAC, iOS, Android y XBox Live. Posiblemente también en PSN y WiiU e-shop.

El juego se desarrolla en una pacífica isla en medio del océano llamada IslaBomba. La isla está gobernada por King Nasty, un rey tirano que quiere bombardear las tierras de sus habitantes para construir una pista de paddle, un circuito de karts, una bolera y otras cosas que King Nasty cree vitales para el reino.

Tu misión es arrojar las bombas de King Nasty a diferentes sustancias, tales como agua o arenas movedizas, antes de que la mecha se consuma. Para hacerlo, tomarás el control de tres animales al mismo tiempo, cada uno con características y habilidades únicas:
Los pingüinos pueden agarrar bombas y lanzarlas lejos.
Los conejos pueden saltar (¡Sorpresa!) y empujar bombas, así como otros objetos pequeños con su cuerpo.
Las tortugas pueden cargar con otros animales sobre su caparazón y además son las únicas que pueden pulsar botones con sus patitas para activar diferentes mecanismos.

Junto con las habilidades de los personajes, cada fase incluirá elementos dinámicos, tales como: ráfagas de viento, arenas movedizas, puzles basados en físicas… ¡e incluso bandadas de palomas! Todo esto hará el juego cada vez más variado, divertido y desafiante.
3 personajes diferentes con habilidades únicas.
200 fases desafiantes y divertidas.
4 escenarios diferentes: el bosque, el desierto, las cumbres heladas y una ubicación secreta que estará visible una vez el jugador complete todas las demás.
Infinitas horas de diversión garantizadas.
Por favor, echa un vistazo al siguiente vídeo del Gameplay pre-alpha:

IslaBomba es el primer proyecto de Sons of a Bit, fundada por Eduardo y Alberto Saldaña. Sí, somos hermanos. Hemos estado jugando y haciendo videojuegos como aficionados desde antes incluso de empezar a hablar (dramatización de los hechos), así que creemos que ha llegado la hora de lanzar nuestro primer videojuego comercial. Es el sueño de nuestra vida, ¿nos ayudas?.
Hemos estado trabajando en el juego a tiempo parcial desde hace casi un año y hemos llegado a la conclusión de que necesitamos tu ayuda para finalizar este emocionante proyecto.
Ya disponemos de material en la oficina:
iPhone 3GS
iPhone 4S
iPad 3rd Gen
MacBook Pro
Paquetes de software profesinal: Adobe CS5, Maya, Blender, Final Cut Pro, etc.
instrumentos MIDI, monitores, escáner, tableta digitalizadora etc.
El título ya es jugable, pero necesitamos pulir el control, añadir elementos dinámicos y crear nuevas fases y escenarios. Si tú, querido colaborador, nos ayudas, invertiremos el dinero en:
Mejorar los gráficos, la música, las físicas... Todo.
Adquirir nuevos dispositivos para probar el juego. Los emuladores no son de fiar.
Hacernos con los kits de desarrollo para PS3 y WiiU.
Sufragar los impuestos y gastos de oficina durante el desarrollo de IslaBomba (luz, agua, conexión profesional a Internet etc.)
Pruebas y solución de errores.

column4: >Hi, we are a team of 4 entrepreneurs from Colombia, we finished University recently and decided we want do the things by our own way, we don't want to work for anyone else. We want to accomplish our dreams and goals working in our own enterprise. We started working in mobile applications development for our own way with the name of Cattleya Studios, we make our first app in around 4 months and we launch it, but we don't make much with this, and in that moment we understood that we need help of people for make our project and achieve our goals.

>Since the beginning we have learned a lot for our own way, because in our country this is just beginning and we don’t have roads where we can guide yet, but we want learn and work, we really think that if you fight for the things that you want you can do it.
>

>In this moment we are developing a new game for mobile devices, it is called Ten Words, it challenges your mental agility and your quickness of observation along more than ten levels with differents topics. Is a word puzzle in which we have to find 10 words for level in a limit of time for get the highest score. Ten Words is our second game and we have learned a lot of things of our first game and we want go so far as we can.
>

>It isn't just about the game, it is about have the possibility of establish our own videogame studio, have full time dedication in videogame development, make anything for develop the game and have a successful enterprise. We have a lot of ideas but we need your help.

>We need the money for develop our game and we will work in more ideas and in a professional way, with a workplace at which we meet and work in a better way. All the help that you provide us will be distributed as follows:
>We hope that you can help us in our campaign, in the right is the list with the rewards that you will obtain for make this reality.
>Thanks for visit our campaign, if you want help but don’t have money help us to share our campaign with your friends, we will appreciate that.

column1: ","Hi, we are a team of 4 entrepreneurs from Colombia, we finished University recently and decided we want do the things by our own way, we don't want to work for anyone else. We want to accomplish our dreams and goals working in our own enterprise. We started working in mobile applications development for our own way with the name of Cattleya Studios, we make our first app in around 4 months and we launch it, but we don't make much with this, and in that moment we understood that we need help of people for make our project and achieve our goals.

Since the beginning we have learned a lot for our own way, because in our country this is just beginning and we don’t have roads where we can guide yet, but we want learn and work, we really think that if you fight for the things that you want you can do it.
The 4 entrepreneurs of Cattleya.

In this moment we are developing a new game for mobile devices, it is called Ten Words, it challenges your mental agility and your quickness of observation along more than ten levels with differents topics. Is a word puzzle in which we have to find 10 words for level in a limit of time for get the highest score. Ten Words is our second game and we have learned a lot of things of our first game and we want go so far as we can.
Here´s a screens of the game:

It isn't just about the game, it is about have the possibility of establish our own videogame studio, have full time dedication in videogame development, make anything for develop the game and have a successful enterprise. We have a lot of ideas but we need your help.

We need the money for develop our game and we will work in more ideas and in a professional way, with a workplace at which we meet and work in a better way. All the help that you provide us will be distributed as follows:
We hope that you can help us in our campaign, in the right is the list with the rewards that you will obtain for make this reality.
Thanks for visit our campaign, if you want help but don’t have money help us to share our campaign with your friends, we will appreciate that.",20.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Bogota, Colombia",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ten-words/pica

""MARCH FOR WWII ONLINE""

S! WWII Online Community,

Today we launch our important funding campaign which will help us do even more for the game. There are three components to this goal:

  • Art Software.
  • Project Tools.
  • European Marketing Campaign.

ART SOFTWARE DETAILS

Only as of late have we really began the process of bringing in new game content. All of this new content has been for the ""Infantry"" game only. This Art software unlocks many capabilities for the team at CRS, to include introducing new...

  • Tanks, artillery and trucks for the Army persona.
• Air planes, bombers and transport planes for the Air Force.
• Vessels for the Navy.
• Buildings and terrain objects.
• Player placed objects.
Basically, anything other than infantry.
<div>
PROJECT TOOLS DETAIL

At CRS, we're gaining momentum. To compound that momentum we need to be equipped with state of the art project management / software development tools. We're looking to purchase server licenses for these Atlassian products...
<ul>
• Jira.
• Confluence.
• BitBucket.

In doing so our team can incorporate important software development disciplines like the ""Scrum"" methodology, Sprints and having access to the Kanban function. For the last couple of years we have used Open Source software and have vastly outgrown what it can do for us.
EUROPEAN MARKETING CAMPAIGN

Recently we have re-established a vital relationship with a previous CRS member named, ""LINDIR."" He has been a long friend of the company, but more importantly to this matter, his professional career is focused on Video Game Marketing in Europe. Here's what we'll get...
<ul>
• Access to 500+ major media contacts.
<li>PR &amp
• More players in WWII Online.
This is an opportunity that does not come up often, and our expected return on investment in terms of coverage and players getting into the game is strong.

How will these initiatives help the game?

  • It will open ALL currently closed art development doors.
• We get more organized and effective internally.
• We gain huge awareness in Europe about the game.
• More players will return with new content.
All of these things happen without taking away our current progression on 1.35 stabilization development at any time.

How can I help?

  • Contribute funds to this campaign.
• Routinely educate and inform fellow players what all this means.
• Encourage other people to force multiply the message.

TWO WEEKS ONLY FOR FUNDING!

Only two weeks to fulfill the funding for this Campaign. In order for us to purchase some of this software at a price we negotiated we are on a timeline.
We hope that over the last year we have garnered your support and shown our commitment to produce a better WWII Online.
Our thanks to all of our subscribers and fans!
SALUTE
Cornered Rat Software

How it Works
column2: >Carpool Complete’s cloud-based calendar allows each carpool member to contribute to the calendar. After the initial set up, Carpool Complete allows each carpool member to select his/her driving assignments. Push notifications let members know when their friends have taken action.
column3:
>

Easy to Use
column4:
>Simply tap the steering wheel to choose a driving assignment.

The Information You Need At a Glance

Safe
column5: >Choose just the friends you know and trust to join your carpool group.
column8: >The passenger list updates instantly in case your child is unable to make an event.
column10:
>Quick Text

The quick text option allows you to conveniently send the most common messages to your carpool group. Send to one person or your entire group.

Sleek Design
column11: >The intuitive design of the app makes navigating it quick and easy.
column12:
>  

Where will the funds be used?

If we fall short of our $3500 goal, we will use the funds raised to build portions of the GPS feature and seek additional funding elsewhere. In the same vein, if we fall short of the $10,000 goal we will use the funds raised to sections of the Android version and seek additional funding from other sources.
column13:
>Learn More

Find out more at www.carpoolcomplete.com or download the app now at https://appsto.re/us/a5YN_.i

Download the Official Demo of FRAN BOW
http://store.steampowered.com/app/362680

Fran Bow is a Horror Point and click game that tells the story of Fran, a young girl struggling with a mental disorder and an unfair destiny. It is a trip to the deepest and darkest side of human psychology, delivered through blood and tears.

After being witness of the gruesome (and mysterious) loss of her parents, found dismembered at their home Fran runs away into the woods, together with her only friend: Mr. Midnight, a black cat that Fran had previously received as a present from her parents. In the forest, Fran loses senses and when she recovers, she is at Oswald Asylum, an oppressive mental institution for children, with no trace of Mr. Midnight.
After having a dream about her beloved cat she decides to escape the institution to find him and go back to aunt Grace. Aunt Grace is her only living relative who she is very fond of.
Nothing comes easy for Fran. There is also a strange creature, Remor, who wants to prevent Fran Bow from going home at any cost. But she is determined to find her cat, return to aunt Grace and together find out who is responsible for her parents murders.
<ul>
<li>
Story driven psychological horror adventure game
<li>
Unique and peculiar hand drawn 2D Art-Style
<li>
Self-administer medication to open the terrible hidden world that will help solve puzzles and find objects
<li>
A bizarre variety of puzzles designed in different levels of difficulty and mostly based on the twisted relationship between Fran Bow's imagination and reality
<li>
Old Arcade inspired mini-games designed to be part of the transitions in the story
<li>
Interactive and occasionally playable pet cat, Mr Midnight
<li>
Several interactive characters with unique personalities that will help or prevent Fran Bow going home
When we started this game, we never thought it would become the huge masterpiece it is today! We thought that it would be something that we could do on our spare time...
But as time progressed, the game development progress slowed down. As mentioned before, the minigames are a whole new engine to code and to make a different art style for.
Almost all of the puzzles are unique, and there is no copy pasting puzzle-code! They take time and care to fully implement into the game. And there are many to do...
Most of our time we would like to put into making this game goes to other jobs, just so we can pay the rent and everything else a normal life contains.

So, after 7 months of hard work, we decided to try out crowdfunding! To see if we can reach out to you, to see if we can make you see the beauty in this game, and help us out by giving us the time back to start working on it fulltime!
We have done the first chapter and finishing the second one right now. There are still 3 to do! Natalia needs to draw and animate everything and Isak has lots to code!
We haven't had any time to implement sound nor music, except for placeholder examples. We want a very unique sound design for it, and are able to do it, with time allowing.
We are aiming at a multi-platform release! That means Linux, Mac, iOS, Android, Windows, WP8 and Win 8! It could all be possible!
Where would my money go?

If we can raise the amount of money, then we could stay away from the other jobs we have and lock ourselves inside our home office and work with the game 200%! We would need to be able to pay the costs of living and making the game!
If by a weird chance of luck we get above what we ask for, we could hire another programmer and test it on more devices and platforms! And also translate it other languages!
What do I get, other than our eternal gratitude?
By contributing you will first of all get our gratitude, I mean really, you will get it! Whatever help you give means a lot!

After that, depending on the amount, you get alot of cool stuff we are able to make from our home! Most of it will be digital, because that's more enviromental friendly, but some perks will need to be sent by post! And because there are only two of us, we will not promise perks that we cannot deliver!

<h3 class=""entry-title"">
You can now cast votes alongside your Congress member, in real time - The Washington Post
Want to Cast Your Vote in Congress? - MSNBC
This New Hack Keeps You Up to Date on House Floor Votes as if You Were There - TechPresident
I am a former House staffer, an engineer, a gamer, and the creator of Capitol Bells. I am hacking the United States Congress to get real Democracy. AMA! - Reddit
Capitol Bells share your vote on Congressional Bills in real time - Daily Kos
The App That Gives You a Voice on Capitol Hill - Daily Download
Bend Native Chimes in with App - Bend Bulletin
<div>
Capitol Bells Toll for Transparency - CQ Roll Call
Capitol Bells
Real Democracy.

In April I first launched Capitol Bells, a free iOS app that tells you when Congress is voting using a radio receiver I installed near the Capitol that picks up signals from their internal notification system. The app has grown to be very popular among Members of Congress and their staff in the House of Representatives since then.

This month, I released a massive update to invite the public to join their Representatives in this new virtual Congress. It lets you watch the progress of live votes, find all the bill details, plug into the social media discussion, and actually vote alongside your Representative on the app.
As a former Hill staffer, I know the frustration many people feel with Congress. Many of us feel like our representatives in Washington aren't listening. I can safely say that we're right
My mission is to make civic engagement addictive and to make public opinion undeniably transparent, right down to the local level.
Members of Congress and their staff are already using and watching Capitol Bells on a daily basis for alerts and updates. Now it's up to you to add your voice to the main screen.
Watch how Capitol Bells puts Congress in the palm of your hand (http://bit.ly/16UBr82)
With your contribution, I'm going to make it even easier to measure how well your Congressman is representing you, and to spur him to support the initiatives you and your neighbors care about most.
And, first things first, I will port Capitol Bells to Android to make this new kind of democracy available to more Americans.
My Goal
I am asking for $5,000 to continue this project.
With these donations, I will tackle three major steps toward completing Capitol Bells.
I will port it to Android by September 9th, when Congress is next scheduled to be in session.
I will add a new tool to compare your votes to your Member's votes. You will see exactly how frequently your Congressman represents you, and how his votes compare to your entire district's.
I will add a feature to allow you to search legislation and promote the bills you want your Congressman to support, and see if he cosponsors the most popular ones from your district or not.
Check out our perks on the right hand side of the page. Any contribution helps, and we want to make sure its worth your while.
The Impact
Real democracy, by the people. Let's change the equation in Washington. Let's make it easier to represent our will. Let's encourage good government and public service.
By providing accessibility, transparency, and engagement in Congress, Capitol Bells will help create a more perfect union. Capitol Bells will help make every voice count EQUALLY.
Other Ways You Can Help
You can still make a huge difference if you can't contribute
<ul>
• Share the campaign with your friends
• Download the app from iTunes
• Tell your friends again
If you have any questions about the app or the campaign, feel free to give me a shout out on Twitter or Facebook.
