column1: ","EARLY BIRDS - Get your own exclusive YOU.FO set before it hits the stores!
Please fund: €79 (Netherlands/Belgium) €99 (Europe), €119 (US/Global)
(ONE SET = 2 sticks + 1 ring + 1 bag). Only now 1 extra ring & shipping included
YOU.FO is
an innovative, unique sports game: easy to play, hard to master. Inventor and
designer Bas Ruyssenaars challenges enthusiasts worldwide to join in the
realisation of YOU.FO by contributing to this campaign. We need your contribution to produce the first series, develop more
game concepts and share YOU.FO with the rest of the world. The goal of the
campaign is to raise at least € 20.000 within 60
days.
Every contribution
helps! And
from a contribution of € 79 ($ 99) you will receive a
YOU.FO set before it gets to the stores!

Winner 2012 European-wide award Profit Innovation Award, fieldlab Eindhoven Finalist ISPO Brand New 2013. Jury Profit Award: ""highly innovative with the right mix between power and balance"". Winner of the National (Dutch) Sports Innovation Award 2013!
What is YOU.FO?
YOU.FO (patent pending) is an
innovative sportsconcept, based on throwing and catching an aerodynamic ring
with specially designed sticks over distances of 10 to 30 metres. This requires
concentration, strength, flexibility and cooperation. The basic skills are easy
to learn but YOU.FO players continue to be challenged to improve their skills, and
to invent new game concepts as well. YOU.FO can be played one on one or in teams,
with goals or freestyle, in the citypark, on sportsfields or at the beach. You can play YOU.FO from the age of twelve.
Development of YOU.FO
Founder of YOU.FO, Bas Ruyssenaars, was on
summer vacation in 2010 when he recalled a game he had invented and played when
he was young. Bas and his son started improvising on the beach and the idea for
YOU.FO was born. Once back home Bas set up a team of industrial
designers, specialists in aerodynamics, sport innovation professionals and
trainee sports teachers. Now, after two years of concept development and fine-tuning, YOU.FO is market ready.

A YOU.FO set contains two sticks made of aluminum frames, and a plastic, double-layered, aerodynamic ring. The weight of a stick is 600 gram and the weight of a ring is 160 gram.  As we value sustainable, environment friendly production processes, a lot of thought has gone into the production materials: recycling of all YOU.FO plastic components is guaranteed through the Return2Sender (R2S) recycle programme.
Game concepts

We are participating in a sports fieldlab setting and are developing all sorts of game concepts in collaboration with players, sports teachers and sports innovation organisations in the Netherlands. We started out with one-on-one games, pattern-play and YOU.FO golf. When more people got to test YOU.FO the idea for inflatable ring goals was born, and they have already proven to be a great, fun addition to the game.
Another idea, yet to be tested, has been developed by an Industrial Design student
column2: he applied his technical skills to develop a YOU.FO game including sensors telling you, through buzzing the stick(!), wether you are in the right zone to score. As you can tell we really embrace creativity and innovation and we invite everyone to join us!

column1: Our achievements up to now
YOU.FO has benefitted
from design collaboration with a wide range of partners and is proud to have
secured the support of the Netherlands Olympic Committee. YOU.FO won the 2012
European-wide award of ProFit Innovation Competition for the FieldLab

Eindhoven. The ProFit jury describes YOU.FO as “highly innovative, with the right mix between power and balance.” YOU.FO has been selected as finalist for both the Brand New Award 2013 at ISPO - the world’s largest sports trade fair- and for the National Sports Innovation Award 2013, in the Netherlands.
Why we need YOU?

We are extremely happy to receive this recognition and praise for YOU.FO, in which we have invested more than 20.000 hours of research, design, training and -off course- playing. But we're not quite there yet. We need YOU: curious, sporty enthusiasts who want to join the creation of a new global sports game. We need your contribution to:
Produce the first series of sticks, rings and carrying bags - You can play YOU.FO by the end of this year and share your enthusiasm in your neigbourhood.
Develop more game concepts - Your contribution would be used to cover amongst others: the costs of YOU.FO development for children (6-12)
column2: costs for (testing) the materials and game attributes (like the inflatable ring goals)
column3: costs of testing the target groups' reaction to different game concepts
column4: and the costs of human kinetics, researching the physical abilities stimulated by playing YOU.FO.

column1: We are happy with any contribution you can make and from 79€ (or 99$), including shipping costs, we ensure you get your own exclusive YOU.FO set send to your home directly before it hits the stores! One YOU.FO set contains: two throwing sticks, one aerodynamic ring, one carrying bag, and only for indiegogo funders an extra ring!
Estimated production schedule
August 1st - production batch first 40 test sets (as shown in videoclip)
November 1st - Test results / Final approval for first production order
December 1st - Estimated time of arrival first production shipment.
We expect to deliver your YOU.FO set at your door before the end of December (early birds). Before it gets to the stores!
Thank you so much for joining the creation of a new global sports game !
Bas Ruyssenaars - founder of YOU.FO",8.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hey guys! We are Console Gaming League, and we are here to bring back the competitive light for Halo, Gears of War, and Call of Duty.  We are working with the community to host its first LAN Event for these games, and we want to know that the community wants it!

CGL was started by Competitive Gamer James Suddoth (or Suddoth 2 for all the Halo fanatics)  What sets us apart from any other gaming league is that we are for gamers, by gamers.  CGL has spent much time working with top players in each game to create rules and settings that will allow for competitive game play that requires both teamwork and strategy that will be entertaining for our players and spectators as well.  Don’t think just because you are a spectator, doesn’t mean you are missing out on the fun.  We will have mini tournaments with games like super smash bros, Mario cart, or counter strike while you are not playing or watching matches.  You can even win prizes in the little tournaments!

Guys, we really need your support right now to help make CGL.  Through the gaming community, we will work together as a team to build CGL to be what every gamer wants.  We want this to be a place where they can socialize.  I know you want to travel, hang out, and game with the people you play with every day.  We will host the event in a big city (looking into Nashville) where you can explore when you are not playing. and best of all… win some awesome prizes.

The success of this event rests in your hands.  If we meet our goal with your help, we will be able to host our first LAN EVENT.  Your contributions will help us fund a venue in the heart of a popular city, assist with setting up live streams (so those not attending can still enjoy the fun).  As you know, gaming equipment can be pricey to buy and lug around.  With your help, we will be able to fund gaming stations for each player and easily transport them to the event.

As we are gaining momentum and others see our potential and goals expanding, CGL is quickly gaining support within the communities.  Gamer Grub and Gamer Gloves are showing support by contributing to help make the event a success.  Follow their lead and show support for CGL.  Help us, help you, build a community.

If we don't meet our goal, we are going to have a smaller event with less equipment, less people, less prizes, but try to have the same amount of fun! Everyone has to start somewhere and we are happy to start anywhere, as long as we have an awesome community supporting us!

“Giddam” is a racing game that is built on 4 main characters, Strawbery, Rashid, Big Mama and Ali. In their race, players will use local and non-traditional game weapons such as the famous Karak tea, the A’qal which is the traditional man headwear and many other weapons that either give them power or help them trap their opponents.The game offers a unique networking opportunity as well, so players can actually socialize and play with friends or make new friends. 


We are at the final stages of developing our Beta version... We need your help to bring our game to life!

Modern Tank is a new strategy game in development by E.N Games.

We started developing Modern Tank about a year ago to with the goal to create one of the best free 3D multiplayer strategy games.

One of the main features in our game is player base. The game features wide variety of buildings for players to buy and place the way they like. Every building has it's own stats and will impact the player's gameplay in some way (beside decor buildings). Besides your base , you will have to rise an army , an army strong enough to defend yourself from other player raids but also to raid other bases and complete missions.

Game features alot of missions spread across the world of Modern Tank. Missions will have different objectives , from building certain structures to going across the world to complete some objectives. There's a video of how the base works

Mind that alot of material used in the video is not final since we're in the middle of the development process.
column20:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

And of course the sound track in the game-
column26:
>The game goal is to build your own base and army. The way you build your base is totally up to you. You can play very offensive and build an army so you can raid other people bases , or you can play more defensive and build defense buildings to defend yourself from other player raids. 

At the very beginning of the game player will be able to chose from few different landscapes where he wants to start his base. After you choose you landscape , your journey begins!

Now as in any strategy game you need some resources to construct a building. In Modern Tank the main resource for building is money. You get certain amount of money at the very beginning of the game , and you can generate more money by constructing so called ""Money buildings"".
column27:
>There's no point in having a base if you can't defend it. To increase your total defense you will have to build so called ""Defense buildings"". Your army will increase your defense aswell but constructing Defense buildings will significantly increase your total defense.

With your base and economy in order , you will need to make your army. After creating your army , you will want to boost it so it can win in any battle you go into. To boost your army stats you can build so called ""Boost buildings"".

Now when you have everything set up you would probably want to do something with your army. Well this is where the game gets more interesting. In the game there are alot of missions that needs to be done. Missions can give you wide variety of items,units , experience points and of course money. Every missions has few objectives. For example , some missions will require you to construct certain building , then upgrade the same building few times , and other missions would send you to another side of the world to eliminate your enemies and destroy their headquarters!

Every player will have his own profile , where he can check his statistic, like how much money he generates currently or what is his total attack/defense and what's his current missions status. You will also be able to search for other players , and peek into their base to see what they are building and how their base looks like.

Speaking about game controls , they are fairly simple -  You will be able to move your camera , zoom in/out , rotate the camera and peek into every street in the game and check out any building in your base from every angle. 

Currently we have more then 70 structures implemented in the game for players to buy. Structures are divided in structure groups so you have Money buildings,Defense buildings,Boost buildings,Special buildings and Decor buildings. Once you bought and placed your building you will be able to upgrade that building several times. With each upgrade the stats of the building will rise.

Players will be experiencing realistic weather system which includes day and night shifts , rain and snow and even some snow/sand storms depending where your base is.

column73:
/>

Through out the game , players will get alot of missions to complete. You could get a missions that will require you to construct a certain building , and then upgrade that same building few times. Or they can send you across the world to eliminate certain targets. First you need to locate them and they can be scattered across the world then eliminate them. 

Here's a preview of one of the missions with certain objectives. Taping once on the building reveals what actions you can take against that building , and clicking it twice would execute that.

Example of a mission war zone (work in progress) :
column89:
/>

2$ Reward - As the reward label says , you get your name or nickname in ""The Credits"" under ""Special thanks"" section of our forum webpage.(and a hand shake).

http://www.moderntank.ca/index.php?threads/indiegogo-special-thanks.7045/

5$ Reward - If you pledge 5$ or more you will get the previous reward plus your name or nickname under ""Special thanks"" section of the game credits.

10$ Reward - If you pledge 10$ or more you will get all previous rewards plus 50 E.N tokens. You can use these tokens to speed up certain processes in the game , regenerate stamina and energy quickly and buy some exclusive units or structures.

20$ Reward - If you pledge 20$ or more you will get all previous rewards plus an indestructible tank unit. Indestructible means that this unit can't be looted or destroyed in battle or in any mission. It will also have an unique model with unique textures available only for indiegogo backers.
column94:
/>

50$ Reward - If you pledge 50$ or more you will get all previous rewards plus a special structure. This structure will boost your energy regeneration by 5%. The structure itself will also have an unique model and textures that will only be available to indiegogo backers.

3d modeler and level designer - Ilya Bakhtin
column102: >Takes care of the game design - Characters, 3D models and terrains (environment,buildings
column103:
>,mission war zones etc...) .

Programming Team - Vukasin Vucenovic and Marko Gardijan

Programming team takes care of all the game mechanics and integration.


If we get successfully founded we plan on expanding the game a lot. First of the stuff we would like to introduce as our stretch goal is trivia pop-up event.

Trivia pop-up event is an event that you get to do every 24 hours in the game. The trivia event will be a random pop-up whenever you are online. Trivia will set you up with a question and 4 different answers. The questions will be related to WW1 and WW2. You have 10 seconds to answer. If you answer correctly you can get rewards such as units,cash and many different prizes.

Next thing we want to introduce if we get successfully founded is our  ""Dooms day"". Dooms day is pretty much a group event where you need to gather up to 5 players to start a ""brigade"". During first 5 days of the event you will have a chance to train with your brigade , get unique items for your brigade , go on different brigade missions on unique Dooms day war zones and so on... After 5 days brigade preparation , you will get to fight other brigades and climb up the leader board. 

And final thing (so far) we want to introduce is ""Voice recognition"" for the game itself! You will be able to control a lot of things with your voice , such as saying ""collect"" to collect all the money from money buildings , or when you are in a fight you can yell out ""FIRE!"" and the selected tank will start shooting at the target. This feature will partially be introduced even without stretch founding , but to unlock full potential of it we'll need the extra founding.
column104:
>Regards, E.N Games. 

What do you need the money for ?

We need money to cover all production expenses. None of the money goes towards creators personal gain. All the money raised will go towards the project. This will cover programming expenses , 3D modeling expenses and will enable us to finish the game faster and introduce refined models and more gameplay into the game.

Will the game be released on time ?

We sure hope so. As for now the game is 50% completed and we don't expect to have any complications when it comes to game coding or delivering 3D models. 

Can i test the game now?

We have a some spots open for testers with iPad or android devices , and you can apply at our webpage or contact me directly at eransegal2@yahoo.com. The tests are done using ""Test flight"" platform.

is this your first game as a creator?

Yes , this is my first game as creator ,and i came out with the idea from the armory division i served in.I also know its hard to gain trust of players as a new developer , but i'm trying hard and spreading the word of my game across the internet in hope i'll make the game playable for everyone.


About me -

my name is Eran and I am the creator of modern tank game 
I live in Toronto Canada,and I love to cook ,,, but this is not why i am here .

I was serving in the armory division for 3 years, 
Tanks maneuvering at a dessert terrain and To see a tank shoot a target in the mountains kilometres/miles away, 
To hear it, to see it, it's a powerful View ! 
Wow that was cool . I will probably never forget this experience. 
Till this day I still have dreams about this period of time . 
I have to admit , I miss it .

Today I am a grown man with a wife and two wonderful kids , 
And I was thinking ,, how can I bring this realty of experience to life? 
So I decided to create ""Modern Tank"" 
It's under way and we want to make the game as real as it can get ,and give others the experience to play it .

We want to create a game that looks and feel more realistic, with more features and more of what the the players want.

With a good team of programmers,designers,and modellers And myself working day and night to create the best full 3d military game out there.

I hope as a creator that you guys will like the layouts, the 3d models of structures and military units, sound effects, missions, events, goals ,and more .

My main goal is to bring it to life.

Thank you for reading ,good luck and hope to see you all in the game,

Yours 
Eran Segal

Short Summary

Minecon Server Edition is the largest virtual Minecraft convention around, with an awesome 50,000+ livestream viewers, and 360,000+ website hits in 2013s event. The whole premise of us is that if you cannot make real Minecon, then, no matter where you are, you can get online and login to ours. Best of all, the tickets are free!


What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We ran a successful IndieGoGo to help support us get offices for MineconSE 2013, and this worked really well! As such, here we are again! The main reason for this is that we have been invited to the one and only Mine-O-Rama convention in New York City to not only have a booth, but also the opportunity of speaking on the main stage!
column3:
>Please note that Mine-O-Rama isn't affiliated with Mojang AB.

This is a great honor, and we want to make the best impact possible while there! On top of this, we'll hopefully be able to meet up with as many of you guys as possible! However, to have a nice impact, we need a bit of money to support us while there, including booth materials etc. We have set the goal low, but please note that the more money we get, the more awesome!

But what do you get? Some damn swanky stuff, if we may say so! This stuff ranges from anything like t-shirts to some awesome promotion deals.


Unlockables

- COMPLETE: We will release booth information for MineconSE2014 (NOT applications, but sizes, amount etc) EXCLUSIVELY to pledgers who brought us to this unlock! 

- COMPLETE : Release of the #blamejed t-shirt! (+ a lucky pledger will get a free shirt, uniquely digitally signed by the MineconSE Managers! (Selection and shipping upon campaign completion) [ http://mineconse.spreadshirt.co.uk/ ]

- £900 : ALL pledgers who brought us to this unlock will get 5 exclusive photos of the work in progress MSE2014 map to do with what they will!

- £1,200 :  When at Mine-O-Rama, we will record a video about setting everything up. Only pledgers will have the link!

- £ 1,500 : All pledgers up to this point will be allowed on the MineconSE 2014 map A WEEK before the event actually starts!

- £ 2,000 : ??

- £ ?? : ??

You can see the next one up each time you unlock something!


The Impact

If we raise the required funds (the more the better, to be honest!), it'll help cover the final accommodation costs that we have with flying to the other side of the world, as well as ensuring that our booth is the best possible booth! If we raise enough funds, we can start looking at having a couple of gaming computers there running some pretty awesome Minecraft stuff!

From a professional level, this also means that we can ensure that we make a bigger impression on the various YouTubers and companies going, heightening chances of us bringing you even more awesome content, deals and YouTuber livestream interviews!

From a fun level, this means that you guys can come visit us and even play with us over at New York! Should be a blast!


Here's the sort of money that we're talking to help us out! (Remember, the more the better!)


Objective Alpha (COMPLETE):

Cover the final costs of accommodation and various small costs for the MineconSE Management Team!


Objective Beta (~£1,000):

Ensure that we have an awesome booth, with leaflets, posters, and other swanky stuff!


Objective Gamma(~£2,500):

This means we will be able to afford to get the equiptment for a MASSIVE booth! As in, 30ft long! This'll mean that we will get some computers over for you guys to use. And guess what? You'll be able to preview the MineconSE 2014 map months before anyone else sees it!


Objective MOAR(~£+):

Any extra money that we get, will be pumped 100% back into MineconSE
column4: we're not pocketing any of this! So the more we get, the more awesome life will be!
column9:
>Other Ways You Can Help

There are loads of other ways you can help! Go help spread this wonderful campaign around to family, friends and even various pets! Use Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and all the various websites you peeps use to get this out there. There are even IndieGoGo social media buttons right here on this page to make it easier!


Peace out.

column1: ","Short SummaryMinecon Server Edition is the largest virtual Minecraft convention around, with an awesome 50,000+ livestream viewers, and 360,000+ website hits in 2013s event. The whole premise of us is that if you cannot make real Minecon, then, no matter where you are, you can get online and login to ours. Best of all, the tickets are free!What We Need & What You GetWe ran a successful IndieGoGo to help support us get offices for MineconSE 2013, and this worked really well! As such, here we are again! The main reason for this is that we have been invited to the one and only Mine-O-Rama convention in New York City to not only have a booth, but also the opportunity of speaking on the main stage! Please note that Mine-O-Rama isn't affiliated with Mojang AB.This is a great honor, and we want to make the best impact possible while there! On top of this, we'll hopefully be able to meet up with as many of you guys as possible! However, to have a nice impact, we need a bit of money to support us while there, including booth materials etc. We have set the goal low, but please note that the more money we get, the more awesome!But what do you get? Some damn swanky stuff, if we may say so! This stuff ranges from anything like t-shirts to some awesome promotion deals.Unlockables- COMPLETE: We will release booth information for MineconSE2014 (NOT applications, but sizes, amount etc) EXCLUSIVELY to pledgers who brought us to this unlock! - COMPLETE : Release of the #blamejed t-shirt! (+ a lucky pledger will get a free shirt, uniquely digitally signed by the MineconSE Managers! (Selection and shipping upon campaign completion) [ http://mineconse.spreadshirt.co.uk/ ]- £900 : ALL pledgers who brought us to this unlock will get 5 exclusive photos of the work in progress MSE2014 map to do with what they will!- £1,200 :  When at Mine-O-Rama, we will record a video about setting everything up. Only pledgers will have the link!- £ 1,500 : All pledgers up to this point will be allowed on the MineconSE 2014 map A WEEK before the event actually starts!- £ 2,000 : ??- £ ?? : ??You can see the next one up each time you unlock something!The ImpactIf we raise the required funds (the more the better, to be honest!), it'll help cover the final accommodation costs that we have with flying to the other side of the world, as well as ensuring that our booth is the best possible booth! If we raise enough funds, we can start looking at having a couple of gaming computers there running some pretty awesome Minecraft stuff!From a professional level, this also means that we can ensure that we make a bigger impression on the various YouTubers and companies going, heightening chances of us bringing you even more awesome content, deals and YouTuber livestream interviews!From a fun level, this means that you guys can come visit us and even play with us over at New York! Should be a blast!Here's the sort of money that we're talking to help us out! (Remember, the more the better!)Objective Alpha (COMPLETE):Cover the final costs of accommodation and various small costs for the MineconSE Management Team!Objective Beta (~£1,000):Ensure that we have an awesome booth, with leaflets, posters, and other swanky stuff!Objective Gamma(~£2,500):This means we will be able to afford to get the equiptment for a MASSIVE booth! As in, 30ft long! This'll mean that we will get some computers over for you guys to use. And guess what? 0,"

Greeting and Salutations! My name is Tiffany Toto, and
I am a complete nerd, a gamer, and a book junkie. I am rather a long winded
individual, though I believe the politically correct term is a Writer or Author.
Throw in some Attention Deficit Disorder, and you have…Oh hey look, a kitty!
So anyway, back in the day of avid gaming, I played
everything. I seriously was that one person that killed you twenty times. Yep. You
hated me. When I lost my ability to play for a long while, it didn’t take my
love of gaming away
column2: it just pushed it into another direction.  Making games, not just any kind of games, but

column1: games made from books. Seriously, do you know how many amazing books would make
incredible games?
So I put my idea into the works, and took it to a
trusted friend and avid gamer from work and showed him. His exact words were:
“This has never been done!”. From that statement and the look on his face, I
knew I had something. I took it to a few other hardcore gamer friends I also
worked with, and they were like, “OH MY GOD, THIS has to HAPPEN!!!”. They took the idea to their gamer friends, who
said the same thing. Then, I took it to Facebook and got so much interest, I
knew it had to happen. So <i>Buddy Boy

Technologies (BBT), was created.

Come Hell or high water, I am going to make this
happen… The first ever adult romance, sexual, action packed, literary, and
educational video game. Let’s hear you say that three times fast!
And in order to make this reality, I’m going to need
an amazing team behind me. The first member of that team is Jules Warner, my
partner in crime! A mutual friend introduced me to my future partner. He has
the intelligence of Stephen Hawking, Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, and the education to back it up. He has degrees in
Electrical and Electronic Engineering, and he is an asset to BBT. I am lucky
enough to call him my friend and partner, he has chosen an amazing and creative team to follow our lead.
pending patent that is absolutely phenomenal and will take gaming to levels we

never thought possible. Although we cannot give you details on the patent, we can explain how the game will work. 

BBT’s first game will
be called <i>The Pandora Agency: Pandora’s
Soldiers. It is actually the second book in my series that has not yet
been published, but by my trusted few who read it were blown out of the water.

Pandora's Soldiers Synopsis 

USMC
Major James Kennedy and Major Roger Dawson, along with
their Lieutenant Colonel Carter Banks and Gunnery Sergeant Riley Mason are on a
mission to find Samantha and Sophia, they vanished without a trace. Only to
find that their Investigation leads back to their dark past of being Elite
members of the Force Recon Company and as they soon discover, the team is being
slaughtered one by one…Along with dangerous close calls that could cost them
their lives, come the dangerously powerful and lustful desires of the marines

who fight to protect the women they love.

With
interactive programming, you will not only enjoy the book, you will be able to
make, design, play, and conquer your own alternate journey and destination
ending. You will experience hands on feelings with remote controlled romance,
sex, drama, action, thriller, suspense, murder, and humor.
On the lower levels,
you follow the book until completed. You are assigned a character movie, then
given instructions to play out through the chapters. The higher the levels, the
more customizable the game. For example, when a sex scene comes along in the
book, on the lower levels you just watch the sexual interaction, which still
actually incredibly hot. However, on the higher levels, you will be able to
control the sex scenes, and the higher the level you get to, the hotter the
sex. The sex levels include basic scenes, all the way to BDSM. When you create
your characters, they are completely tailored for you, including body parts.
But the higher levels
have even more going for them then just sexual encounters. You will be able to
create your own characters and even your own avatar, if you wish. If you would
like to choose to play the book in a zombie, witch, or wizard version, again,
you can on higher levels. There is never an end to this game!
As you’ll recall, I
mentioned the game also having an educational aspect. This is where that
portion will come into play. You will have game checkpoints like any other
game, where your character will have to solve puzzles and figure out clues.
Let’s say your character gets to a checkpoint and in order to move on, you have
to answer a trivia question or even travel to a point of interest, so you will
learn about it. Example questions would be: “What year did the Library of Alexandria burn down … or …
what year was the Declaration of
Independence signed?” And example travel sites might be the Great Wall of China or Liberty Hall.  The higher the levels, the harder the game

gets. 

Here's some concept art.


I have many incredible games lined up, so let's get down to business!
column2:
>

It takes more than

column1: just an idea to create something as epic as the Pandora’s Soldiers video game. There are the equipment costs, licensing fees, game
developers, graphic artists, animators, voice over talent, editors ... and

that's just to name a few. Since Jules and I have all our money wrapped up in our patent, and Oprah has yet to call me to join her book club and Jules has failed terribly at stripping...

We need YOUR  money, think of it as...A good way of shutting me up. Ask Jules, I nag, and nag, and NAG...
(after covering the awesome donation perks, etc) will go toward the production
of Pandora’s Soldiers PC version of the
game. Game production will begin as soon as funds start coming in.
If we're able to surpass our goal, we can start producing the game on
additional formats such asXboxandPS4. The
more we make, the more formats we can create, and the more people we can
hire to get this produced and delivered to you more quickly. The goal is to
always have something in the works to give back to you, the
awesome ones who support and encourage our endeavor.
column5:
>

We have put together some pretty awesome perk packages, so let's pick one out for you and don't forget to have your credit card ready! 

***Perks will be delivered before game is released***

Oh, yes...I tend to be somewhat bossy, in case you haven't noticed. But that doesn't mean I don't appreciate every moment of your valuable time to read over my campaign. Thank you for letting me share my ideas and goals with you and please feel free to email me with any questions you have. 

Peace!

Tiffany Toto

Your humble servant with a CEO title

DISCLAIMER : This page contains fictional, digital adult material. Not suitable for minors.

NOTE: We've been funded! But every little bit helps, we'd like to extend a HUGE thank you to everyone who's supported us so far.  If you're new, welcome to the madness! We hope you enjoy what you find here.

Sincerely,

- Joy-Toilet Team
column2:
>ABOUT TRIPLE X TYCOON

 Triple X Tycoon takes place in a world where goblins are commonplace and porn is taboo.  It is a simulation game in which the player founds and builds his or her own studio within the adult entertainment industry from the 70s onward.
column3: >With Triple X Tycoon, players will get to experience the highs and lows of the adult entertainment industry from behind the scenes. The game features random events that may effect the growth of your studio or hinder performers. Volatile consumer trends are the norm. Extravagant award shows are commonplace, even performers come and go as time pushes on in an industry that makes big money on erotic indulgence.
column4:
>

START A BUSINESS, BUILD AN EMPIRE!

Steer your company through the rise and fall of VHS. Sabotage your competitors! But watch your own back. Be smart and you'll have talent knocking down your door for a chance in the spotlight you created. Only the best adapt in this industry. From motel to studio and mansions.  From VHS to VR,  how far will you go?

column1: Triple X Tycoon features some of the following:
<ul>
• Extensive product type (signature dildos, lubricants, magazines,  hotlines, calendars and more!
• Product reviews
• Award shows
• Reputation (effects who you can hire and where you can shoot)
• Random events (pregnancies, outbreaks, organized crime etc)
• Studio upgrades
• Eras include 70s, 80, 90, 2000s and beyond!
• And MORE!
Not limited to set crashes by pissed-off significant others, family members or rival companies. Talk about sabotage! Don't miss out! Help us bring you Triple X Tycoon!
FAQs
1) Why crowdfunding?

Joy-Toilet is a super small company based in New York where life is already cold and difficult.  Top that off with the crushing expenses of running a game studio and our founders can barely afford to split an Arizona.  In fact, it's a miracle that we have a computer (non-plural) at all.  As a tech focused company we have to outsource all of our art which puts an even bigger strain on resources!

We're looking to IndieGoGO for help in easing some of those costs.  We've already sank huge swathes of time and a modest amounts of cash  into this project.  Our core team takes nothing off the top, your money goes directly toward financing Triple X Tycoon.  We'll eat after the game is done.
How much PORN is in this game?

Naturally, a good bit. Ultimately it depends on how you choose to run your business. We like to emphasize that this is a game about the adult industry as a whole and not a sex simulator. For example, If you want to spend your time being the king/queen of sex toys instead of shooting film, by all means.
Is This Game LGBT Friendly?
Absolutely! We are working hard to make sure everyone is represented equally in Triple X Tycoon.
Risks and Challenges

Art, art art. Joy-Toilet is completely art deficient. All the technical heavy lifting was completed last Winter by our one programmer. So basically, if he fell into space tomorrow, it'd be OK. No risk there. Now it's just a matter of getting the artwork into the game. $1000 has been the UI/art overhaul budget for awhile now. Since our last set of big updates we've managed to self-fund some improvements to the interface but there is just no real financial foundation to complete the game on time without your help!
THE STORY
If you are interested in Triple X Tycoon's development, check out our development blog:
http://en.joy-toilet.com/tag/triple-x-tycoon/
So far it's a tale of sleepless nights and struggle, want to help out? Support us!
About Joy-Toilet
Joy-Toilet.com is a niche-humor website and newsletter dedicated to producing a variety of easily digestible adult content.
column2: >Everything is run and maintained by a group of introverts who also happen to be the captives of an army of computer literate goblins.

Follow Us on Twitter: @JoyToilet (if you follow us we'll love you eternally!)
For media or other inquiries please contact: janitor@joy-toilet.com

BIG ANNOUNCEMENT!

I've updated perks so now everybody funding the project will get game copy. If game gets ""greenlit"", that could be a steam key. Whichever you like best! Also you can see I've lowered perk prices, so if you thinking about helping the project, stop by and just help. I can't lower campaign goal, but I can lower Stretch Goals, so check them out!

Hello and welcome to ""Inverto"" crowd-funding campaign page. ""Inverto"" is a first person shooter-puzzler with gravity manipulations, platformer elements and parkour phylosophy in mind. If you have not seen a traler video I strongly recommend doing so to get the idea of a gameplay. Or if you want more solid experience try Inverto Alpha in your browser WebPlayer or Download it from IndieDB.
Etalyx(GamersDissent) is previewing my alpha version on Youtube! (game was called Gravitron before)

Main feature of Inverto is of course gravity manipulations. All levels are created around concept of changing gravity to get to the other side, some levels even can be changed with different gravity directions. Gyroscopic switches, force fields, teleports, dangerous laser traps, moving platforms, evil
column2: >turrets droids, everything good sci-fi game needs, except portal gun and aliens.

column1: If you remember ""Prey""(2006), game by Human Head Studios and 3D Realms, you might find similarity, I've enjoyed this game, but gravity manipulations there were more like spare feature, never discovering it's true potential. Inverto is here to fulfill the mission, besides there are not many fps gravity games on a market.
It's a flexible funding campaign, so if campaign fails game will be only 9 levels long.
$4000 - game will get 7 extra levels, 16 instead of 9.
$7000 - game gets 24 levels in total and AI(vicious droids and bosses).
$10000 - initial goal, definitely custom maps support, and ingame level editor.
$12000 - Inverto becomes HD! High resolution textures, postprocesses, complex shaders, more detailed models.
$20000 - Multiplayer coop mode, with custom multiplayer maps.
About me

My name is Volodymyr Dotsenko. I'm independent game developer from Ukraine, or more precisely want to earn the honor to be called 'independent game developer' by others. For that I'm developing my first game project, having more then six years of experience working in game industry, so I'm pretty confident in things I'm doing and can complete the task. All I need is your valuable support.
Inverto history
Game concept #1 was born in 2008 just after playing Portal game by Valve. But back then it was more of a Portal clone, and since I didn't have any programming experience, so idea went in hybernation.
Early game concept

In three years when I was getting familiar with Unity, while making architectural presentations on this fantastic engine, idea came back to life as a little phisics experiment. That's when actual Inverto birth have happened.
First playable Version

Since then working on this idea as a part-time hobby-job untill end of last year, when I've decided that it's time to be serious about it. So I've left my job behind and till now I'm working fulltime on Inverto.
Inverto HD version (Unity DirectX 11 contest)
HD version was made for Unity DirectX 11 competition, and contained two playable levels. It can be downloaded from IndieDB : http://www.indiedb.com/games/gravitron/downloads
Note: If stretch goal(see above) will be reached, Inverto might get HD version graphics quality.

Working on a game is pure joy, but paying your living is sometimes expensive. I work fulltime on Inverto more then half a year, and my savings are quickly depleting, plus some software licenses and publishing do require a significant financing. But biggest problem is time, working on every single aspect of a game project takes a lot of learning, trials and errors, it takes a lot of time and often comes out not to be so proffesional as expected. That's why I need additional help, hire some specialists (and I think they don't need to work for free). Plus perks should be made and shipped to all of you. I'm expecting to collect lowest money amount possible, but really I do want Inverto to become HD.
I'm aiming the end of 2013, but it's always a good point to add extra time just in case. So beginning of 2014 is more realistic, though extra money will speed up development.
What platforms will game support?

Primary platform is Windows. But Linux(Ubuntu) system is in my plans. Mac support is different, I'll have to buy Mac computer to seriously support this platform (that is also why I need money), wish I could find a developer to help me out with this problem.

","BIG ANNOUNCEMENT!

I've updated perks so now everybody funding the project will get game copy. If game gets ""greenlit"", that could be a steam key. Whichever you like best! Also you can see I've lowered perk prices, so if you thinking about helping the project, stop by and just help. I can't lower campaign goal, but I can lower Stretch Goals, so check them out!
Welcome

Hello and welcome to ""Inverto"" crowd-funding campaign page. ""Inverto"" is a first person shooter-puzzler with gravity manipulations, platformer elements and parkour phylosophy in mind. If you have not seen a traler video I strongly recommend doing so to get the idea of a gameplay. Or if you want more solid experience try Inverto Alpha in your browser WebPlayer or Download it from IndieDB.
Etalyx(GamersDissent) is previewing my alpha version on Youtube! (game was called Gravitron before)
About Inverto

Main feature of Inverto is of course gravity manipulations. All levels are created around concept of changing gravity to get to the other side, some levels even can be changed with different gravity directions. Gyroscopic switches, force fields, teleports, dangerous laser traps, moving platforms, evil turrets droids, everything good sci-fi game needs, except portal gun and aliens.

If you remember ""Prey""(2006), game by Human Head Studios and 3D Realms, you might find similarity, I've enjoyed this game, but gravity manipulations there were more like spare feature, never discovering it's true potential. Inverto is here to fulfill the mission, besides there are not many fps gravity games on a market.
Stretch Goals
It's a flexible funding campaign, so if campaign fails game will be only 9 levels long.
$4000 - game will get 7 extra levels, 16 instead of 9.
$7000 - game gets 24 levels in total and AI(vicious droids and bosses).
$10000 - initial goal, definitely custom maps support, and ingame level editor.
$12000 - Inverto becomes HD! High resolution textures, postprocesses, complex shaders, more detailed models.
$20000 - Multiplayer coop mode, with custom multiplayer maps.
About me

My name is Volodymyr Dotsenko. I'm independent game developer from Ukraine, or more precisely want to earn the honor to be called 'independent game developer' by others. For that I'm developing my first game project, having more then six years of experience working in game industry, so I'm pretty confident in things I'm doing and can complete the task. All I need is your valuable support.
Inverto history
Game concept #1 was born in 2008 just after playing Portal game by Valve. But back then it was more of a Portal clone, and since I didn't have any programming experience, so idea went in hybernation.
Early game concept

In three years when I was getting familiar with Unity, while making architectural presentations on this fantastic engine, idea came back to life as a little phisics experiment. That's when actual Inverto birth have happened.
First playable Version

Since then working on this idea as a part-time hobby-job untill end of last year, when I've decided that it's time to be serious about it. So I've left my job behind and till now I'm working fulltime on Inverto.
Inverto HD version (Unity DirectX 11 contest)
HD version was made for Unity DirectX 11 competition, and contained two playable levels. It can be downloaded from IndieDB : http://www.indiedb.com/games/gravitron/downloads
Note: If stretch goal(see above) will be reached, Inverto might get HD version graphics quality.
Why IndieGoGo?

Working on a game is pure joy, but paying your living is sometimes expensive. I work fulltime on Inverto more then half a year, and my savings are quickly depleting, plus some software licenses and publishing do require a significant financing. But biggest problem is time, working on every single aspect of a game project takes a lot of learning, trials and errors, it takes a lot of time and often comes out not to be so proffesional as expected. That's why I need additional help, hire some specialists (and I think they don't need to work for free). Plus perks should be made and shipped to all of you. I'm expecting to collect lowest money amount possible, but really I do want Inverto to become HD.
When game will be ready?
I'm aiming the end of 2013, but it's always a good point to add extra time just in case. So beginning of 2014 is more realistic, though extra money will speed up development.
What platforms will game support?

Primary platform is Windows. But Linux(Ubuntu) system is in my plans. Mac support is different, I'll have to buy Mac computer to seriously support this platform (that is also why I need money), wish I could find a developer to help me out with this problem.
About Perks

Digital copy of the game comes with no protection, just pure game files.I'm not going to spend extra money on things that does not help gaming. If my project is good enough, I'm sure people will still support me.
Wallpapers pack - 6 exclusive wallpapers in various resolutions.
Soundtrack -  Digital download or CD of Inverto's final soundtrack. Will include all themes created specifically for that game.
Making of book - Digital or printed book about game and it's creation.
DVD version of the game - DVD boxed version of the game with printed manual inside.
T-Shirt - Exclusive funder T-shirt of your size with the game's logo printed on it.
Exclusive flash drive - exclusive custom flash drive for exclusive backers.
Droid figurine - Plastic figurine of a vicious droid, keep him on your desk, but watch out!
How can I help?
If you can't contribute with money, you can always help with your words:
Tell about my game on Facebook, Twitter or other social network. Share this page with buttons below Pitch video.
If you know some indie game site, that should write about this campaign, drop them a line. If you know someone who can help, tell him(or her) about this campaign.
If you've found any article or you're writing about this campaign, please contact me I'm open for any questions.
If you have any feedback, question, idea, proposition, ask here or contact me.

I love to invent new games, but dealing with the big companies is so lame.  I have a great game that has been play tested and enjoyed, I just need your help to get it printed.  I just want to have ""created and sold one copy"" of a board game to a random person as a small goal of my life.

The game consists of stringing stories together using random words and the rest of the players judge your story.  The stories can get ridiculous but have to make grammatical sense, hence this game is better for ages 12+.  Or it can be a learning game for kids if the rude cards are removed.
The money will help me print the game, and I am doing it on business cards to save money.  The box will be the most expensive part to print but I feel makes it look like a professional game.
If you like apples to apples or cards against humanity, this game will be right up your alley.
Thanks for your consideration and i hope you enjoy it, as most of my perk packages will include the game.

AJ

Alright, let's do this.

Welcome to the indiegogo page for The Asylum, home of Sykotic Gaming! I am a 31-year-old Army veteran who dreams of being able to support his family by becoming a partnered broadcaster on Twitch.

  • I served in the Army from 2004-2015, and I was medically discharged at 80% disability. I'm a husband to an amazing woman, and a father to 6 absolutely incredible children.

• This campaign is designed to cover the costs of hiring a graphic designer to do my complete design/branding for The Asylum, who would then advertise the channel itself. It will also help finish covering equipment costs for items I need to do a solid, professional, fun stream.

• Achieving this goal would literally launch my stream far above others that are trying to start up, and get me on a solid path to partnership within a month or two, instead of over several years. You would enable me to be able to finally work from home, doing something I genuinely love and am passionate about, and be able to spend more time with my wife and kids, which is something I've been sorely missing for a long time, between Army life and working 50+ hours a week after getting out.
So here's the low-down, y'all

Here's how it's going to break down.

  • So, the guy who has offered to do my complete branding and advertising is asking $900(which is actually pretty low, considering). This would include all my channel buttons, offline banner, profile picture and banner for all my social media, and all the artwork I would need on Twitch. Any remaining funds that go beyond that will go straight to the channel, in terms of program licenses and streaming equipment.

• All of the perks on this campaign are unique to my Twitch channel. If you're not a gamer, but would still like to contribute, please, by all means, feel free to message me and we can figure out suitable replacement perks!

• Even if we don't meet the goal, all funds donated to this cause will go exclusively towards all costs associated with the channel, i.e. advertising, graphic design, and streaming hardware. Every single cent donated will go towards that.
What it would mean to me

This right here, being able to make video games a living, is my dream. It's something I've been passionate about ever since I was a little kid. And the ability to not only do that, but build a thriving, supporting community, where people can take refuge from the world for a few hours, and talk, joke, and commiserate with like-minded people while watching a grown man do silly stuff on a video game, is actually extremely therapeutic. The Twitch community is amazing, and is doing nothing but growing. BUT, consider the following:

  • Doing this for a living would allow me to be a stay-at-home dad and husband, which is something I have NEVER been able to do. I've missed out on a lot of milestones with my kids, and important dates/anniversaries with my wife because of work and life happening. Doing this would allow me to stay at home and spend time with my family, something I have desperately needed for a long time.
<li>Not only would a channel like this provide a safe haven for people who
don't exactly feel comfortable in other places, my channel would be the
perfect platform to launch something from. If you need something to get
to a lot of people quick, a popular Twitch streamer is the best way to
do it in real-time. They can literally reach thousands of people within
seconds.
• Did you also know that donating to this also makes you a certified badass? 'Cause it does.
Internet Business-ing

Now, as with everything else in life, there are always risks. This is an investment, and I know that. But I'm confident in my ability to take this channel charging into the top broadcasting channels on Twitch. I'm treating this as a business, and I don't forget people who help me.

  • Seeing as how I have a master of online marketing and advertising for a wife, on top of the advertising I would be getting from the graphic artist doing my branding, I'm supremely confident that my channel will gain popularity quickly, and has nowhere to go but up.
• This channel will not exist without supporters, but I have a feeling I'm going to have the most awesome supporters in the history of ever.
Can't donate? You can still help!

Money is tight for a lot of folks, and no one understands that more than I do.

  • I would love you forever if you would share this indiegogo page on your Facebook, Twitter, whatever you have. The more people that get this, the better.
• Indiegogo has plenty of ways to share this page to social media, so check them out!

I truly hope you'll take a bit of time to consider donating to this venture. I'm taking charge of my life, and pursuing what I love, but I can't do it without the help of awesome people like you. So THANK YOU! :D

Short Summary

Hi folks. This campaign is to create a dedicated gaming area above my shop so that you can come in and play a selection of board games. I will also run tournaments for games such as X-Wing, Heroclix, Dicemasters and whatever you lovely people want. There will also be a retro gaming room with a console and big screen TV. All of this plus free tea and coffee!

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

To achieve this I am asking for £3500. This will cover the cost of 10 gaming tables, a selection of board games, hot water urn, big screen TV and an N64.

column1: Rewards are:
£5 - Thank you email
£10 Thank you email
£25 Hide N Geek T-Shirt
£50 Hide N Geek T-Shirt and invite to opening day event.
£100 Hide N Geek T-Shirt and invite to opening day event for two people.
£250 Hide N Geek T-Shirt, Invite to opening event and plaque on a table with your name.
£500 Hide n Geek T- Shirt, invite to opening event, plaque on the table with your name and 5 days free table booking.

£3500 Hide N Geek T-Shirt, invite to opening event for you +3, wall plaque and free play for life.

The Impact

At the moment the only venues that run games in the area are really cramped which inhibits your gaming experience. I have plenty of room to fit a large number of tables and therefore hold large tournaments or have a large number of games available to play.
Risks &
column2:
Challenges

The business is already up and running, this is just an extension of the brand. I foresee no risks or challenges to get this up and running providing the target is met.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

Share the campaign with everyone you can on social media. Alternatively if you have tables and chairs to donate or old games consoles (working) and games that would be greatly appreciated.

and fraud in the United States. Anyone can be a victim of identity theft and
making sure that you, your children, and your family stay protected is what anyone
would want out of life.
learned ways in which identity thieves get the personal identifiable
information and also how they get your credit card number and through this
information, we’ve come up with a way to prevent anyone from applying for lines
of credit, credit cards, loans, mortgages, apartments, rentals, filing your
taxes anything using your social security number. We introduce to you, Credit
Switch, a FREE mobile application where you can “turn on or turn off” your
identity, with the flick of a switch. With our app, we seek to combat the many
facets of fraud, including identity, credit card, and income tax fraud.
feels that a lot of people are unaware of the implications that that being a
victim of identity theft can cause. Not only do we want our customers to
protect themselves with our app, we also want to provide them with the tools
and knowledge to better protect them on this growing problem. Safer Identity, LLC is currently negotiating with Experian for the use of the API integration software with the Credit Switch App.
continue to enhance our offerings and technology to continuously upgrade and
combat this growing issue that if not stopped will cause harm to our future and
the futures of the next generations. Recent data breaches at JP Morgan shows us
that the issue is not going away and something needs to be done to help protect
the identities of consumers.

When applying for credit at a department store or car dealership, your credit information can only be accessed by unlocking your credit profile from your mobile phone or home computer with the switch of a button.

Once approved your information will be sent to authorized financial entities, revealing your status as either locked or unlocked based on your preference, It’s that easy. Simply swipe to lock or unlock!

of identity fraud victims in the United States and possibly the world. This is
an issue that can cost hundreds to thousands of dollars and many years to fix.
This can prevent you from getting a house that you would like to move your
family to and getting the car you want.
Our website is
identityhelper.org where you will find information on the latest fraud scams,
tips to help identify if you’ve been a victim of fraud, and can sign up for
Credit Switch. Please share our site with your friends on all of your social
media outlets. We thank you for helping us in the prevention of identity fraud
and bring awareness to this ever growing issue.",11.0,0,"1 Campaign

Isn’t it About Time…
… To shake up the status
quo?
“Where can I get free
training to become a chef? How do I buy my first home? How do I go about
starting my own business? Where do I find a quality public school or free private
school for my child?” Most people don’t know there are countless free resources
all over the country that can help them towards advancement. This is where
Evolvage comes in. For anyone who has felt the desire to get ahead in life,
Evolvage answers that call. <span>Evolvage is a new website
dedicated to helping people start thriving instead of just surviving. We’re an
unprecedented, one-stop site and a game changer in upward mobility, making it
finally possible to access resources with ease.
Evolvage links visitors
to programs and resources that promote career development, financial
well-being, academic achievement and overall advancement all in one place
instead of scouring all over the internet to find answers. We’ve conveniently
sourced information on everything from -- college scholarships, finding great
free schools, career advice, free job training programs and job listings, home
buying, starting a business, life skills, health resources, money management
and living well on a budget to help you reach your goals or change your life’s
path. We want to improve lives and transform communities by showing there are
alternatives to bad schools, a college education is within reach, how to make
wise financial decisions, free training programs in promising careers and more
by providing a starting point to get ahead.
Now is the time to do
something about closing the gap in society and giving people a real path to progress.
We’re convinced that giving people access to information and resources can mean
the difference between getting ahead or staying stuck. We want to shake up the
status quo by providing people a tool they’ve never had before. Most people who
haven’t realized their potential or found success aren’t lazy. They’re just
complacent, scared to change, don’t think it’s in the cards for them or don’t how
to go about it. Evolvage takes the guesswork out of
starting. By providing a centralized, comprehensive site we are simplifying the
process of succeeding.
With your support, Evolvage will grow into a
platform for propelling people to start thriving instead of just surviving.
Let’s do this!
Who We Are
Our team will make this happen. With over a decade of experience in PR, Marketing
and Sales launching and marketing successful products at Revlon, Viacom and
Edelman and engineering talent building websites
and technology solutions for leading companies we
know we are the team to really make a difference. Together, we’ve built a site
that does exactly that.
With Your Help
We need your help for Evolvage’s
development. With $80,000, we plan to do this by:
<ul>
<li>
<b>Marketing
the site widely to advertisers - We’ll be able to devote
more energy to PR and marketing strategies
to spread awareness of what we do through social media, our blog, and
advertising.
<li>
<b>Adding
new partners - We’ll hire staff to help drive our
vision
<li>
Improving the user experience - We’ll invest more in site
development to make Evolvage faster and easier to use
<li>
Development – We’ll be able to develop Evolvage into a real portal, making it like
the Expedia for upward mobility and the first such site of its kind
Thank You + Ways to Get Involved
We are grateful for any support you can offer to help Evolvage’s
development. Giving to our campaign at any level sends a signal to your friends
and family that you care about improving society.
We invite you to help us spread our message online and
offline to your friends and family. Please use Indiegogo’s helpful share
tools to create a ripple effect with your gift.

DEMO AVAILABLE

You can download the latest public demo at PropelledBird.com!


What is TesserAct?

TesserAct is a first person physics based platformer, built by the small 6 man team Propelled Bird. Set inside a universe based on scientific theory, student Sam is inexplicably teleported to the decaying Heywood-Bowman facility, where she stumbles upon the Catalyst, a device that can manipulate the laws of physics. Unsure of where she is, Sam must use the Catalyst to navigate through the ruins of the Heywood-Bowman facility, and search for a way home.


We love Science!

We're building TesserAct with the idea in mind to explain it in depth. We are taking the time to research real scientific theories and use them within the TesserAct universe. This includes colonizing space, physics guns, evolution, and even multiverse theory! All of this information can be obtained in game, but don't worry, you don't have to be Stephan Hawking to understand what's going on. 

The Unreal Development Kit

TesserAct is being built on the Unreal Development Kit (UDK) powered by the Unreal Engine 3. We strive to build not only a fun game, but an aesthetically pleasing game as well. Thus, we are taking advantage of the UDK's graphical features by making worlds with realistic facial animation, reflective water, dynamic fluid surfaces, and more!


The Soundtrack

TesserAct features a completely original soundtrack scored and produced by electronic artist ""a beagle"" and guitarist Stuart Tow. The soundtrack is included in the Special Edition of TesserAct!

https://soundcloud.com/propelled-bird-audio/gravity-well


The Nerd Herd

     Propelled Bird Software was started in 2011 when a group of friends sat around a lunch table in small town Holbrook, Arizona, and the the idea to make a game arose. Ideas floated about and after a solid hour of opinions, they decided to take the challenge. For the next month, we spent our afternoons huddled in the back room of our high school's Audio/Visual department, working furiously on whiteboards tweaking and reworking the ideas we had. After a few months, the concept for TesserAct was born.

    The team currently is comprised of:
• Clay Walters, Founder/Lead Developer/Environment Artist, Composer
• Josh Barger, Co-Founder/3D artist
• Michael Ortega, Tester/Voice Actor
• Dwayne DeJohn II, Web administrator/UI programmer
• Jordan Autobee, Writer/Voice Actor
• Dane Henderson, Scientific Adviser/Script Writer
• Madison Redd, Voice Actress
• Mike Morales, Voice Actor

You can read up on the individual team members on our website here: http://propelledbird.com/team.php


Why we need your help:

It simply breaks down to licensing. Making games can get expensive, even with a small team. These costs translate roughly to:
• UDK licensing - $100
• MayaLT - $50 per month
• Adobe Flash - $50 per month

Since most of the asset development is complete, goal for our IndieGoGo campaign is only about $200, but due to IndieGoGo minimums, we are set at a $500 dollar goal. Regardless if we don't make our goal, we'll be putting any and all of your funding towards these licensing costs alone. 

Rewards:

We wouldn't be here without people helping, so we want to make sure you get something in return! Thus for helping out you can receive:

""New Game""  - $10

A free copy of TesserAct upon release!


""New Game+""  - $20

A free Special Edition copy of TesserAct, which includes the Official Sound Track!


""But wait...there's more""  - $30

A free Special Edition copy of TesserAct plus the ""Human Trials"" DLC!


""'F' is for friends that do stuff together...""  - $40

A free Special Edition with DLC, plus a free standard edition copy for a friend!


""Shut up and take my money!""  - $50

TWO Special Edition copies with the DLC for you and a friend!


Why help?

We're building TesserAct to show the world that, with a bit of work, small indie teams can build AAA quality titles. By helping us out, we can drive that statement home.


What if I can't afford to donate?

We're well aware that times are tough right now, and we understand that funds can be tight. No worries though, you can still help out by spreading TesserAct around, and by liking TesserAct on Steam Greenlight!

column4:
>Purple Pony Badges

Hi!  I'm Laurie -- you may know me as Knit Me A Pony.  I've been a pencil-and-paper gamer since 1992, and a LARPer almost as long.  

Nearly every LARP I've been in uses some kind of system involving name tags and safety pins to indicate names, character types, status, and other relevant information. Sticky name tags and pins can damage costumes, handwriting can be messy, and con-style badges can look cheap or take away from immersion.

Purple Pony Badges to the rescue!  I'd like to provide reasonably priced, attractive badges to the gaming community.  Not only are they great for long-term LARPs or to set yourself apart at big games, but they're an inexpensive way to give one-shot players a souvenir of the experience.

I need a little help getting this off the ground -- that's where you come in!

What I Need &
column5:
What You Get

The first $1000 will get me the following:

column1: • Standard materials for samples: a selection of wood and acrylic so I can make sample badges and get the settings just right.
• New materials for prototyping: samples of aluminum, glass, special acrylics and other materials so I can develop truly unique badges
• Paint and other finishing
• Samples of clips, magnets, and other attachments
• Font licenses
<li>Stock icons &amp
• Equipment to improve my photography of samples
If we manage to go above the limit, I'll also look into the following:
• Business setup, including a mailbox, domain hosting, and LLC registration
• Official licensing from gaming companies so I can use their logos and sigils directly
<li>New Deluxe options, including borders &amp
• Professional photography of my samples
• Development of a site that will let you preview your badge design before submitting to me
• Specialty paints like magnetic, chalkboard, and whiteboard
• Electronics including LED indicators for status/hit points/health
Below are the reward levels.  Some of these prices will go up when I open for business

column2: customize each badge individually.  Once the badge is made, I will take photographs of the badges and use them to promote the new styles in emails, on social media and in my shop.  Then the badges will be shipped to you for your own use before the new styles are for sale.

column1: All reward levels include shipping within the continental US. For Canada please add $4 to your contribution.  For the United Kingdom, please add $4 for individual badges or $10 for any Game Pack.
column3:
>Please contact me for additional cost to ship elsewhere.  

Note that while pins can be destructive, some folks prefer them.  I can convert a clip to a pin on any badge at no additional cost.

NOTE: You do NOT have to know what you want on your badge before ordering.  Once the fundraiser is over, I will contact each person individually to select your materials and customize the content.

Available Acrylic Colors

The colors can be found on a post on our Tumblr: http://purpleponybadges.tumblr.com/post/81311361906/final-list-of-available-acrylic-colors

Additional colors and styles will be opened up as the campaign progresses and as stretch goals if applicable.
column4:
>I currently plan to source from Inventables.

Badge Styles

Basic badges include the following options:

column1: • Back: blank or with 'OOC'
<li>Clip attachment: hole cut and <a href=""http://www.amazon.com/Metal-Badge-Clips-Clear-Straps/dp/B0038NHBBM/ref=sr_1_1?s=office-products&amp
column5: keywords=badge+clip"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">clip included, or no hole cut (suitable for use in badge or ID holders)

column1: • Front: customized with: ID#, Character Name, two lines of details, player name, game name, 2 images chosen from icon library.
• Proofing/revisions: up to 2 rounds of revisions allowed
Deluxe options include all basic badge options, plus:
• Back customization: Custom layout of character information on back, including 1 additional revision/proof
<li>
Magnetic attachment: no hole cut and two-part magnetic clip permanently epoxied on back
column2: room for 1 additional line of character information on front.  Blank back.

column1: • Status Beads: holes cut in badge, and wire attachment and 5 glass status beads included.
• Secondary Title Badge: holes cut and rings or s-hooks included so title can be hung below badge.  Allows titles to be added, removed, and passed between characters.

My History

I've never done an Indiegogo campaign before, but I've been making things for my LARP groups for years.  I did a complete set of these badges for our LARP at the Midwinter Gaming Convention, and I'll be doing it again for the LARPs I'm running at GenCon.

I have access to the necessary tools in multiple places, and can source the materials from in-town, so there should be minimal delays unless there's a shortage of wood, plastic, or electricity in Chicago.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't want a badge just yet or can't contribute right now?  You can help in other ways!
• Link to this campaign from your game mailing lists, message boards, and facebook pages
<li>
Follow us on Twitter
• Follow us on Tumblr

Thank you so much for all of your help!  I thank you!  Your characters thank you!  The Great Purple Pony thanks you!

$10: Deluxe Badge: Get a custom badge in wood (plain or painted) or acrylic with any one of our deluxe additions: back side custom text, status beads, secondary title badge, magnetic attachment.
$15: Ultimate Badge: Get a custom badge in wood (plain or painted) or acrylic with up to four of our deluxe additions: back side custom text, status beads, secondary title badge, magnetic attachment.

$30: Basic Game Pack: Get ten plain wooden badges plus a bonus ""Storyteller"" or ""NPC"" badge, customized for your game. (Game information must match on all badges, but names & character info can be customized).

$50: Frequent Player pack: Get up to 5 badges in wood (plain or painted) or any available acrylic colors.  Each badge can be uniquely customized and can have up to two deluxe additions (back side custom text, status beads, secondary title badge, magnetic attachment)

$60: Large Game Pack: Get 25 wooden badges plus up to 5 ""Storyteller"" or ""NPC"" badges, customized for your game.  Add $15 to upgrade to painted wood or acrylic. (Game information and colors must match on all badges, but names & character info can be customized).

$100: Deluxe Game Pack: Get 30 badges in wood or acrylic, customized for your game.  All badges come with up to three deluxe additions (back side custom text, status beads, secondary title badge, magnetic attachment).  Also get a set of up to 5 customized NPC, Storyteller, or Narrator badges.    Also get a set of secondary title badges (up to 15), customized for your game. Add $25 to upgrade to painted wood or acrylic. (Game information and colors must match on all badges, but names, titles, & character info can be customized).

$250: Be My Prototype: Be the first to know what's going on, and get a single badge of all prototypes and new materials I test with for 1 year. I currently plan to try out all the following materials: cardboard, wood, acrylic, glass, aluminum. There are multiple types of wood and multiple types of acrylic.  I will work with you to choose colors & customize each badge individually.  Once the badge is made, I will take photographs of the badges and use them to promote the new styles in emails, on social media and in my shop.  Then the badges will be shipped to you for your own use before the new styles are for sale.

All reward levels include shipping within the continental US. For Canada please add $4 to your contribution.  For the United Kingdom, please add $4 for individual badges or $10 for any Game Pack.  Please contact me for additional cost to ship elsewhere.  Note that while pins can be destructive, some folks prefer them.  I can convert a clip to a pin on any badge at no additional cost.NOTE: You do NOT have to know what you want on your badge before ordering.  Once the fundraiser is over, I will contact each person individually to select your materials and customize the content.Available Acrylic ColorsThe colors can be found on a post on our Tumblr: http://purpleponybadges.tumblr.com/post/81311361906/final-list-of-available-acrylic-colorsAdditional colors and styles will be opened up as the campaign progresses and as stretch goals if applicable. I currently plan to source from Inventables.Badge StylesBasic badges include the following options:
Back: blank or with 'OOC'
Clip attachment: hole cut and clip included, or no hole cut (suitable for use in badge or ID holders)
Front: customized with: ID#, Character Name, two lines of details, player name, game name, 2 images chosen from icon library.
Proofing/revisions: up to 2 rounds of revisions allowed
Deluxe options include all basic badge options, plus:
Back customization: Custom layout of character information on back, including 1 additional revision/proof
Magnetic attachment: no hole cut and two-part magnetic clip permanently epoxied on back
column2: room for 1 additional line of character information on front.  Blank back.

column1: Status Beads: holes cut in badge, and wire attachment and 5 glass status beads included.
Secondary Title Badge: holes cut and rings or s-hooks included so title can be hung below badge.  Allows titles to be added, removed, and passed between characters.

My HistoryI've never done an Indiegogo campaign before, but I've been making things for my LARP groups for years.  I did a complete set of these badges for our LARP at the Midwinter Gaming Convention, and I'll be doing it again for the LARPs I'm running at GenCon.I have access to the necessary tools in multiple places, and can source the materials from in-town, so there should be minimal delays unless there's a shortage of wood, plastic, or electricity in Chicago.Other Ways You Can HelpDon't want a badge just yet or can't contribute right now?  You can help in other ways!
Link to this campaign from your game mailing lists, message boards, and facebook pages
Follow us on Twitter
Follow us on Tumblr
Thank you so much for all of your help!  I thank you!  Your characters thank you!  The Great Purple Pony thanks you!",5.0,0,"2 Campaigns
|","Chicago, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/purple-pony-badges-for-larp-cosplay-cons-and-other-gaming/pica
