column5: >Guaranteed Christmas delivery! Order now, have great gifts for later!

column1: Introducing: Android Etch 2.0!

column2: >Hey all. Very excited to be writing this right now. I'll do my best to be brief!
>I'm drastically scaling back how much I'm asking for, from $12,745, to a mere $4,200!
>I'm looking at a new laser that's just as effective, called the Full Spectrum Hobby Laser. The laser, exhaust fan, and rotary attachment cost $4,200, total!

column1: New Perks!
Updated (again, again!): I've introduced threemore perks! The Dalek Droid, Monocle Android, and Classy Droid!

For $4,600: I can add my laser purchase to the expedited queue, which means it'll be built in a separate queue and shipped out within days! This would be excellent because I could fulfill perks much sooner than my February estimate, and I could also take Christmas orders!
For $4,800: I can also add a tube upgrade to my laser, raising it from 40 watts to 45 watts, and adding 2-3x life, or another 3000-8000 work hours! That's pretty serious bang for the buck!
(original pitch information below)
Getting My Etch On
Android Etch... Where to begin? Well, let me start with an introduction.

My name's Joshua Muñoz, and in December of 2011, I stumbled upon what would become one of my secret dreams, and something I could not forget about for the next (almost) two years: etching Google's bugdroid logo on glasses.

At first, I just did it for myself, but once I posted a picture on Google+, I knew there was both a market and a demand for this sort of thing. Being in college (at the time), I had too much on my plate to try and make this a reality, but I still never forgot about it.
Now, I've since graduated college, have a steady job, and am finally at a point where I can try and make some moves toward this goal of mine, but I can't do it without your help.

Android Etch is, to me, a labor of love, and something I desperately want to see come to fruition. I know how enthusiastic Android fans are, (I am one!) and I just want to be able to provide them with awesome, Android-branded stuff.

You, as a contributor, are the absolute lifeblood of this idea. Without your kindness and support, I'd either have to take out a small business loan (that I'd probably be paying off for a while), or save for a few years just to purchase the laser engraver I'm after.
Without you, essentially, my idea is just that. An idea.

If I don't reach my goal, I'm taking the money I received and depositing it directly into a high-yield savings account, where it'll accumulate interest faster than a standard savings account, and where I'll continue to put money until I've got the funds I need.
I won't touch it, I won't waste it, and I certainly won't spend it on anything unrelated to getting Android Etch started.
The Impact
I've said it before, and I'll say it again: I can't do this without you. Anything you can give puts me that much closer to realizing a dream of mine, and for that, I can't thank you enough.
Other Ways You Can Help!
If you can't contribute, that's not the end of the world! If you believe in my campaign and want to help me out, definitely share my campaign on all of your favorite social networks!
If you want to keep up with me, make sure to circle Android Etch on Google+, follow Android Etch on Twitter, and Like Android Etch on Facebook!

Again, thank you SO MUCH for donating, for sharing, and just for checking my campaign out. It really means more than I can put into words!

","Guaranteed Christmas delivery! Order now, have great gifts for later!

Overview

BB Bastard has been passionate about airsoft for almost a decade. We believe the continued health and growth of our beloved sport relies on community, education and participation. This project has been a dream of our since we started airsoft. The quest to answer the questions surrounding what ACTUALLY happens during a BB's short lifespan inside the barrel.

Contribution to this project are about more than simply getting some schwag. There are tons of manufacturers and businesses that say they understand what it takes to make the inherently in-accurate airsoft platform more accurate, but very little practical testing to back it up.
Contributors to this project will be funding the the empowerment of the airsoft community to make buying decision with more accurate, reliant and unbiased information.
Project Goals and Expenditures

The project mission is to build a stable, reusable base test rig and then, using custom clear Pyrex barrels of various diameters, film the behavior of the BB in the barrel with high speed camera in the range of 5000-150000 frames per second.
The funding raise here for this project will be directed to:
<ul>
• the purchase of 12 clear lab grade borosilicate barrels (approx $500)
• the rental of an appropriate high speed digital camera (approx $2500) and stroboscope
• the creation of perks ($500)
BB Bastard will cover the costs of:
<ul>
• the base rig (securing the mechbox, stock barrels and materials)
• mechbox
• hop up containment
• various springs
• hi intensity lighting rental
• open source documentary video and photography
• free BB and eyepro perks

Our perks are top notch. We are leveraging BB Bastards vendor relationships to get quality hoodies and tees, and of course we are throwing in our new line of eyepro that meets BOTH ANSI and MIL-PRF-31013!
Underfunding - Over Funding

If we do not reach our goal, we will assess at that time if we can complete the project with the funds we have attained. If we don't think that will work we will donate all the funding to Many To One PTSD Support Foundation (http://www.many-2-one.org), a charity that is as dedicated to PTSD awareness as we are to airsoft.

If we exceed our goal, we will forward any donation over what we have outlined in this project to Many To One PTSD Support Foundation (http://www.many-2-one.org).
So no matter what happens, your dollars are guaranteed to go to a worthy cause
The Impact

All data, including raw stock video, photographs and the final paper will be open source. It will be distributed on the BB Bastard web site, OPS-Center.net, Airsoft Canada and on Airsoft Mechanics. Similar tot he MSED/Airsoft Trajectory Project we will make it available for anyone to host.

Your contribution will further the sport of airsoft and legitimize the efforts of thousands of players, retailers and manufacturers to make better quality products and innovate to keep the sport fresh and alive.
Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Socialize this project with friends and family, on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and even (GASP!) by actually TALKING TO SOMEONE IN PERSON!

Hello, My name is Wesley Eaton. I am a college freshman at UTSA, and I am a gamer. I play alot of league of legends but, I also really enjoy minecraft. I have had a server before but no one to play on it. However, I recently joined the Esports community at my school and I realized that having a minecraft server for our community would be awesome! This doesn't mean you have to be a member to donate or to play on it! Everyone is welcome! Thank you very much for at least reading this, spread the word please!( So many !s, I'm excited)(the server will be hosted with http://mclayer.com/)

Sounds in Space is a space themed rap game for the iOS. Combining Mad Libs with Multiple Choice and a Musical Element, we want to make a unique gaming experience with a different aesthetic and we believe we have the perfect team for it.

Sounds In Space tells the story of the music monks, a group of people of all races in species out in space who work on developing new music for the love of it. When Travej Sargasso, one of the former students uses his skills to amass personal wealth and power. When word catches his ear that a new style of music that could overthrow him has been developed, Travej captures his former masters, unaware that the the new style had been developed by students. Now it is up to those students Lew Pine and Grace Land to save their masters and bring back music to space.

Our goal is to have three types of gameplay - Story Mode, Freestyle Mode and a single device Multiplayer. Story mode will have 3-4 difficulty levels with increasingly hard puzzles and unlockable features for the game, Freestyle will be an unlockable endless survival mode and Multiplayer will be unlockable combative mode where you can face off against friends to see who can survive the longest.
On the team we currently have 5 members, each bringing something different to the game!
Eugene Ahn
Eugene makes internet hip hop as Adam WarRock, and will be writing the lyrics and consulting on the music for Sounds in Space.
Erica Henderson
Erica is an artist who has worked on music games in the past, and will be bringing her character creation and design skills to Sounds In Space.
Luke Herr
Luke works on a lot of online projects as a writer and project manager, and will be leading the team and working on the story.
Steven Schelter
Steven works as a developer and coder, and will be developing the code and the system for Sounds In Space.
Michael Wilson
Michael makes indie hip hop as Vibe Leviathan, and will be writing additional lyrics and creating the beats for Sounds In Space.

Making a game with a team full of professionals is not a cheap prospect and while we have an initial investment from one of our team members, we want to make the game bigger than that would allow and to take out that financial risk altogether.

What if we told you that $15 could get you an exclusive Adam WarRock Mixtape, a Digital Art Book, A Copy of Sounds In Space for your favorite iOS device and Credits?
What if you got to work on a rap with Adam WarRock for the game? Or what if you got finished concept art or could even create a character?
Sounds In Space has a variety of rewards for all budgets with more coming in the future!
We want the game to do well so have stretch goals that will help to illuminate what each amount lets us add in!

$1000 - Titan Level
At $1000 we won't have to use any of the investment money and to celebrate we will give everyone a free wallpaper when the game comes out.
If the game only makes this much money it will have 2 characters, 3 difficulty levels and about 200 multi-solution puzzles.

$1500 - Ganymede
At $1500 we will add on a third unlockable character for you to play as!

$2000 - Mars
At $2000 we will add on an iPad version (and users will get to determine what they version they want)

$2500 - Venus
At $2500 we will get to add on Freestyle Mode to the game which means more endless raps!
Additional Stretch Goals Locked Till Later!
ADDITIONAL QUERIES

I don't want the game but I am all about the mixtape. What can I do?
For those of you who lack a mobile device to play it on but still want the Adam WarRock music, you can get the mixtape (and the art and the credits and thank you separately).

I don't have an iOS device. Will you release an Android version of the game?
There are still locked stretch goals.

There can't be sounds in the vacuum of space. Why do you hate science?
You have us there.

**NOTES: Please click the Gallery tab above to view all four LiveTheShift concept videos.
For donations, please pay via Paypal if possible.
Concept:
TheShift is a real life role playing system that will teach people how to evolve our lives into a higher state of being.
TheShift is a vehicle for wealth generation, manifestation, spiritual evolution, self transformation and ultimately is intended to uplift humanity into the New Reality.

<div>TheShift utilizes tools and resources available to each of us now, such as Life Coaching, Bodywork, Energy Work, Mystery Schools, and Sacred Geometry, combined with Role Playing Game (RPG) systems such as Second Life, The Sims, Mass Effect, D&amp
column2: D, Choose Your Own Adventure, etc.

column1: TheShift is targeted to people who are open-minded, have a desire to transform their lives, desire success in life and business, and who wish to BE the change in the world.
TheShift is a tool for personal, spiritual, and business transformation!
www.livetheshift.com
The System:

The Shift is a real-life Live Action Roleplaying Game that uses your smartphone as a magical device to transform your life. Use it to receive challenges and missions that will increase your awareness and skills, and earn you points in four categories: Earth, Fire, Water and Air.  

Fire missions are intended to foster a sense of community as the hearth is the center of a community. Earth missions will involve nature-based activities and create an awareness of sustainability and sustainable action. Water missions will teach you about flow and how to use that flow to manifest abundance in your life. Finally, Air missions relate to the inner spirit work that is required to gain levels in the game system.

Points in all areas will be required to gain levels which will result in incentives granted to players. These incentives take the form of objects, such as power items or self-care products, knowledge in the form of workshops or videos, and experiences such as free trips to retreat centers in exotic locations around the world.
<div>
Funding:

Our Indiegogo funding goal of $20000 is part of our overall fundraising plan. This will allow us to develop the roleplaying system, create marketing materials, help with operational expenses, and equipment.
Please also help us by getting the word out to your networks! Spread the word, use the Indiegogo share tools on this page!
Who we are:

<div>Heather Hannigan: Heather uses her very diverse academic, business, sports, spiritual and feminine co-leadership background to help women, people of color, and LGBTQQI people live their vision. Her training includes Geographic Information Systems, Cultural Geography, Non-Profit &amp
column2: Business Management, Holistic Psychology (Thesis in Personality Theory), Coaching, Reiki, Heart of Now, and Women's Spiritual Group Facilitator Training. Heather's specialties include Personal &amp
column3: Spiritual Prep For Biz Launches, Lifestyle Design and Presence, Possibility &amp
column4: Zen In Tennis. Heather is a visionary, mentor, and public speaker.

column1: <div>Brianna Amore: Brianna is a digital artist and change agent who embraces the process of transformation in her own life. She holds degrees in Art &amp
column2: Design, Psychology and Geography and has been a DJ, VJ and event producer for about 13 years.  She has actively created transformational experiences in the underground dance community and was a co-creator of the Entheos Gathering in Canada.

<span style=""font-size: 16px
column4: >Adventures of Frederik Ceppo - Possibly the funniest game since the dawn of mankind?

column1: Join the our team and make it possible!
<div>
Things are rolling smoothly. We are proud to annouce that we got a new voice actor on our team. Frederik Ceppo themed mobile game is also coming quite soon and oh.. lot's of things!
Keep eye on our social media channels, Frederik Ceppo on twitter (http://twitter.com/frederikceppo)  and be first to know what is happening!
<div>

In this fun game you are an “ordinary"" man from Finland who lives an extraordinary life in the town of Likajoki, Finland (In English, the town of Filth River)! You will soon notice that things start to go sour and you are the only Man who can save the future of the Citizens of your town.

Take control of Mr. Ceppo and enjoy life as a fellow who is the acronym for laughter without himself even knowing it! As sure as your name is Frederik Ceppo, with Capital C, You are absolutely sure that You can do and achieve anything! Even though you are living in a home that's almost a dumpster, you get pizza from homeless people and you have to drink your beer in the back room of the bar. Why? Find out for yourself...

An Epic Story, with an Epic character! Based on real life characters. Yes - Finland can be a weird place sometimes! 

What’s normal for Mr. Ceppo is abnormal for most of the planet's population. Point and click your way through a never seen, fun filled world, full of surprises along the way, solve exiting puzzles, see all the weird stuff that happens and save Ceppo and the town of Likajoki. You shall be lavishly rewarded!
<ul>

column1: Game will be released on major desktop platforms (Windows, OS X), later Frederik will be seen also on mobile platform.
A bit about main parts of development.

All scenes and characters are unique hand drawn by our artists. Game soundtrack is composed for this game only and is not something that one can buy from different audio stock services. Voice acting will be recorded in high quality studio by talented actors. Basicly, we do everything from scratch.

Some things are not easy (or cheap) to get done by a small group. There are many costs associated like studio fees, we need additional software licenses to get game on different platforms and to pay artists for their job. We also need additional funds to get all PR-stuff done. Simple as that.
Even though the game is primary funded by the active team, additional funds are needed to get all things done. Our goal is to deliver fun game with good feeling and unique storyline.
We also want to give something back, so we have arranged a list of things what we can offer in change.

Challenges in this project

Game will be released even without funding, but it won't be what we really want it to be. We have very high standards and if the funding is lacking the development process will take more time, since we have our ""day to day"" jobs also to get the food to the table.

column1: So no beer for Mr. Ceppo (or us) before this game is ready!
Don't want to drop a coin but still want to help?

There is one thing what everyone can do and it won't cost you nothing. Please share links to our game and Indiegogo page. Make noise about us! We already have solid fan base for Frederik Ceppo but there is always room for more!
","Adventures of Frederik Ceppo - Possibly the funniest game since the dawn of mankind?
Join the our team and make it possible!
Things are rolling smoothly. We are proud to annouce that we got a new voice actor on our team. Frederik Ceppo themed mobile game is also coming quite soon and oh.. lot's of things!
Keep eye on our social media channels, Frederik Ceppo on twitter (http://twitter.com/frederikceppo)  and be first to know what is happening!

In this fun game you are an “ordinary"" man from Finland who lives an extraordinary life in the town of Likajoki, Finland (In English, the town of Filth River)! You will soon notice that things start to go sour and you are the only Man who can save the future of the Citizens of your town.

Take control of Mr. Ceppo and enjoy life as a fellow who is the acronym for laughter without himself even knowing it! As sure as your name is Frederik Ceppo, with Capital C, You are absolutely sure that You can do and achieve anything! Even though you are living in a home that's almost a dumpster, you get pizza from homeless people and you have to drink your beer in the back room of the bar. Why? Find out for yourself...

An Epic Story, with an Epic character! Based on real life characters. Yes - Finland can be a weird place sometimes! What’s normal for Mr. Ceppo is abnormal for most of the planet's population. Point and click your way through a never seen, fun filled world, full of surprises along the way, solve exiting puzzles, see all the weird stuff that happens and save Ceppo and the town of Likajoki. You shall be lavishly rewarded!
Humorous Point & Click adventure game
Unique world, explore Frederik’s home town, get to know all weird people around Frederik. Discover creepy mansion of mad scientist and reveal it’s secrets.
Beautiful hand-drawn art design
Meet numerous crazy characters
In order to progress you have to solve fun puzzles ranging from helping friends to discover how strange machines work.
Fully voiced characters
And much more!

FOR ENGLISH VERSION CLICK HERE
A Propos
TOWN CENTER est un jeu de société de 2 à 4 joueurs, complètement en 3 dimensions, à partir de 12 ans.
Une partie dure en moyenne 10 minutes par joueur pendant lesquelles les joueurs vont incarner le role d'un maire qui va construire et gérer le centre de sa ville.
Il faudra développer sa ville en 3 dimensions : Construire des commerces pour accroitre ses revenus, des appartements pour loger ses citoyens, des bureaux pour leur donner du travail.

Mais n'oubliez pas d'apporter de l'électricité à toutes vos constructions et de toujours garder un oeil sur vos capacités à construire de plus en plus haut  car plus vos tours seront hautes plus elles vous rapporteront des points de victoire à la fin de la partie.
L'acquisition des cubes se fait grâce à un mécanisme original mêlant le bluff et encore une fois la troisième dimension.
Seuls les maires les plus rusés parviendront à construire les bons modules au bon moment dans la partie. Mais attention à ne pas donner des cubes trop intéressants à vos adversaires.
Les Cubes spéciaux
La collecte sur INDIEGOGO va permettre de faire éditer ce jeu de manière professionnelle.

En effet ce jeu existe déjà puisqu'il est sorti en édition très limitée au mois de mai 2012 dans une version semi professionnelle, mais devant la demande sur le salon d'ESSEN12 , nous avons décidé de le mettre en avant et de vous le proposer.

Les très bons retours des joueurs nous ont aussi permis d'améliorer le game play, certains détails ont également été ajouté dans la règle et d'autres situations ont été éclaircies pour vous proposer la version la plus aboutie possible de ce jeu.

D'autre part la taille et le NOMBRE des cubes en bois, vue les règles d'empilement possible, fait qu'il est impossible de proposer ce jeu dans un petit tirage. C'est donc pour celà que nous avons besoin de VOUS, joueurs du monde entier, pour permettre de faire exister ce jeu pour le plus grand nombre.

column2: >

column1: La taille des cubes dans un jeu dit à l'allemande est de 8 mm, mais dans cette édition, nous avons décidé de mettre le paquet et de proposer des cubes 8 fois plus gros en volume afin de rendre l'empilement possible sur 5 étages (et plus gros encore dans la version DELUXE).

Voici d'ailleurs un comparatif de tailles de cubes suivant les versions DELUXE, NORMALE. Nous avons rajouté les cubes en 10mm pour ceux qui possèdent déà la première édition du jeu et les cubes en 8mm pour ceux qui ont l'habitude des jeux avec du Kubenbois dedans... Tout à droite un Meeples pour mieux visualiser les tailles...
Les stickers
Pour augmenter le réalisme du jeu, nous avons ajouté des stickers (façades et toits) que les joueurs pourront (ou pas) coller sur les cubes avant de jouer.

Ils permettent également d'ajouter un peu de complexité au jeu car selon la partie visible de votre ville vue par avion (les toits), le joueur obtiendra des bonus ou malus en argent et points de victoire. Il n'est pas obligatoire de jouer avec , mais celà ajoute une variante passionnante car le joueur doit se demander , en plus des difficultés de construction et de planification, s'il doit ou non laisser visible telle ou telle partie de sa ville en empilant ou pas ce cube sur celui ci.... Plein de choix, plein de choix...
Réalisme et design
Town Center est une représentation de la vision de l'auteur en 3D des jeux vidéos de construction et de simulation de villes.

En concevant ce jeu, l'auteur souhaitait rendre le plus réaliste possible le développement d'une ville. Il s'est donc attaché à recréer, en simplifiant, les noeuds et corrélations entre les différents éléments que constituent le centre d'une ville.
Il a développé le concept de Voisinage, à savoir que les bâtiments d'une ville évoluent en fonction des bâtiments qui leur sont adjacents
Une des phases primordiales du jeu, outre la subtile phase d'acquisition des cubes, est la phase de développement. En effet :
<ul>

• Dans une ville, plus il y a de possibilités de travail , plus elle devient attractive et va donc attirer de nouveaux citoyens, développant ainsi les lieux d'habitation, c'est à dire les appartements...
• Dans une ville, plus il y a de résidences et donc d'habitants, plus les commerces vont avoir de clients et donc plus ils vont pouvoir se développer, c'est le cas dans Town Center.
C'est la compréhension de ce mécanisme d'évolution simple : Travail-->
column3: Commerces qui vous ferra gagner la partie.

column1: <ul>
• Dans une ville, on obtient des revenus de ses commerces, ce qui est le cas dans Town Center
• Dans une ville, on obtient des points de victoire quand on a beaucoup d'habitants, c'est le cas dans Town Center

Plus les constructions réussissent à évoluer , grâce à une bonne planification de constructions, plus elles seront grandes et feront marquer de points de victoire (pour les appartements) aux joueurs ou d'argent (pour les commerces) à chaque tour...
Plus les constructions sont faites en hauteur, plus le joueur va gagner d'argent à chaque tour et plus il aura de points de victoire.
Chaque 5 Argent , c'est aussi 1 point de victoire....
Les règles sont donc simples et realistes, donc faciles à retenir dès la première partie !
D'ailleurs les règles complètes, où sont elles ?
En cliquant ici et ici vous aurez la dernière version des règles
http://www.ludibay.net/towncenter/towncenter_rules_FR.pdf
Vous avez lu les règles et vous voulez essayer TOUT DE SUITE ?
Et bien c'est possible! Sans avoir le jeu, grâce à l'informatique et à Christophe Denoize (toooooof le seul humain avec 6 o!!! , son pseudo sur trictrac et BGG )

Mais attention, cette version informatique n'est que la version SOLO du jeu, elle n'est faite que pour comprendre les mécanismes, car le jeu multijoueurs possède une phase supplémentaire d'acquisition des cubes et évidemment plus d'interaction lors du tirage des cubes.
Nous avons ajouté un tutoriel pour ceux qui n'aiment pas lire les règles.
Les graphismes sont ceux de la version NORMALE
http://www.boiteajeux.net/jeux/tow/partie.php
Le contenu et la qualité graphique:
Dans les 2 premières éditions de ce jeu, la boite et le plateau personnel étaient de qualité médiocre, même si celà n'affectait pas le jeu.

Pour cette édition, nous avons fait appel à un grand illustrateur puisque Sampo Sikio nous a fait l'honneur d'accepter de refaire entièrement les graphismes (Stickers, boites et Plateaux personnels). C'est lui qui a fait les graphismes d'ECLIPSE, entre autres.
DEUX VERSIONS DU JEU VOUS SONT PROPOSEES :
La version NORMALE et la VERSION DELUXE
Descriptif de la version NORMALE:
<ul>

• Une boite : Très grande, style Les colons de Catane en un peu moins épaisse, c'est à dire 30x30x5, afin de pouvoir ranger l'imposant matériel  , les grands plateaux pour un confort de jeu plus important.
• 4 plateaux : De grandes dimensions également : 20cmx20cm
• 124 Cubes EN BOIS au format géant de 16mm en 6 couleurs, du jamais vu sur le marché !!!
• 8 Cubes de 8mm pour marquer l'argent possédé par les joueurs.
• 6 planches de stickers (façades et toits) à coller ou pas sur les cubes
• un grand sac noir en tissu.
• Une règle illustrée en couleur
Descriptif de la version DELUXE:

Parce qu'il existe des joueurs exigeants et que ce jeu s'y prête d'une manière assez incroyable, nous proposons à la souscription également (et UNIQUEMENT), une version hyper luxueuse, numérotée dont voici le contenu :
<ul>
• Un coffre en bois géant de 42cmx32 cmx15 cm, permettant de stocker le matériel aux dimensions Gulliveriennes.

• 4 plateaux en bois de 28 cmx 28cm avec impression du plateau (légérement différent du plateau de la version NORMALE pour des raisons graphiques et d'impressions), soit un plateau 2 fois plus grand en surface !!!
• 124 cubes de 30mmx30mm, pour une manipulation et un plaisir de jeu jamais atteint, en 6 couleurs également.
• 8 cubes de 10mm pour marquer l'argent possédé.
• Une règle du jeu.
• un très grand sac en tissus tissu.
• Un PDF des stickers si vous souhaitez imprimez les stickers

column1: A quoi va servir le financement ?

Le projet est de réunir les fonds nécessaires pour lancer le tirage du jeu chez le fabricant Allemand LUDOFACT pour le printemps 2013. La qualité de la production (plateaux, boitage, peinture des cubes) est à nos yeux essentielle afin que le matériel soit de qualité supérieure.

En complétant le financement vous participerez, tous, au projet et particulièrement au cout des illustrations, à la fabrication des cubes géants de 16mm, la réalisation des grands plateaux personnels...
Garder la production en Europe a également un petit surcout, mais celà nous semble mieux adapté à notre politique de qualité et de distribution étant basé en France.

L'ensemble s'élève à 10 000 Euros. Le magasin LUDIBAY existant sur le marché du jeu depuis plus de 8 ans, on peut faire confiance à son sérieux afin que la fabrication et la distribution soient parfaites, encore une fois !
Notre vision de la souscription

Nous ne sommes pas des fervents défenseurs du système de crowdfunding, surtout si celui ci ne permet pas de donner de REELS avantages à ceux qui nous aideront à souscrire à ce projet. Ludibay est un magasin de jeux sérieux et reconnu dans le monde ludique et c'est pourquoi nous garantissons que si vous souscrivez à ce projet, vous aurez :
- Un COUPON DE 5E, valable sur site www.ludibay.net pour toute commande au niveau VILLAGE ou supérieur, valable sur l'ensemble du magasin

- Votre jeu 2 mois avant les boutiques : Rien de plus horripilant que de souscrire à un projet et d'attendre son jeu pendant plusieurs semaines, puis de la voir disponible dans la boutique en bas de chez soi ! Ici pas de surprise, nous distribuons le jeu et nous le stockons, donc dès réception dans nos entrepots, nous vous garantissons qu'il sera chez vous 2 mois avant l'envoi aux boutiques, et ce partout dans le monde !!!

column2: >

column1: - La qualité au meilleur prix : en souscrivant maintenant, vous nous aidez dans notre projet, c'est à dire que vous limitez le nombre d'intermédiaires en achetant directement à l'auteur du jeu et à son fabricant. Pour celà le souscripteur est en droit d'attendre un prix plus bas que s'il avait acheté sa boite dans le commerce. Nous garantissons donc un prix d'au moins 20% moins cher que le prix boutique qui sera proposé à 35Euros (28E là tout de suite)

- Des goodies : Comme nous l'avons dit plus haut, l'avantage de ce système est de supprimer les risques d'investissement. Mais si le montant est atteint, alors nous pourrons produire , sans risque de pertes, plus de matériel et donc améliorer les possibilités du jeu. Nous avons décidé de proposer aux souscripteurs DEUX extensions.
Ces DEUX extensions sont accessibles à un tarif très avantageux pour ceux qui décident de nous soutenir pendant les 45 que durera la levée de fonds.

column2: >

column1: Ces DEUX extensions complètent et étendent les concepts fondamentaux du jeu. Elles s'adressent à des joueurs plus exigeants ou à des joueurs voulant nous aider à la réussite du projet.
Que se passe-t-il à la fin des 45 jours ?
Si le montant est atteint ou dépassé, alors nous payons le fabricant (LUDOFACT).
Les délais de fabrication sont de 6 semaines à cette période de l'année. Donc nous transmettrons immédiatement les fichiers à l'usine dès la fin de cette campagne.
Un mail vous sera envoyé dès que nous recevrons le jeu dans nos entrepots (début août). Suivant la destination vous aurez votre jeu à la mi aout.
Comme convenu, les boutiques auront le jeu à la fin du mois de septembre.
Les frais de port
Suivant le niveau de souscriptions auxquels vous souhaitez souscrire, les frais de port sont précisés et doivent être ajoutés au montant du niveau souscrit selon la zone géographique.

exemple : Vous décidez de souscrire au niveau VILLAGE+ à 35€ ET vous habitez en France. Les frais de port sont donc de 5€: votre total pour cette commande est donc de 35+5 = 40€. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à envoyer un paiement de 40€
A NOTER QUE POUR LA FRANCE, LE COUPON DE 5E EN FAISANT UNE COMMANDE SUR LUIBAY VOUS PAIE LES FRAIS DE PORT
A propos du porteur du projet
L'auteur :

""J'ai 38 ans, et depuis 10 ans, je crée des jeux et particulièrement des extensions pour le plus célèbre des jeux de train, Age of Steam. Town Center est mon deuxième projet sérieux. C'est une version simplifiée d'un autre gros jeu qui est en développement depuis 2007 et qui sortira en fin d'année prochaine, formant avec Card City un ensemble de 3 jeux indissociables.
J'aime les jeux qui ont un but simple mais dont les moyens pour y parvenir sont complexes et dont l'arbre de résolution est infini.

J'aime les jeux de connection en général ( Hex, ConHex, Dvonn...) et les jeux plus simples pour enfants en 3D avec beaucoup de matériel (Le Fou volant, l'île infernale, La couse aux Baobabs...) et vous retrouvez toujours dans mes jeux une composante connexe ou de connections, sans doute mon coté ageofsteamien ou mon coté mathématicien qui ressort, malgré moi, je vous jure !!!
Je n'aime pas les jeux pour lesquels le but est compliqué et les moyens sont simples pour y parvenir, c'est à dire les jeux dont il existe 100 000 facons de marquer des points de victoire...""

Si vous vous reconnaissez dans ce profil, si vous avez aimez le premier opus Card City, alors vous ne serez pas déçu avec ce jeu qui exploite à fond la composante 3 dimensions, comme on a rarement l'occasion de le voir dans les jeux de société.
Si vous avez trouvé Card City, un peu simplet , ici vous aurez de quoi vous triturer les ménages....
A noter qu'il n'est pas nécessaire de connaitre Card City pour jouer à Town Center, Town Center peut être vu comme une version Grand garçon de Card City...
Attention jeu hautement addictif...""

column2: >

column1: L'illustrateur:

Sampo Sikio s'est fait connaitre du grand public en illustrant le célèbre ECLIPSE édité en France par Ystari Games. C''est un artiste scandinave. Vous aimerez en lui les graphismes épurés qui se déclinent à l'infini, son incoparable façon de simplifier les choses complexes en trouvant le symbol ou l'astuce qui fait qu'on comprend du premier coup d'oeil.
Sa patience avec nos demandes a été immense et nous l'en remercions.

Sampo a su gommer le côté abstrait du jeu en proposant un plateau sobre, mais fonctionnel, des stickers visuellement attractifs et une boite avec des personnages reprennant les personnages crées par Fanny dans Card City, afin d'unifier l'ensemble de la trilogie.
L'éditeur:

Ludibay n'est pas à proprement parlé une maison d'édition, puisque c'est plutôt un magasin de ventes par correspondance de jeux de société, mais Cédric, son patron a su faire confiance à l'auteur Alban Viard pour développer la Trilogie SMALL CITY, dont Town Center est le deuxième opus.
Ludibay a déjà édité Card City, le premier opus de la trilogie SMALL CITY.
Avec ce projet plus ambitieux, il confirme sa volonté de s'inscrire dans le paysage ludique.
F.A.Q
1) Puis je acheter plusieurs exemplaires de la version NORMALE de Town Center ?
Oui, si vous achetez 3 boites en souscrivant au niveau Hameau à 28€, alors vous paierez 28€+28€+28€=84€
2) Puis je combiner et réduire mes frais de port dans ce cas ?
Oui tout à fait, c'est d'ailleurs l'intérêt d'une commande groupée. Les frais de port n'excéderont pas 10€ pour la France, 18€ pour l'Europe et 45€ pour le reste du monde.
3) Si le montant total du projet n'est pas atteint (10 000€), que se passe t il davec mon argent ?
Votre argent vous est INTÉGRALEMENT restitué, pour vous, c'est une opération blanche!
4) Si le montant est atteint, comment puis être sur que le jeu sera produit et que mon argent servira à la production du jeu ?

Ludibay est un magasin de vente en ligne de jeux avec également un magasin en dur à Dunkerque, France. Il existe depuis plus de 8 ans et possède  le plus gros catalogue de jeux , goodies avec franchise. Il a déja édité le jeu CardCity et avait en 2012 un stand sur le salon d'Essen, le plus gros salon international de jeux.
5) Comment payer les frais de port ?
Il suffit d'ajouter le montant du niveau de souscription avec le montant des frais de port indiqués.
6 ) Comment puis je servir du coupon de 5E Offert par LUDIBAY ?

C'est très simple, il suffit d'aller sur le site www.ludibay.net et de valider une commande en insérant le mot de passe qui vous sera fourni à la fin du projet. Attention cependant ce bon ne sera délivré que si la somme de 10000E est atteinte. Votre commande vous sera expédiée en même temps que le jeu Town Center
ENGLISH DESCRIPTION
"""" A hidden gem that needs a bigger audience """" Don D from BGG
"""" the 3 D aspect mecanisms in this game are GENIUS"""" Clint Herron
""""Lot of things to discover and explore , just a stellar game """" Ingo Griebsch

TOWN CENTER is a fully 3-dimensional boardgame for 2 to 4 players, ages 12 and up.

A game lasts an average of 10 minutes per player, during which each player will embody the role of a mayor who will build and operate the very center of the city.

You will develop the town center in 3 dimensions, which means building shops to increase your income, apartments to give an attractive place to for customerscitizens to live, and offices to attract them to work and live and shop in your city!

But do not forget to supply power to your buildings, and always keep an eye on your ability to build higher and higher by increasing the height of your elevator. The higher your towers are, the more money you will earn, and the more victory points you will earn at the end of the game.

The acquisition of cubes to build your town center is done through a mechanism that combines bluffing and building in three dimensions.

The cleverest mayor, who manages to build the right modules at the right time in the game, will be the winner. But players also must be careful not to leave too many interesting cubes for their opponents….
Special Cubes

Your pledge on IndieGoGo will allow us to produce this game professionally.

In fact, this game has already been published in May 2012 in a handmade, extremely limited edition, by the author himself
column2: but many requests at the 2012 Essen fair have pushed us to highlight this unique game and offer it to you.

column1: Thanks to very good player feedback, we have also improved the gameplay: Some details have also been added in the instructions, and some situations have been clarified to provide you with the most complete version of this game.

The 3-dimensional system and the stacking concept make it nearly impossible to offer this game in a small print run. This is the reason why we need YOUR help, gamers from all around the world, to breathe life into this game, and bring it to a bigger audience.

The size of the wooden cubes in Eurogames is usually 8mm, which may mean nothing to you, but in this edition we have decided to include cubes with 8 times the volume in order to allow players to perfectly stack their cubes with ease. So, you will be handling nice 16mm cubes — and that’s in the NORMAL version. They’re even bigger in DELUXE version!
<h2 dir=""ltr"">
Stickers
To increase the realism of the game, we are adding stickers (facades and roofs) that players can choose stick to the cubes before playing.
<div dir=""ltr"">

Although they add nice visual pop to an already eye-catching game, they are not merely for improved aesthetics: They also add a bit of complexity to the game, because you will get bonuses or penalties applied to your money and victory points, depending on the bird’s-eye view of your buildings’ roofs. You can choose whether you want to play with this variant, but it adds an exciting dynamic, because, in addition to difficulties of construction and planning, a player must also consider whether to leave a beneficial roof visible even though a profitable opportunity to stack on it has arisen. Similarly, just how long can you afford to leave that negative rooftop exposed, waiting for just the right cube? Lots of agonizing choices!


Realism and Design

Town Center is the author's 3D vision of the classic video game, SIM CITY, familiar to gamers since 1989, when the first version of game was unleashed on an unsuspecting public…

In designing this game, the author wanted to make the development of a city as realistic as possible. He really wanted to recreate the growth and evolution, while simplifying the elements and the correlations between the different aspects that constitute the center of a city.

He nurtured the concept of neighborhood, that the buildings of a city evolve as a result of buildings that are adjacent:

One of the critical phases of the game, besides the subtle cube acquisition phase, is the evolution phase. In fact:
• In a city, if there are more job opportunities, the city becomes more attractive and will therefore attract new citizens, which leads to the development of new housing, such as apartments…
• In a city, if there are more homes and therefore more people, commercial areas will have more customers, and therefore they will be able to develop and grow.

<div dir=""ltr""><span>…and that’s how it works in Town Center!<br class=""yiv1926501684kix-line-break""/><br class=""yiv1926501684kix-line-break""/>This reality of urbanization drives city evolution in the game: Work → Citizens → Shops.<br class=""yiv1926501684kix-line-break""/>• In a city, you get income from the shops, which is the case in Town Center.<br class=""yiv1926501684kix-line-break""/>• In a city, you gain prestige as more and wealthier people are living in your apartments
column2:
this again is the case in Town Center.

The more apartments have managed to evolve and grow, according to development rules, the more the denizens will be happy, and this will reward you with victory points…

The more shops are develop, the more money you will earn each turn, which also feeds your victory points.

column1: <div dir=""ltr"">

The rules are as simple as they are realistic, and so easy to remember at the end of a full game!

But where are the complete rules ?

Here and here you will find the final version of the rules. Please bear in mind that the rules layout is still a work in progress — we're still working on editing, tweaking, and adding art and examples to make the rules as clear as possible before the game goes into production. Well, hopefully into production — that's where YOU come in!
http://www.ludibay.net/towncenter/towncenter_rules_EN.pdf
<div dir=""ltr"">

You read the rules and you want to try it NOW?

Well you can! Before the game even makes it into a box, thanks to those funny things we call “computers”, and the skillful work of Christophe Denoize (a.k.a.toooooof, or 6-O-in-a-row man, on BGG).
<div dir=""ltr"">

http://www.boiteajeux.net/jeux/tow/partie.php
But beware, this computer version is only a SOLO version of the game, which allows you to come to understand the mechanisms. In the multiplayer game, there is an additional cube acquisition phase, and obviously more interaction — and much more tension! — in drafting those cubes.

We even added a tutorial for those who do not like reading the rules.

The graphics used in this computerized solo game are the real graphics for the NORMAL version of the boxed game! Just imagine how nice it is to see that lovely 3D layout in front of you, on your table, where you can look at it from any angle you like….


The content and graphical quality:

In the first two editions of this game, the box and boards were of a poor quality. Although it did not affect the gameplay, we want to give you the proper mayoral treatment.

For this edition, we contacted a great graphic designer, Sampo Sikiö, and we are honored to report that he is completely redoing the graphics (stickers, boxes, and player boards).

THE TWO VERSIONS OF THE GAME AVAILABLE TO YOU:

NORMAL version:
• A nice, large box — large like the Settlers of Catan, i.e. 30cm × 30cm × 5cm, in order to store the massive cubes and the nice, large player boards that give you plenty of room to build a city in the comfort of your own home.
• 4 large 20cm × 20cm player boards.
• 124 large 16mm wooden cubes in 6 colors, never seen on the market!
• 8 standard 8mm cubes to track the players’ money.
• 6 sheets of stickers (facades and roofs) to stick on the cubes, if you like.
• A large cotton bag for the cubes.
• A full-color, illustrated rulebook.

DELUXE version:

Because there are demanding gamers, and this incredible game is well-suited for it, we are also offering you (and ONLY during the campaign) a hyper-luxurious, numbered extremely limited edition, with everything you see here:
• A giant wooden pirate’s chest 42cm × 32cm × 15cm, for storing the components so large they would make Gulliver blush.
• 4 wooden boards of 28cm × 28cm printed with graphics (the graphics will be slightly different from the NORMAL version for graphical and printing reasons) which means your player boards will give you twice as much room for your city’s opulence.
• 124 cubic 30mmx30mm for handling and fun game ever, also in 6 colors.
• 8 medium 10mm wooden cubes to track the players’ money.
• A set of rules.
• A very large cotton bag.
No stickers for this version, but it comes with a PDF so you can print your own stickers, if you want them.
THE PIRATE's CHEST :
<div dir=""ltr"">

THE EXPANSIONS:

These expansions will never be commercially available later, so for the foreseeable future, the only way you can get them is to back this project! So we recommend that you back this project at the maximum level, so you can get all the goodies!
• Expansion No. 1: 4 additional player boards, and 12 wooden cubes in a seventh color, with two completely different starting configurations. We wanted to simulate the construction of NEW YORK: a city with such an incredibly high density has to have its own version of Town Center. The board is topologically completely different, which would alter the deepest-rooted habits of even the most experienced players. The 12 new dark green cubes represent the citizens, which add new situations and new opportunities for construction to the basic game… It would be a shame to build The Big Apple as a ghost town!

• Expansion No. 2: 4 additional player boards, and 9 wooden cubes in an eighth color. As a French publisher, we asked the designer to make us a special set of player boards for PARIS. And here is what he sent us: bridges, the Seine, the two small islands… These really should add quite a bit of variety! You will use the 9 brown cubes to create a 3-dimensional player board. During the setup, the cubes are used to create hills and mountains. 2 scenarios are provided in the rules (San Francisco and Rome), but you can also do a completely random setup, or map the topology of your home town! If you crave variety, you can customize the game every time you play!
<div dir=""ltr"">

For what will the funding be used?  

This project is to raise the necessary funds in order to start production of the game with the renowned German manufacturer LUDOFACT in spring 2013. The quality of the production (boards, boxes, painted cubes) is essential for us to ensure that we provide the mayor (Psst, that’s YOU!) the best possible material to show off to your VIP guests.
<div dir=""ltr"">

Your being a backer for this project will allow us to pay for the costs of graphics, producing the giant 16mm cubes, the realization of large player boards…

The total amount of all fees is 12,000 Euros. Ludibay has been a shop for the world of gaming for over 8 years, and more recently we have gotten publishing experience, as well. So, you can trust in our reliability and reputation, and help us make the manufacturing and distribution of Town Center as great as it should be!

Our vision of the Crowdfunding

We are not devotees of the crowdfunding system, especially if it does not give REAL benefits to those who help us to fund this project. Ludibay is a serious game retailer and is well known even in the USA: The shop has more than 490 ratings on BoardGameGeek and is an Amazon professional reseller. That is why we guarantee that if you subscribe to this project, you will get:

- You get ONE FREE COUPON OF 5E on the web site www.ludibay.net at the end of the campaign if the reach has been reached !!!

- Your game 2 months before the retailers: Nothing is more horrifying than funding a project and waiting patiently for your game, only to see it available on the shelves at a local shop weeks before you get yours!

No surprises here: We distribute the game and we store it. So as soon as we receive it in our warehouse, we guarantee that it will be in your hands 2 months before sending it to the shops, anywhere in the world! Also, our high-quality manufacturer is not across some large ocean with a slow and uncertain sea voyage to our warehouse….
- The best quality at the best price: By subscribing now, you will help us minimize the cost of our project
column2: i.e. you limit the number of intermediaries by buying directly from the author of the game and its publisher. As a result, when you back this project, you are entitled to a lower price than if you had bought your box in a shop. We therefore guarantee a price of at least 20% cheaper than the shop price of 35 Euros: It’s yours for 28 €.

column1: - Goodies: As we mentioned earlier, the advantage of this system is to eliminate the risk of the investment. But if you help us reach the target amount, then we can produce the game without the risk of loss, which allows us to include more and better components
column2:
so, to broaden the play options for the game, we decided to offer backers TWO expansions.

BOTH of these expansions will be available for the backers at half of the MSRP price ONLY during the crowdfunding campaign, and for those who have supported our project during the 45 days.

BOTH of these expansions complement and extend the basic concepts of the game. They are intended for more demanding players, or players wanting to help the success of the project.

column1: <div dir=""ltr"">

What happens at the end of 45 days?

If the amount is reached or exceeded, then we pay the manufacturer (LUDOFACT).

Production time is 6 weeks at that time of year. So we immediately send the files to the factory at the end of this campaign.

An email will be sent as soon as we get the game in our warehouses (early August). Depending on the destination you will have your game in mid August.

As agreed, the retailers will have the game at the end of September.

About the project leaders:

The Author:  

""I'm 38 years old, I create games and especially expansions for the most famous train game, Age of Steam, and have been doing so for 10 years now. Town Center is my second serious project. This is a simplified version of a more complex game called SMALL CITY. This tremendous game has been in the development phase since 2007 and will be released at the end of this year. These two games will join Card City to form an inseparable trilogy.

I like games that have a simple goal but the means to achieve this goal are complex, and whose resolution tree is infinite.

I love connection games (Hex, ConHex, Dvonn…) and small, stupid 3D party games with a lot of plastic materials… You probably will always find a connection component in my games. It’s my Age of Steam side, or my mathematics dark side — despite myself, I swear!

I dislike games where the goal is superficially complicated and with very simple resolution to achieve that goal, i.e. games in which there are 100,000 ways to score victory points…""

If you recognize yourself in this profile, or if you like the first game, Card City, then you will not be disappointed with this game, which makes full use of the third dimension, in a way we rarely get to see in modern boardgaming.

If you thought City Card was a bit cheesy, don’t worry: Town Center is a great, brain-burning filler game….

Note that it is not necessary to have played Card City in order to play Town Center
column2:
Town Center can be seen more as a different interpretation of the same concept as Card City….

Warning: This game is highly addictive….”

The illustrator:     

Sampo Sikiö’s rise to stardom in the boardgaming world was with the very famous game ECLIPSE. He is a Scandinavian artist. You'll love his very pure graphics. His patience with our requests has been immense and we thank him a lot.

Sampo succeeded in erasing the abstract side of this boardgame by proposing clear but functional, visually attractive stickers and a box with characters inspired by the characters created by Fanny for the Card City cards, in order to unify the entire trilogy.

The Editor:

column1:
Ludibay is not, strictly speaking, a publishing house, since it is primarily a mail order game store, but Cedric, the boss, has trusted the author, Alban Viard, to develop this SMALL CITY Trilogy, of which Town Center is the second opus.

Ludibay has already published Card City, the first installment of the SMALL CITY Trilogy.

With this more ambitious project, Ludibay confirms its willingness to explore this fun landscape further.
